113.content:
It had been a couple of weeks since Walden had recently moved beach house to help Charlie pay for the mortgage on the place and quite frankly he was loving it. Though he had been a little idle lately it was starting to show, Walden could spy a little belly poking out from his shirt. Not wanting to get to fat he decided to take a walk on the beach, he knew it wouldn't be enough to lose the weight but it was at least something, and he wouldn't be just sitting around in the house.

He took a long walk and somehow was unsure just where he ended up. But Walden spied something from the bushes as he took a closer look, he saw that it was an actual gingerbread house, a giant live gingerbread house, He was stunned he couldn't believe something like this was actually here. He walked up to the house, in awe of seeing a real one of this mass. He touched it feeling surprised that it was actual gingerbread not a prop of some sort. He stuck his finger in the cement and licked it off his finger, the cement of the building was frosting! He had never seen anything like this.

1131121121.content:
As Walden looked at the trolley choked full of food he couldn’t stop but think back to the kind woman words. Sure, he seemed to be getting pretty big but maybe she was right.

Maybe he needed to grow healthier.

While he thought about that he didn’t seem to realize that his hands were already grabbing food out of the trolley, bringing it to his mouth. Lost in thought he kept shoveling pastries in his mouth, chewing as fast as he could, all the while his shirt kept riding up from his stomach which began to grow rounder as it became fuller.
Suddenly a pastry fell from his grasp and landed directly under his eyes, Walden was so surprised that he stopped shoveling food and gave himself a good look. What he saw left him speechless.

‘Sheesh! I’m getting huge! Getting plump? I’m growing as big as a house. I’ve got to stop this.’

Slowly, due to all the time he had spent on that couch, he began to rise feeling every extra pound on his body weighing him down. Still he managed to stand and realized that by only doing that he was out of breath.

“Cripes!...Just how…big I…was going…to get? Have to… do something…about it.”

Worried about himself he decided that he had to do something, anything to try and lose that extra weight and, without any other ideas, he decided to start by doing some crunches.

‘It won’t get rid of all this in one session but, I’ve got to start…And I’m starting now!’

Unfortunately for him, as he began preparing himself to exercise he didn’t notice that the witch was watching him from the door-frame that led into the kitchen. The woman had an impish smile on her face as she looked at the chubby guy on the floor.

‘And so you think you can escape it this way, don’t you?
Too bad I’ve got many aces in my sleeve.’

She stood there, silently watching as Walden tried to exercise, staring as he began to sweat profusely only by trying to do those activities. When she believed he was at his lowest point she moved forward, carrying within her arms a large platter of gooey brownies and chocolaty cookies.

“Walden dear? Everything okay?”

“Y-Yeah…just…trying…to do…some…exercises. *Uff!*…it’s just…so…tiring…”

The woman moved closer, kneeling down right beside Walden, strategically placing the platter so near to the sweating guy on the floor, letting the aroma waft from those sweets to tantalize the poor exhausted guy.

“Here what you need, dear. You gotta have some energy…have one, dear…”

Walden stared hungrily to those delicacies. He wanted SO MUCH to have them but, how could he? Didn’t he want to lose weight? He already was so big that he couldn’t afford any more.
Still, the woman could have been right. Without energies how could he exercise? And what one cookie could do as damage to his already ruined figure?
These thoughts swirled in his mind like a whirlwind, he knew that most of those were just excuses, but to refuse and keep his newly decided diet would have been so hard to do.

Couldn’t he afford to splurge one last time? What should he do?
1131121121.title: Feel the burn!...or try to at least

11311211211.content:
‘I may be getting pretty big but, the woman is right. I really need to recover some energies to exercise. I may even hurt myself if I keep on trying, wouldn’t I?
Could be that I was getting weaker as I avoided good food? Like…like the one she’s giving to me?
Yeah, that must be it. I’ll just keep eating it for a while longer…not too much though.

Just a few more days…maybe a week…only what I need to gather my strength.’

Walden turned toward the woman nodding as she helped him to stand and retake his position on the couch, while giving him a few cookies every step of the way. As soon as he was seated back on the couch, she left him the platter as he began to scarf down the still warm brownies and the cookies. As he began eating all thoughts of dieting and exercising vanished from his mind, replaced with the sinful taste of those sweets.
How could he have thought about refusing them? They were so good, so rich. For sure he would get back his strength in no time thanks to those delicious sweets. And then…then he could try again some exercise.

‘Yeah. Will try again…maybe next time…or the following one…’

Half an hour later he suddenly belched loudly as his hands stopped moving from the platter, which was actually empty, to his belly, now as round as a ball, massaging it slowly. He fell back against the marzipan couch he had been seating on, still rubbing his, now rounded, gut while belching slowly as the pastries and sweets began to be digested. He himself tried to look down, to assess the damage but, he felt so sleepy.

As he fell asleep, snoring lightly, the woman emerged from the shadow, admiring the luscious forms of Walden, pinching his stuffed cheeks, massaging his belly taut as a drum.

“Oh, my dear boy. You sure need to grow healthier… And I’ll help you in that. Let Izabela take care of you.”

The witch slowly crept closer and closer to Walden, until she began whispering in his ear with a voice as soft as a lullaby, as her eyes seemed to glow with a faint light.

“Hear me boy, darling little boy. You need to eat as much as you can, whenever you can. Eat and grow healthy, my little, little boy…You need your strength and my food will give you that. Why worry about diet and exercises? Eat and grow healthy, my boy.”

Walden didn’t seem to acknowledge but he began to snore a little more loudly, as his own belly began to grumble as it digested the huge stuffing it had survived.

When he woke up he…
11311211211.title: Needing energy to exercise

113112112111.content:
Walden woke up with a yawn as he stretched himself a little bit. He was still seated on the marzipan couch, his shirt riding above his belly that, even though it wasn’t full anymore, it still was so big that it had begun the slow descent toward his crotch. As he look at himself he realized that he truly was starting to grow plumper, he just didn’t know if that qualified as fat or not. Was he growing healthier as the woman assumed? Or was he only fat?

His thoughts got interrupted suddenly when the woman entered the room once more, carrying within her arms a large platter chocked full of dark chocolate brownies.

“Oh, sweetie, you woke up. And here I thought to make you a surprise. Here, take these while the rest of your snacks cools down.”

Walden took the platter and began eating the sweet brownies, covering himself in crumbles.

“Thankhs ma’am. I Just…wanted to ask you something…”

“Oh, just call me Izabel. And what did you want to know?”

Walden kept eating the sweets, without realizing that his stomach began to slowly grow larger as it became fuller.

“Just wanted to thank you for your hospitality and kinda wanted to ask you if you were sure I could stay here… I mean, it’s already been a few weeks and it’s getting late. So I probably should go home…”

Izabel smiled sweetly at the young man, fattening up before her very eyes. Sure, usually her victims were a bit younger but, she just couldn’t pass him up, could she?

“No worries, Walden. I live here alone and a bit of company is very welcome. In fact, if you would like to spend a few more days here I would be so happy. Having a man around is such a good thing…”

As she said that she placed her hand on his thigh, massaging it slowly and gently. The man felt himself stiffening slightly, as he stopped chewing and stole a glance toward the woman. His cheeks began to grow redder by the minute as he tried to understand if she was flirting with him or she was just caring.

Gulping down the bite he had in his mouth he began stammering some words but she shushed him swiftly, by placing one of her finger on his lips.

“Shh. I’ve told you not to worry. Stay as long as you like, I will enjoy every minute I can have you here.
Now, you’re a growing boy and to grow healthier you need your strength. For this reason I’ll be back in a few with your snack.”

“Uh..I..I mean…”

Walden was at loss for words. Still, as Izabel went back into the kitchen he could not stop himself to staring at her backside, realizing for the first time how good looking she was. As he was alone in the room, he couldn’t refrain from giggling lightly by himself.
She was into him, he wasn’t imagining things.
And she was a cute girl too.

‘Man! How could I haven’t noticed her before? This is awesome! Best day ever!’

As he kept chuckling by himself he didn’t notice that Izabel was returning to him while pushing a trolley loaded with food, stopping it right beside him, near to him and well within his reach.

“Here, Walden, I didn’t know what you would have preferred so I made a bit of everything…”

And she really had anything loaded on that trolley, from meat pies to waffles, eclairs and cinnamon rolls. There were many different kinds of pastries and even some slices of different cakes.

“Whoa, you sure like to cook, don’t you? Err…I mean…”

The witch laughed wholeheartedly, a rich feminine laugh that warmed Walden and made him glow beet red.

“It’s just so good to have a growing man around, and you sure need to grow a bit more, don’t you?”

Walden, once more seemed to glow deep red in embarrassment as he futilely tried to cover his growing gut with his, now, undersized shirt but suddenly stopped when he felt again her hand caressing him. As he felt her gentle touch he couldn’t refrain from thinking if she was right. To his eyes he thought he was getting pretty out of shape but, as she kept telling him that he was in need of growing, he began to wonder who was right.

Still, wherever the truth was, he for sure wasn’t going to let her out of his sight. And if worst came to worst, he reassured himself that he could manage to lose a few pounds.

“Well, Izabel…I truly don’t know if I need to grow more but, if it makes you happy, I’ll gladly indulge a little bit. Gotta admit though, I’m getting a little peckish…”

“Oh, Walden, believe me. A real man need his energies…and now, here, try this…”

The woman then grabbed a large éclair from the trolley and passed it to Walden who, without further ado, began eating it, soon falling prey of the wonderful taste of the sweet treat. From that moment his mind became blank, as he fell back in a trance, eating away at anything edible there was around him.

The pastries, the pies and the rolls, all of those were swiftly taken from the trolley and relocated inside Walden stomach, and still he kept grabbing more as Izabel watched him stuffing himself for her.

‘This man is going to be my best meal yet…Just need to fatten him up more.
Lots more.’
113112112111.title: A Good boy gotta eat to grow healthy

Burping and belching, Walden declared the snack over.

He felt way fuller than he had ever felt before and, as he painfully realized, way too stuffed. He still couldn’t believe how much he had eaten, but judging by the empty trolley by his side he could guess the answer was under the ‘too much’ section of the dictionary.

Still, Izabel was still there, by his side, seemingly content to bask in his growing form. Walden couldn’t yet believe his luck, here he was, a maybe slightly puffier version of his old self and beside him there was this beautiful girl, all lovingly perched on the same couch where he was resting, seemingly gazing up to him with her perfect looks, as if he was the most beautiful thing in the room.

Blushing he used one hand to slightly massage his own rounded up gut as he tried to move the other arm, as nonchalantly as possible, toward the woman beside him. What he hadn’t realized yet was how larger he actually was compared to what he remembered. His arm, for example had been way lighter than what he was currently struggling with but still he tried. She was just so cute that he wanted, no.
He needed to try and bring his relationship with her forward.
He wanted to hug her and, slowly, pull her toward him so they could, at least cuddle together.

Izabel noted his arm movement and, pretty soon, realized he wasn’t really stretching. She mentally smiled as she moved herself slowly to let Walden hug her.

True, starting a story with one of her meals wasn’t something she needed but, if she could manage to ensnare him in a web of love, then her job of fattening him up would be way easier.

Walden couldn’t believe his eyes, easier than he thought it could be, he managed to pass his arm around Izabel and the woman actually seemed to accept his hug. He was now feeling elated as he felt the warm body of Izabel pressing on his side, hugging him back.

“Oh, Izabel… I thought…you wouldn’t…”

“Shh, Walden dear. You’re such a gentleman. Why would I refuse you? Such a handsome growing man. I’ve told you already that you can stay here with me, haven’t I?”

Walden was blushing and sweating profusely, he had never felt like this before.

“I…Y-yeah…”

“And why would I have offered that to you, if not for having you here? Walden, you’re such a handsome man, who in their right mind could send you away?

You just need to grow a little healthier and you could be any woman dream…will you do that for me, Walden?”
1131121121111.title: When the meal’s done…

choices: During the night, Walden wakes up hungry
New Day, New meals, New pounds
He sleep all the way to Lunch time
Izabel receive an unexpected visit in the middle of the night
11311211211111.content:
Walden couldn’t stop from looking into those beautiful eyes. Those mesmerizing, amazingly eyes of Izabel seemed to change all of his thoughts. How could he say no to that beautiful and gentle creature? How could she be wrong?

She couldn’t.

So she had to be right. He truly needed to grow healthier and how could he refuse her, after all she had done to him? No, he couldn’t oppose her.
Walden now truly began to think that he was in dire need of plumping up, no matter that his pants felt tighter than ever or that his shirt was now used more like a makeshift bra for his moobs.
She was right.

“I will, Izabel. I trust you with all my heart. I…I Love you, Izabel.”

“Oh, Walden!”

The witch gleefully hugged the growing man seated beside her, she cuddled closer to him for a few minutes before bringing her face closer to his own, until she ensnared him to her with a soft, long kiss on his lips.
She felt as he tensed up in a moment and then melted down as she passionately kissed him, only to leave him breathless as soon as she released him.

‘And now that you’re mine, Walden, now you’ll need to grow.’

“Did you liked it, Walden dear? I’ll be sure to give you plenty more, but first you have to rest a bit. Sleep well, my love. I’ll wake you up for dinner…”

As Walden began to feel tired, Izabel moved away from him, watching as he fell soundly asleep. She stood there a few minutes, looking as his stomach began rising and falling. Humming lightly, the witch, went back to the kitchen where she began casting all kind of spells, creating a veritable feast for her soon-to-be-meal to consume.

Walden woke up slowly, feeling like someone was gently calling him. At first he began to think that his meeting with Izabel had only been a dream but, as soon as he opened his eyes and saw her gentle smile, he smiled in happiness.

“Wakey wakey, Sweetie. It’s time for dinner…”

“Thanks Izabel…I’m feeling quite hungry, actually.”

“Well, you’re a growing man aren’t you? Now, come, and I hope you like it…”

Walden tried to stand up on his own but, before he could put any effort in it, she moved to his side and helped him standing. He noticed how easily she had helped him and that reinforced his thoughts that he truly needed to grow stronger and healthier.
As soon as he was standing she left his side and moved toward the dining room, where a huge table made of hardened licorice was waiting for him, covered in all kinds of food. Walden slowly lumbered toward the table, waddling slowly as he was still unused to move his now heavy body, but he seemed unfazed by that issue.

‘Man…Must have fallen asleep in the wrong position on that couch. Almost can’t feel my legs. Hmmm…something smells real good though…’

As soon as he reached the table, the witch was quick to direct him to a marzipan throne looking chair, right at the middle of the table, surrounding him completely with all the tasty looking dishes scattered on the table.

“Here, Walden, why don’t you start with these?”

Walden hadn’t even seated himself that Izabel had already moved in front of him a plate with half a dozen cupcakes, each of them covered in frosting and sprinkles. He tried to thank her for the meal but, as soon as the plate was in front of him he found himself irresistibly hungry.
Without any further word he simply grabbed the cupcakes and began eating them as fast as he could. As the first bite touched his tongue he mumbled in pleasure. The taste of those cupcakes was divine, so good that he began to eat them ravenously, trying to eat as many as he could in the shortest of time.

Izabel smiled impishly as she saw the ecstatic look in Walden as he began tearing through the cupcakes, but right before he could find the empty plate she quickly swapped it with another one, now leaving four large brownie bricks right under his nose.

“Here, sweetie, why don’t you try these?”

Walden soon began to fall in an eating trance, everything he ate tasted way better than whatever had he eaten before. Brownies, scones, slices of pies, even full cakes! Walden blindly kept eating unaware of the effects all this food was having on his body. As more and more calories were being pushed into his body, he began to grow. His stomach began to grow rounder and rounder as it filled up with delicious food but, as soon as it seemed to reach it point of fullness, it seemed to shrink back to being empty as the food in it began to be distributed into his whole body while a faint glow surrounded him.

Izabel kept moving plates under Walden face while, every once in a while, she casted a spell onto the man letting whatever he had eaten to be instantly digested and converted to fat. She couldn’t believe how easy he had fallen prey of her food. But she could believe that Walden was going to be her biggest meal ever if he kept eating as he was.

Izabel gleefully watched as Walden body began to grow wider and wider, as the man kept on scarfing down plate after plate of food, she could still hear the seams of his pants and shirt stretching, as they reached their breaking point. She couldn’t wait to see him burst out of his clothes but, as the plates kept being cleaned up by Walden, Izabel knew that she had to stop soon.

After all, even though there was her spell that kept him from getting full, she knew that Walden was reaching his limit.

In all honesty, she couldn’t have asked him for anything more. Even though he wasn’t aware of it, he had been gorging on her food for hours now and had grown way more than he would normally have, had he been on his own. So she simply removed her spell from him, letting his body to, finally, feel and be full.

Walden began to feel tired, tired and full. Way too full. The words 'painfully overstuffed' crept into his mind to say the truth but, still, it was a good pain.
Bite by bite he began to slow down as he felt his belly grow fuller and fuller, until he simply couldn’t eat another morsel, no matter how tiny it would have been. As soon as he stopped he felt himself grow sleepy and tired as if he had just finished running a marathon, still he felt content. He had only to look at Izabel to know he had made her happy.

“So, Walden, was everything good?”

“It was…*urp*…It was way better than good. Everything was so, so good…I loved every…every minute of it.”

“That’s good, my dear. Now, let me help you to bed. You seem awfully tired and what you need right now is a good night sleep.”

Walden didn’t say anything as Izabel helped him standing, nor did he seem to realize he was way bigger than he was before the huge dinner he had just consumed. His belly, round and taut as a drum, was pushing in front of him of a good feet and a half, while his whole body was way wider than before. All in all, if one had to estimate it by eye, Walden looked like he had just gained a whole seventy pounds by that dinner alone, most of which now still rested in his huge gut.
His thighs also had grown, as most of his body had done, and now those forced him to a slow waddle, as they jiggled with his every movement.

As Izabel helped him navigate through the house, she couldn’t refrain from pinching and grabbing his love handles and his fat folds, enjoying the sensation of all that fat on the body of her future meal. In truth she usually began cooking them when they reached that size but, Walden seemed to show so much potential that she couldn’t wait to see him at his fullest.

As she placed him on his bed, she smiled seeing that the young man was soundly sleeping already, and she quickly gave him a little peck on the cheek as she left him to sleep away his meal, while moving back to the kitchen to have everything ready for his breakfast on the following day.
11311211211111.title: …The deed’s closed.

choices: Izabel was at the door-frame and was admiring his fattened form
He was still munching away at the floor
Something was watching him from outside
He was fattening up way faster than he should have
113112112111111.content:
Walden was dreaming of running on a beach, beside him there was Izabel, passing onto him pastries and shakes.

“Eat up, my love…you’ve gotta grow stronger…”

And as he ate what she gave to him, he could actually see himself growing stronger, taller and able to run even faster. He was truly enjoying that vacation he had taken with Izabel, but then, suddenly, something behind him began roaring.

Even though he was running faster than ever, whatever beast had growled toward him seemed to be getting closer. Scared he turned toward Izabel but she seemed to be blissfully unaware of everything.
In a moment the monster roared again and it was so close that Walden couldn’t avoid to turn his head and, while doing this he tripped and fell…and woke up with a groan.

With bleary eyes he looked around himself and began wondering where he was, until he realized he was still in the gingerbread house, probably one of the guest rooms.

For a few moment he almost wished that Izabel had decided to sleep with him but, then realized that maybe that was pushing it too far and too fast.

As he tried to get back to sleep he felt his stomach rumbling, recognizing the roar he had heard during his dream he chuckled between himself as he tried to get out of the bed. Strangely though, it seemed harder than he remembered but, he didn’t gave it too much thought on it.
It was probably the fact he had just woken up that seemed to make everything harder than it really was.

Still, even though he was now standing and waddling slowly through the room he didn’t know where to go for a quick snack. For a moment he thought about going out in the corridor outside his room and search around but, he still felt awkward since he hadn’t really been around the house yet. And yet his stomach seemed to demand to be filled.

“Man, mustn’t have eaten enough at dinner it seems…will have to remember to ask Izabel to make some more next time, just in case. For now though, what could I…?”

As he lumbered within the room, he stared at one of the wardrobe inside the room, realizing it was all made of marzipan and cookies. He tried to get it out of his mind but, soon felt his hunger growing stronger.

“Oh man…Hope she won’t get too mad about this…”

It didn’t take long for him to break down a few pieces of the wardrobe, even though that left him almost breathless and very tired. Still, as he quickly ate those pieces, his hunger seemed to grow stronger instead of being suppressed. With new found resolve Walden kept breaking pieces from the furniture in the room, but for anything he ate, his hunger seemed to grow stronger.

It was when the sun began to reach inside his room that Walden began to feel nice and sated. He was down on the floor, his mouth covered in chocolate and cookie crumbles and his belly so full it resembled more an over-inflated beach ball than a stomach. Still, although he didn’t feel full, he was content. Walden burped a few times and, as his stomach began digesting his load, he slowly drifted off to sleep.

He seemed to never realize that all the furniture in the room, even the bed or the lamps, had been cleaned out and now rested inside his huge and bloated gut.

He simply fell asleep again, right where he was on the floor, completely unaware that…
113112112111111.title: Midnight snack

choices: Stop him. She has to ensure that he’s well when the time comes for HER meal
Let him keep going…maybe he will stop on his own?
He’s so slow... Force more food on him! He needs to grow faster!
1131121121111111.content:
As Walden soundly slept he remained blissfully ignorant of a pair of eyes that were staring enthralled to his stuffed forms. Izabel stood breathlessly on the door-frame of the guest room in which she had left Walden the night before. Initially she had wanted to check on his progress but, as she had opened the door and saw that the room had been emptied of any furniture, while being replaced with a very stuffed Walden, she stopped entirely in her tracks.
Breathing in excitement she closed the distance between herself and Walden stuffed form. As she passed her hands over the vast expanse of the man stomach she felt how taut it was and how hard it was.

‘After all I gave him for dinner…he still devoured everything in this room!?
Oh, Walden…seems that your hunger is growing.
Well, this situation just need some little adjustments…and we’ll see each other at breakfast.’

Walden slowly woke up, he hazily remembered something about a snack he had in the middle of the night but, when he opened his eyes and looked around he couldn’t see anything wrong in the room. Sure, the wardrobe was missing some pieces but everything else was still in place.

‘Weird…I could have sworn I had way more than that to eat…mh, must have dreamed it.’

The room in fact was back to its original splendor, as he remained ignorant to the fact that Izabel had replaced the missing furniture’s with her magic. As he stretched a little bit, and with some difficulties, he began to rise from the bed but, for some reason, found it was harder than before.
Slowly and tiredly he managed to roll out of bed, planting his feet firmly on the floor, and yet something wasn’t feeling right. He looked around trying to figure out what was wrong but he failed to notice where the issue was. Due to his constant eating of massive meals he had gained quite a bit of weight in a very short time, thus his body wasn’t used to move with those extra pounds. But, at the same time, since he was now getting used to this treatment he also failed to acknowledge how big his body was getting.
Huffing and puffing, short of breath, he began a slow waddle toward the room exit when suddenly he heard Izabel calling him, and hearing her voice had a reinvigorating effect on him.

“Walden, dear? Are you up? Breakfast is ready.”

Between hearing her voice and the word ‘breakfast’ he felt himself pushing harder as he passed to a quick waddle, while his belly began grumbling in hunger. Soon he was back in the dining room, seated on his throne like chair, while all kinds of sweets and pastries were surrounding him. He quickly stole a glance toward the woman which, he noticed, seemed to be truly happy of seeing him.

“What are you waiting for, dear? Dig in, this is all for you.”

The man didn’t need any further encouragement as he began scooping up forkful of whatever was in front of him, nor he seemed to realize that there was something strange in the food in front of him.
In that moment he was attacking a plate with a mighty stack of pancakes, but he failed to realize that they were bigger than the common pancakes. They were so big, in fact, that what he thought were stacks of dozen pancakes were in reality only five or six per stack.

As soon as the first bite passed his lips he forgot about everything surrounding him, there was only the delicious taste of those, so fluffy, pancakes overloading his taste buds, while the syrup and the butter merged together within his mouth forcing him to moan in pleasure. Walden began to eat faster and faster, as each bite was more savory then the previous. Alas, he soon found himself staring at the empty plate, while his belly rumbled ever so strongly in hunger. Fortunately for his belly, Izabel wasn’t distracted by his greed, and quickly pushed another plate under his nose, while a faint glow irradiated from her hands into the plate she had just given him.

He didn’t noticed it, though. He was just too engrossed in the platter that had appeared in his field of vision. It seemed to be a classic old country breakfast plate, consisting in mashed fried eggs with a side of fries and bacon strips, also deeply fried. As he salivated hungrily he still didn’t noticed that there was enough food in the platter to feed a family of four people, instead he plunged directly into it, gulping down huge forkful of eggs with handfuls of fries, and the occasional bacon strip in the middle.

Izabel watched the scene smiling, always giving his little growing boy more and more food, enchanting it each time to be more fattening and less filling. She had always enjoyed a good stuffing sessions with what were to become her meals but, she had to confess to herself that none had given her more satisfaction in respect to how Walden enjoyed his food. For a fleeting moment she wondered if it would be best to enhance also his hunger with a quick spell but, for once in her life, she didn’t want to push it too fast.
The guy was doing such a great work by himself that she didn’t want to spoil it.

Still, she kept firing on him her spell to let him digest everything his belly had stored every time he reach fullness but, this time she began to wait more and more time, between each time. And Walden didn’t seem to be able to stop by himself, even when his stomach reached full capacity, he kept on eating for a bit more, stretching his limit by inches every time. Naturally, with that avalanche of food and the digestive spell, he began growing, rounder and wider, faster than ever.

His clothes, which just the day before were strained in the futile attempt to contain him, where now literally ripping apart at the seams. His shirt, used basically as a bra for his ever enlarging moobs, began to tear in various points, as the stitches ripped one after the other. His pants, tearing apart at the crotch, as his ass and thighs began to enlarge, with strata upon strata of fat. And yet he kept gorging, unable to stop, unable to feel anything except the gnawing hunger filling his depths.
His face, also, began changing, growing rounder and more piggish. As his chin began changing into a double and his cheeks puffed out more and more, jiggling slightly every time he moved.

After hours of constant gorging, Izabel realized this had to stop. Not only she had to restock the food supply twice now, but she knew that Walden could get hurt if he kept eating like that. She wanted her meal to be as fat as possible, yes, but he needed time to rest and to remain blissfully unaware of what was happening to him. So she quickly stopped her spells, thinking that this way he would get full and stop his gorging but, she soon realized she had miscalculated something.

Even though she had cleared away all of her spells, Walden didn’t seem to slow down, even when his own belly pushed against the table or when his fingers began having trouble keeping the utensils. The guy still kept going, chewing and gulping whatever happened to be in front of him, a food lust shadowing his eyes.

The witch for a moment was ecstatic, what she was witnessing was a rare occurrence, an eating trance so strong that the gorging piglet would never stop until he or she reached the point of no return.

But what was she to do? She was torn by her own desires.

On one side she wanted to stop him, she had always preferred a ‘fresh’ meal. But on the other hand if she let him continue he could become the biggest meal she ever had in such a short time.
Or maybe she could do something else with him, since he was so concentrated on eating?

She had to take a decision, and she had to take it quickly…
1131121121111111.title: Planning the future

choices: Weigh him now, she have to know how big he is.
Wait until he’s recovered. She could wait a few hours, couldn’t she?
Skip two weeks ahead. How big could he be in a full month?
11311211211111111.content:
In the end, as she was torn with choices, she also remembered where had she seen that scene already, way back in the past, when one of her would be meals literally ate herself to death.

No, she couldn’t let Walden to be wasted like that.

And so she did the only thing she could do to bring him back.
She approached him, feeling his body trembling with the pressure of that much food forced inside of him, and she hugged him while she nuzzled slightly her face against his now full double chin. For a moment nothing seemed to happen but then, she noticed that his arms slowly stopped moving toward the plates, moving toward his own overtaxed belly. Also his face, clenched in concentration, it soon relaxed, while his eyes lost that shadow and seemed to close down a bit.

Walden, from his point of view, wasn’t really sure of what had happened. He had begun eating the marvelous breakfast Izabel had made for him and then…then everything seemed to be covered in a deep fog. He distantly recalled hearing noises, such as his clothes tearing apart, or his stomach grumblings passing from hunger to pain but, it didn’t seem real.

What was real was the feeling of Izabel pressed tightly against him, cuddling with him, of her wet lips kissing him softly on the neck. And also the sensation of being overly stuffed that now filled his world. So much so that he forced himself to crush against the back of the chair, as he tried to alleviate the pain in his gut by opening up his pants.

If only he could have seen himself he would have shrieked in surprise.

All those hours eating had left him way different than how he had woken up that morning. His belly was so big he couldn’t stretch his arms around it, at most he could reach halfway up to the sides of it, and that was nothing compared to the rest of his body. He had grown massive, his ass completely engulfed the chair he was sitting on and, since it had no handles, the jiggling fat of his ass cheeks overflowed the sides rendering it virtually invisible. Also his torso and arms had puffed up, as he realized he was having trouble just keeping his arms lifted or angled toward his belly. But still, Izabel was right at his side, hugging him and that overruled any other changes within himself.

“*Uuurrp!*…Iz…Izabl…?...Wh…Whut…hppend?”

If the witch hadn’t been at his side, he would have realized as he heard his own words that something was very wrong. His cheeks, so stuffed and fat, made it very difficult for him to form words, that and the fact that even the act of speaking seemed to left him tired.

“Oh, Walden, my dear. Nothing has happened.
You just seemed so happy in eating what I prepared for you that I couldn’t contain myself. You’re just so adorable and lovely, dear.
Especially now that you’re growing plump, as any man should.”

“Oh…r-right. I…I just…feel…strnge...*hrrk*…so…tired…so…full.”

“That’s exactly what I mean, sweetie. You’ve just ate a proper breakfast and, as any growing man should do, you’re going to nap for a bit.”

“*Belch*…*Huff*…yeah…nap….sounds…*Urp*…nice…Still…your…c ookng…is…*urp*…delicious…Izabl…so…good.

So…*yawn*…full…”

The witch kept caressing and massaging Walden belly, even as the guy drifted off to sleep, even as he began snoring, and she stood there helping with her arts as his body began the arduous task of digesting that, almost, never ending breakfast. As her touch soothed his digestive tract she also began filling him with magic, aiding his body to recover its energies spent in the attempt to digest everything before he reached the point of no return.

She also began an even harder, even for a talented witch like herself. She did all she could to give back to him his speech and, as much as she could, his mobility.

If she wanted to keep him in the dark for as long as possible, she had to take out as many distractions from him as she could.

Yet, she couldn’t believe how big he was now, she was on him and still, she couldn’t hug all of him!

She had to see how far along he was but, to do that she had to weigh him. She wondered if it was best doing it as he was resting and recovering or, if she should wait until he was completely rested and out of the danger zone. Or, even better, she could wait a few days more before weighing him, just to make it a full month of growth?

What she decided to do?

113112112111111113.content:
Izabel was still staring wide eyed at Walden, collapsed on the couch, as he slept soundly digesting the humongous meal he had just consumed. She had managed to stop him from going too much overboard but, she had to see how big he had become, how far along he was and, most importantly, if he was already within the weight range to become her meal.

But before that she kneeled near him and began rubbing his rock hard belly, so big that she had to use both hands to cover some of it. Still, she reasoned, it was better to let him sleep some more, so to fully digest everything before weighing him up.
She just hoped she could manage to let him move toward the scale.

In the end, she decided to keep him growing a little bit more before bringing him on the scale. She had thought long and hard about it and decided to treat the situation as if it was Christmas…and Walden was her present for herself. So, she gave herself the deadline of two weeks, making so a full month of Walden staying in her house with her. In those two weeks she managed to keep him always stuffed to the brim and to rest as much as he could.

She truly loved seeing him growing larger and wider after each passing day and was barely able to hide her excitement to weigh him up.

Walden, from his side, was happy on the overall situation. Izabel cooking was always excellent and she often commented proudly of how he was growing healthier. Yet, he seemed to have some troubles moving around, for some reason, but he dismissed that thought. If there was any issue, he was sure Izabel would let him know about it.

Day by day, the two weeks passed on almost uneventfully. Sure, a couple of times the throne on which Walden usually sat during his meals broke down and, of course, some time happened that he couldn’t pass through the doorframes and had to move sideways, but in the end two weeks passed in a jiffy.

And now, with two full weeks of meals and growing up, Izabel was ready to weigh Walden and see how far along he was. As she went to wake him up, she trembled in excitement, seeing how big he was. As he rose from his bed, his entire body jiggled, from his overripen moobs, to his fleshy belly rolls and even with his enormous ass cheeks. With all the magic food he had eaten in that month, Walden had grown tremendously, getting fat all over himself, and forced him to perform a slow waddle to move around and even managing to get stuck into some doorframes as he tried to cross them, sideways or not.

Still, when Izabel came to wake him up he could only smile to her, feeling his hungry middle rumbling unhappily at the fact that it was still empty.

“So, Izabel…Is time for breakfast?”

“Oh, My dear Walden…Not yet. First we need to verify one thing…the two of us.”

Sounding a little unhappy he turned to look at her, still enjoying her presence as if it was their first week together.

“Oh…Mmm…What is it…Then?”

“Well, Walden dear…it is almost one month since you’ve come here to brighten my days…and I just wanted to see how healthy you’ve become. Right after that, I promise you a breakfast feast like o other.”

Smiling at the prospect, the fattened form of Walden began following Izabel around the house until they reached the main room, there he saw a large scale placed in a corner of the room. Strangely, he had never noticed that there. Still, it didn’t bother him at all as he simply waddled there and rose on the scale as Izabel watched the magic scale do its job. As the machine whirred, a series of numbers and letters began to appear on the back of Walden, preventing him to see what his weight was.

“Ok, Walden, stay still for a minute and everything will be done.”

“But I don’t see…anything…”

“Don’t you worry about that…as soon as the result is here I’ll let you know. Ok, Sweetie?”

Finally, as the waiting seemed to grow excruciatingly long, the machine beeped and Izabel could see how big Walden had become.

On his back appeared a word and, right below that, his weight in pounds….
113112112111111113.title: Full month of indulgence…

choices: Wake him up for dinner, he need to stretch that belly if he wants to be a man
Let him recover for the night and try again the same the following morning
Why wait? Feed him as he sleeps. This way he would surely grow bigger
let him recover for all the time he need…meanwhile something else could happen
1131121121111111132.content:
Izabel stood silent as she read the result of the scale.

‘Five hundred pounds! He’s at Five Hundred Pounds of weight! This is amazing!’

The witch was too schocked to say anything for a few moment then, as she recovered herself she looked at her precious Walden, seeing how tired he was getting just by standing there and quickly helped him off, as soon as the results vanished from view.

“Here, Walden dear. Time for you breakfast. Wasn’t that hard, was it?”

“Y-Yeah…So…how am I doing?”

As Izabel walked beside one of the fattest piglets she had ever had in her house she couldn’t refrain from hug him and feel his body fat under her fingers. She was so mesmerized by his size that she was barely able to answer him back.

“Mmh? Oh! Yes. You’re getting pretty healthy, my dear Walden. I swear, a few more months like this and you will probably the healthier man around, although there is no such a limit when health is concerned.

Now, come…I’ve promised you Breakfast and that is what you will receive.”

A few minutes later, the humongous form of Walden, although tired from the short walk, sat comfortably on his new throne as, right in front of him, there was an entire table of breakfast foods awaiting him.

Licking his lips, Walden simply went at it, letting his starving middle to all the thinking as he began to take large, greedy mouthful out of whatever was in front of him. Not even for a minute he seemed to notice that the food he was so eagerly eating seemed different than usual. Izabel watched him proudly as he began gorging on the magical food she had summoned, pancakes drenched in maple syrup and butter, as wide as a large platter. Waffles so big to be almost overfilling the large plates they were in and so high in height that Walden had to take them one by one. Fried strips of bacon that were only nominally labeled as Bacon, being per size more like slabs of meat.

Walden mowed through them all as if an insatiable beast had woken up in his stomach, gulping down frenetically all that food as fast as he could. Still, at his size, it wasn’t easy to keep going like that for long periods of time and so, after almost an hour of such an intensity he began to slow down. It wasn’t that he wasn’t feeling hungry anymore. It simply was that he couldn’t muster the energies to keep his arms raised.

Izabel noticed that and swiftly moved beside Walden, while using her magic to sooth him and calm him.

“Dear, dear…rest up a bit, let Izabel help you. No need to worry about anything…”

As she said that, she used a quick spell to keep Walden in a dozing state as she began to lift by magic the food from the table. One by one, each item of food began to levitate from the table moving seemingly by itself, soon they were all I mid-air, forming a column that marched directly toward Walden lips. The guy simply had to open his mouth and take a bite of whatever arrived in front of him. Soon enough he watched as massive muffins and large scones appeared seemingly out of nowhere and moved closer to his lips. He never thought about asking Izabel what was happening, he simply ate them by taking big bites out of them.

Morsel after morsel, the food began to change its origin, passing from breakfast food to junk food snacks. Even though he saw that waffles and pancakes were substituted with burgers and cakes, Walden didn’t raise a single huff, he simply sat on his throne, completely relaxed against the back of it, chewing up whatever came to him.

Izabel, standing beside him as she kept pouring her magic onto him smiled widely at the scene. Her dear piglet was so engrossed in his food that not even the fact that entire cakes were being shoveled down his throat unfazed him. She watched like a hawk as his belly grew more and more bloated and full, waiting giddily for the moment when it would reach its capacity and then magically become empty again, as the food was stored as fat on his already wide body. Still, even though this process repeated itself several times, at some point she had to stop, since her energies were almost depleted.

The food soon began to sit immobile on the tables and Walden began to rise from his placid state, realizing that no more food as coming. Yet, he still felt somewhat famished but his laziness, and the fact that he barely had energies to waddle nowadays, forced him to slightly turn his head toward the his host.

“H-Hey…Izabel…I’m…feeling…so tired…and yet…I’m still hungry. C-Could you…uhrm…feed me…a bit..more?”

The witch, even though felt tired from consuming so much of her magic, turned to him looking astonished at his request, but just for a fleeting moment. After that she smiled once more as she seated beside him, taking a spoonful of a large vanilla sheet cake that stood still on the table.

“O-Of course, Walden Dear….here, let me help you quench you hunger.
You need to eat as much as you can, as often as you can manage…you’re still a growing boy, aren’t you?”

As she brought spoonful after spoonful between his lips, Walden felt himself for a part embarrassed, but also happy about that. He opened his mouth wide, each time she brought him more food to eat and did a quick work of it so to be ready for the next.

“Of course…*munch*….Izabel. I’ll…*gulp*…do all I can to…*munch*….have as much…as I can take.

As you said…I need to…grow healthier…”

Time flew by, it barely seemed possible to Izabel but, Walden Breakfast lasted throughout all morning, became lunch and finally it stopped as they were now in the afternoon. Walden had kept eating all the time, clearing out countless dishes and portions, until he could now hold no more.

Stuffed beyond any limit he felt himself completely full. Not a single inch of space in his humongous gut free to accept anymore.
And yet, Izabel was there, a last spoonful of chocolate pudding ready to be given to him.

“I…I don’t know…*urp!*…Izabel…I…I feel…so full…so…bloated. I..I can’t…”

The witch knew he had surpassed all of her expectations, she knew he had to be so completely full that he was going to need a very long rest before being able to eat some more…and yet, it was a shame that her last mouthful of pudding would be wasted, when it could be so easily cleaned out from her growing piglet.

“Oh, come on Walden. I’m sure you could fit this in…Is just a simple spoonful of pudding. A small, inconsistent, small amount of it. Are you sure you can’t? It would be such a shame if I’ve got to throw it away…”

Walden was now quivering. From one side he wanted, no. He needed to please Izabel…But on the other side he was so painfully stuffed that even in his breathing he was careful to not overtax his burdened gut.

And yet, it was so tantalizing, he could feel the aroma coming from that spoonful, as Izabel was moving right under his nose, he felt himself become greedy. He wanted that last spoonful; he was sure that that was going to taste like heaven itself…and yet he was already in such pain.

In the end, he opened carefully his mouth and accepted that last mouthful. He kept it between his lips, trying his best to let it trickle down his throat as slowly as possible. And when it was done, he simply let out a massive belch, which sounded more like a roar, as his body fatigued to digest all the food it was crammed in his over-bloated middle. Without a word, Walden simply collapsed, falling like a log in the realms of dreams. Without even realizing that, thanks to that last bite, all his clothes ripped from his body, sending a shower of buttons everywhere and leaving his naked form to crash against the table.

Izabel grinned as she covered herself from the buttons fying around her, she simply touched Walden cheek and kissed it softly, wishing him a good sleep and wondering if she should wake him up at dinner time, or if it was best to let him wake up on his own…
1131121121111111132.title: Hugely fluffy bunny

choices: Focus on the two of them…while waiting for Walden to wake
Focus only on Alan, and call a friend to help with Kandi
Focus only on Kandi, and call a friend to help with Alan
Call a witch friend to help, regardless of where the focus should be
11311211211111111324.content:
It had passed already a day since Walden had fall in his food coma, sleeping out the massive meal he had managed to be fed with. And yet, Izabel was growing restless. One day without Walden around seemed to be wasted in her eyes. But se couldn’t force more food on him even if she wished, the guy had been stuffed so completely that nothing could be pushed in, not even by force. She had spent most of the morning by standing at the doorframe, watching the massive form of the guy as he slept away the day. If before he was five hundred pounds, with all the food he had consumed the day before he for sure was going to grow heavier by another fifty, at least.

As he slept, the witch moved closer and began to enjoy the sensation of playing with his fattened form, hugging his over-engorged body, feeling the huge fat gut under her touch was something that immediately cheered her up.

Yet, as she touched and checked how big he was, she mentally imagined him as if ready to become her meal. She could have him as a Thanksgiving turkey, fattened up as he was and yet stuffed with her own special stuffing. Or maybe he could be better if served as a dessert? His body enclosed inside the structure of a very large cake; his entire form coated in sugary goodness.
As she was losing herself in these dreams she never realized she had actually climbed on him and ad started using him as a mattress.

When she realized it she let out a chuckle, observing that even if used as a bed the fattened form of Walden could be useful. Dilly dallying the day away, she lay there, anxiously waiting for him to start to wake up but, before that could happen, something interrupted the quiet of the house.

Izabel, still laying on Walden’s belly, turned around as a sound she knew well sounded around. Standing form her man-made mattress she realized that someone had just knocked on her door.

As Izabel opened the door she saw that at the doorstep there were two person, one was a middle aged man while, at his side, there was a young-ish girl that, although had an impressively curvaceous figure, had a rather vapid expression.

“Hello Miss, sorry to bother you but, we were searching for a dear friend of ours, maybe you have seen him around here?”

“Well..” Izabel replied calmly, looking at the couple with a rather interested look “I may have seen him. Does he have a name?”

“Right!” Said the Alan with a chuckle. “His name is Walden, Walden Schmidt. I’m Alan, his best friend, and the girl at my side is my fianceé, Kandi.”

Izabel smiled more openly to the couple, inviting them in as she explained to them the situation.

“Oh, So you’re Walden friends! Yes, he’s here. He’s keeping me company but, please, come inside. Here, Do you want something to eat? Some tea? Biscuits?”

Alan entered the strange little house of marzipan, looking stupefied realizing that inside seemed way bigger than what appeared from outside. Kandi was right behind him, as she curiously looked at the house itself.
At the mention of food, be that they had been walking throughout all morning, or that the house was smelling so good, both their flat bellies grumbled quite noisily and so the two accepted the offer from the the Witch.

“Well, we wouldn’t like to intrude but, yes. We would very likely glad a cup of tea.”

The witch, closing the door behind them smiled in seeing that now she had a couple more piglets in her net to fatten up. She quickly ushered them to seat on a marzipan couch and moved to the kitchen to bring something tasty for her new guests.

“Oh, Silly me, where are my manners? I’m Izabel, Walden has been here for some days helping me out and keeping me company. Here, dears, have some of these and these…”

As Izabel returned from the kitchen she quickly placed a couple plates near the couple, beside Alan she left a small plate of Oreo’s cookies, with a cup of her sleeping tea. Beside Kandi, instead she left a plate with a slice of vanilla cake and a cup of her hunger tea. Both Alan and Kandi nibbled a bit at the food, at first, but as the taste overrode their taste buds both began eating with much more gusto, quickly leaving the plates empty and licked clean. It was then that Alan felt kinda sluggish and, although receiving a bad look from Kandi, he asked at their hostess if she had a place where he could lay for a bit.

“But of course. A man like you surely need his sleep. Please, follow me.
As for you, Miss, I’ll leave you here the rest of the cake here, should you want a little bit more, as I show the guest room to him.”

Kandi, left alone with the cake, drank all of her cup of tea feeling quite out of place and yet, as she finished her drink she began feeling the need to have more of that cake. She knew that it surely wasn’t good for her figure but, it had tasted so good. And she was feeling so hungry. Before she could reach a decision, she felt Izabel touch on her shoulders and, strangely enough began to feel more at ease, more relaxed.

“There, no need to be tense. And, Miss Kandi, you can have more of the cake. It’s a…a special recipe. There are only empty calories in there, and being empty calories they won’t have any impact on your figure.”

As Izabel touched the girl she saw that she wasn’t the sharper knife in the drawer, and so began to influence her even more, letting her believe that, no matter what happened, she wouldn’t have gained any extra poundage. Kandi, on her side, felt ever so hungry and with the kind woman confirmation felt herself excused from going at it with the sweet. So she quickly cut a rather large slice of the cake and began eating it in earnest.

As she cleared her second slice, she saw Izabel coming toward her with a couple more platters of sweets. On a tray there were donuts, and she quickly grabbed a pair of them, while on another there were various pastries. Taking handfuls from both trays, plus adding some more cake to the mix, Kandi soon found herself filling and emptying her plate several times. After almost half an hour, she felt herself full and began to retreat from the sweets, but then Miss Izabel would offer her some more tea, and after drinking it the her hunger seemed to only grow stronger and stronger.

The poor girl was too dim-witted to realize what the issue was and so as Izabe kept on chatting her, and refilling her plate, Kandi kept on eating whatever was placed under her nose.

Soon enough, under the pleased stare of Izabel, Kandi’s middle began to slightly grow larger, as it bega pushing up her t-shirt, and her pants down. Still, the witch kept on bringing more to this wonderful young lady, raising her hunger each and every time she seemed to slow down in her consumption.

As soon as Kandi reached her limit, The witch stopped, letting the poor bloated girl to fall on the couch asleep, her round taut belly sticking out as her jeans button popped away due to how bloated and full her belly was. As she slept, caressing contently her full stomach, Izabel went into the bedroom and checked first on Walden, noticing he was still sleeping away his massive meals. Then she moved to the other guestroom, where she saw Alan sleeping on a bed, as he ate while sleeping handfuls of chocolates that seemed to fall from the ceiling.

Izabel, had to choose where her focus was going to be, ow hat Walden was out of commission.

Both candidates were promising but, she wasn’t sure she was going to be able to manage three piglets on her own, at once. At lease if the three didn’t know of each other she could follow them all without an issue but, since they were three friends she was afraid one could say something more to the other two and everything she had worked o hard for would go in ruin.

As she get closer to the sleeping form of Alan, she quickly rubbed his inflating belly, as it was getting filled with chocolate, and thought long and hard on what to do.
11311211211111111324.title: Recovering time for Walden…Hello new guests!

choices: She had to bring more food for the two growing piggies!
The couch on which Kandi was, had started to creak ominously
Alan’s chair began creaking, ready to collapse!
She saw Walden slowly lumbering toward them!
113112112111111113244.content:
Izabel had to sadly admit that she couldn’t manage the three piglets all on her own. Sadly, since she liked the personal touch in these matters, alas there was nothing she could do. Quickly she casted a spell and requested some support to her coven. In less than three hours another witch appeared at her doorstep, this time she was an elderly one, widely known within the coven for her expertise in fattening piglets up.

Izabel wet and greeted her, welcoming her in her house.

“Hi Grandma Ogg, it’s a pleasure to finally meet you in person.”

The elderly witch was rather short and wide but that only added to her matronly figure, still she turned toward Izabel and smiled at her with a gentle smile.

“Nice meeting you, too. Now, where are the piglets you wish for me to be taking care of?”

Swiftly Izabel showed her the three guests and quickly made her aware of her preference for Walden, when she noticed that Granny Ogg seemed to be showing quite an interest in HER Walden.

“I see…Such a good work with this one. How did you say he was called?”

“He’s called Walden. He’s been my focus from the beginning, then the other two, Alan and Kandi, showed up. I would like some help to deal with them.”

The elderly smiled a toothy grin and rubbed her hands I anticipation.

“Don’t worry, deary, let Granny Ogg take care of them.”

As Izabel returned to check on Walden, the other witch began to check on the other two piglests which needed her assistance. Quickly she found Alan, still asleep on his bed. She stood there for a moment, admiring the ingenious ways of her fellow witch.

‘Humph…Never thought about that. Having chocolate chips falling from the ceiling to entice the sleeper to eat as he keeps on napping. Got to have to remember that.’

Still, she knew there was room for improvement. She quickly circled around the bed where Alan was sleeping until she saw something that could become useful in advancing her own scheme. Quickly she placed her hands on the bed frame, made of Oreo’s cookies, and began to infuse it with her own magic. In moments, a couple of arms erupted from the side of the bed, these arms soon began to massage soothingly the growing belly of Alan, as he kept sleeping through his eating. Still not done, Granny Ogg, directed her focus on the guy himself and, as soon as she was in his mind, she began to lay down her own directives for him to follow.

‘Listen closely to my voice, Alan. You will do what I will tell you.

You will not see any changes within your figure. You will be hungry and will do all you can to sate your hunger.

You will like to see Kandi as she grows, even though for you she will not be fatter. Just more beautiful.

You will never use the word fat while you’re here in this house. Only Healthy or growing up.

You trust Izabel as owner of the place, and Granny Ogg as if she was an old friend of yours.

All these instructions you won’t remember them consciously but you will follow them anyway…’

As the elderly kept repeating her instruction, Alan’s mind began to absorb them, making them as if they were his own belief. Something he had know since he was a little kid.
As soon as Granny Ogg was convinced it was enough she moved again near Alan and softly woke him up.

“Wake up young man. C’mon, you don’t want to pass all day long in bed, do you?”

Slowly, Alan woke up, as he did so the chocolates falling from the ceiling simply vanished into thin air, leaving him able to groggily sit on the bed, wondering where he was. As he looked around he remembered about the house of marzipan found in the middle of the woods and recollected how he had ended sleeping into that bed.

“Man…This is comfy. I shal remember to ask Lady Izabel where she purchased this bed before I leave. Uh?”

As he turned around he saw the old woman near his bedside and, although he couldn’t place her name, he seemed to recollect of having met her already. Looking at her for a moment he decided that he could trust her, she seemed just your ordinary granny, so no ham could come from her.

“Er…Hi”

“Good Morning, Young man. I’m Granny Ogg, I’m Izabel Grandma. I had just come today for a visit when she told me she could use a hand with her guest.

You must be Alan, right?”

“Yeah...That’s me. Er..did we met already? I seems to recognize you from somewhere…”

“I found it to hard to believe. Still, could be. I’ve worked as a nanny for a long time before retiring…anyway, I wanted to let you know that sleeping late isn’t good on you if you go about it on an empty stomach.

So, Breakfast will be ready in a few in the main room.
Well…see you there, I’ll just go and wake up your friend too.”

As Alan woke up properly, Grany Ogg moved back t the main room where the girl was still sleeping on the couch. From her tighter clothes, she could see that Izabel had already begun fattening her up and yet, the clothes on her weren’t that much tighter. The witch cackled softly as she thought that things were going to change. Quickly she casted a spell on the girl, obscuring her vision and replacing what she saw with what the witch wanted her to see.

She made it so that Kandi would see any change related to her own body, as if she was just growing more and more voluptuous, and for changes to the bodies of Alan and Walden she would simply ignore them, as if there were no changes at all.

Then, feeling mischievous, Granny Ogg placed a desire in Kandi to see Alan grow ‘Healtier’.

“Yes…this is going to be good.”

As she woke up also Kandi, chatting a bit with her, she saw Alan coming into the room and then could appreciate how Izabel had worked on him. Even though she had seemed mostly preoccupied with Walden, still she had already managed to plump up a bit both her other guests. Alan, for example, was walking toward the couch with a strange gait in his stride. His plumped-up belly and overall body forced him to walk slower than what he was used to but it wasn’t yet so noticeable that he could just adjust himself.
Kandi, instead was now sitting on the couch, looking strangely at Alan, and yet her hands caressed her own soft belly pouch as he approached them.

“Alan, Kandi, Izabel told me you were searching for a friend of yours, Walden, correct?”

Kandi nodded while Alan answered back as he took a seat on a nearby plushy chair.

“Yes, Ma’am. Yet, We haven’t seen him around…”

The elderly woman simply smiled at that.

“Well of course you haven’t. Walden and Izabel are outside, in the woods.

Still, they will be back later, so in the meantime you would like some breakfast. You young people forgets about the proper basis of a good breakfast.”

As she said that she began bringing forth plates of food for her two piglets to consume. Alan found himself suddenly surrounded by salad bowls filled with milk and cereals and several bottles of milkshake. Kandi, instead saw in front of her plates with pancaked smothered in butter and enough fried bacon strips to fill up a large platter.

The both of them smiled a bit at the old woman and the spread of food she had prepared but, soon enough, both of them were digging in as f ravenous. Alan Lifted each bowl and began taking huge gulps of the rich milk and sugary cereals, while Kandi instead brought forkful after forkful of pancakes and bacon between her lips, reveling I the taste.

Without their knowledge, though, Granny Ogg was casting a simple spell on the food, making so that it was way more calorific and less filling. As she did she just sat back and joyed the show.

As Alan kept cleaning out bowls of milk his clothes began to get tighter, his shirt began to rip at the seams as he continued to stuff his mouth. His pants too, were straining trying valiantly to contain his growing body. And it was visibly growing bigger and wider.
Already, after fifteen minutes, his moobs had grown exponentially, starting to appear as small A cups, as the rest of his body seemingly inflated with fat. His butt began soon to rip to shred his pants, starting to fill up the chair he was in. His belly then, as it grew, began to push up his shirt, soon making it appear more like a makeshift bra.

Kandi, didn’t fare too well either.
As she consumed pounds upon pounds of fried bacon and fluffy pancakes her body began rounding up, growing out of her tight tube tank top and of her short jeans. Constantly she found herself using one hand to try and move a bit more comfortably her top, but to no avail. As was her ability to stop eating. The girl felt as if a hole had opened into her stomach and she wasn’t able to fill it. Still, as she kept eating, she smiled happily within herself for she was seeing as a result of her overindulgence, that only her already big breasts were growing. When, in fact, it her entire form that was ballooning up.

As Kandi slowly began to occupy more space on the couch, Granny Ogg realized a great flaw in her plan…

1131121121111111132441.content:
As the two piglets kept eating, completely stricken with their own gluttony, Granny Ogg realized that something was going to go wrong right from the start! Both Alan and Kandi were going so fast at their food that the feast she had brought them was already dwindling into nothing.

With a sudden sprint, she quickly left the two gorging piglets and went back to the kitchen where she began to summon more and more food, enhancing it to be as fattening as it could be, and yet not so filling as it should be. Seeing as her two piglets were completely immersed into their eating she didn’t waste time in preparing a trolley, she simply used her magic to levitate the food and leaving it right beside the two gorging piglets. Both Alan and Kandi were fully immersed in the food around them.

Alan knew that with all that food he was supposed to be feeling full but, he wasn’t so he kept eating, without any notice of his body widening right in the chair he was in. His clothes soon began to grow tighter on him, his pants ripping at the sides and his shirt rising more and more, as his belly and his hisp and legs, began to ooze out of his clothes with fat. Still, as focused as he was, he couldn’t stop from stealing glances toward Kandi, as he saw her growing healthier and healthier, becoming more than beautiful in his eyes.

Kandi, instead, was feeling ravenous, she didn’t seem to care what she was eating, it was enough that she could bring more and more morsel in between her lips. And yet, she could see her body growing out from all the food she was consuming. At first she had been afraid she was going to get fat from it but, as she ate more of it, she realized she was just growing more curvaceous and voluptuous. In truth she was just growing fatter and fatter, her whole body was plumpening up, growing wider and heavier, and although her breast had begun to take the lion share of the growth, as of late it seemed to be her belly that was growing rounder and fatter.

Her clothes were ripping in multiple places, with her pants almost destroyed and her shirt ripped right in the middle, leaving her growing buddha belly right on view. Yet, as the Granny Ogg brought more and more food, the two kept eating and swallowing as if they hadn’t any other care in the world surrounding them.

As hours passed, even though the two of them felt still starving, the constant eating and their growing was taking the toll on their stamina. Alan was now forced to almost face dive in his plates, since he found extremely tiring to move or bend his arms, he didn’t see any changes in them but in reality all of his limbs were growing so big and wide to rival in size tree trunks. So, unable to easily grab plates, he simply began to dive directly with his face into the plate, much to the delight of Kandi which was finding weirdly fascinating to see Alan growing bigger and bigger.

In her case, instead, she was feeling extremely tired. And yet the hunger within herself went on unabated. Soon she found herself whimpering since as big as she had grown, filling the couch where she was seated almost completely by herself, she realized pretty soon she could reach the table anymore.

113112112111111113244124131.content:
As Izabel pushed yet another pastry in Walden overworking mouth, something happened that left the witch surprised in a nice kind of way. The guy was in his eating trance, gorging on food without a care in the world for how his body changed and grew heavier, stuffing himself as much and as fast as he could.

Yet, the throne like chair he was seated on, after having served dutifully for all that time, simply couldn’t resist anymore.

Under the witch shocked eyes, the chair simply crumbled in pieces, leaving Walden to fall down with a loud thud against the floor, actually managing to crack it with his own weight. As Walden fell and landed, his entire form jiggled and wobbled as crazy, and yet the guy didn’t seem to be fazed a bit by that.

Although having to move his arms at a different, more tiring angle, he kept shoveling armful of treats and sweets into his maw. Izabel, instead was watching the scene entranced by the wobbling curves of Walden, as they kept jiggling for quite some time after he crashed on the floor. As soon as she managed to return in herself, she quickly casted a spell, shortening the table, letting the food on top of it to be easily accessible once more to the gorging behemoth of a man.

Walden hadn’t actually felt a thing, he had briefly felt like he wasn’t seating on anything, but as he felt, right after, to be once more against a solid surface he simply let that thought to float away, putting again in first place the need to sate himself. And yet, he felt himself constantly hungry. No matter how much he had already eaten or how much still he was going to eat, he needed to feel sated once more.

Izabel though was of a different opinion. She was enjoying too much watching Walden growing form as it rapidly digested all he was eating, converting it into fat, causing his body to grow bigger and wider, spreading out in all directions. And yet, she knew she had to stop him before he would fall back into a food coma again.

As soon as Izabel noticed that Walden was on the verge of passing from his eating trance to the food coma, she immediately halted him and then spent some of her energies to stabilize his condition. Infusing him with her magic she quickly made him return to consciousness, while also making him less aware of how his body had changed.

Walden, felt suddenly weird. For a moment he felt like he was on the verge of bursting, so full he had felt, the moment later, he was feeling okay, sated but not full. Still as he tried to rise on his own he saw that he wasn’t able and had to request Izabel assistance, once again.

“I’m…sorry…Izabel… Have…not…managed…yet…to…grow…stronger…”

Izabel, smiled at her Walden warmly as she hugged one of his arms, enjoying the soft feeling she got from his fattened body.

“Don’t worry, Walden dear…you just need to grow some more. As any man should do…”

As she helped him return to the kitchen to sit at the table, she still enjoyed his massively fattened frame. As she heped him she stared longingly at his body, noticing how massive he had become under her care, wondering how long still she could goad him to move around instead of settling down somewhere.

His apron like gut, now stuffed of food, still it hangs so low that it even reached his kneecaps, and she wondered where it would arrive as soon as the stomach deflated. Then his legs, massive trunk like, wobbling, pillars of fat, which he barely had the strength to move one at the time.

Izabel, moved her stare toward his upper torso, admiring how large his moobs were getting. They had almost lost any formal shape, appearing more like wobbling sacks of jelly like flesh, pendulous over the side of his body and partially held up by his topmost belly rolls.

And what could she say about his arms? More like hams as bug and juicy as they were, jiggling madly at his tiniest movement.

As Izabel finally moved him toward a massive couch like seat in the kitchen, leaving him to seat in there as she moved to cook and prepare some new tasty treats for him, she could only dream of how big she could make him…

Walden, instead, tired as if he had just been running through several marathons, could only stare at Izabel pleasant body curves, wondering once more how a guy like him could be so lucky to have a girl like her in his life. And yet, it was unnerving on him that he couldn’t help and support her as she constantly did for him. It was a baffling thought, but one he wanted to overcome by growing as healthy as he could, knowing that once he had grown enough, he could finally give back all the love she had given him.

So, although he wasn’t actually hungry, although he had just finished eating, even though he wasn’t sure of it, he slowly began to move his huge ham like arm toward a single cupcake that was laying there next to him. Slowly and tiredly, Walden managed to grab it and to place it whole in his mouth, as he then proceeded to chew on it and swallow it.

As he did so, Izabel noticed that he seemed to have back his appetite, although it shouldn’t have been possible, and so decided to help him along, wishing to see what would happen. Quickly she fired a spell toward the table, making so that a countless deluge of treat appeared out of nowhere.

Walden, noticing that a large amount of food had gone unnoticed at first, quickly tried to squirm his way there, but failed. The witch, once more, helped him along.

‘If Walden wants to have more, why should I thwart his plan?’

Launching anther spell she animated the treats, making them move on their own toward Walden, walking toward their own ends inside of his mouth. The guy, seeing as the sweets moved o their own was shocked at first but, as his carving for food overcame him he simply started to laid back, with his maw open, gulping down treats after treats, as they entered his mouth.

‘If I manage to grow…I will be able to help izabel…and yet, this food is so good…so delicious…how does she make it so tasty, I’ll never know but…it’s good and healthy…it’s…perfect.’

“More…I…need…more…”
