1131121121111111132441241313.content:
Granny Ogg had heard, suddenly a commotion coming from the other room but, spying a little she found out that the massive mountainous man that Izabel had took as her pet had simply crushed his chair under his own weight. Focusing once more on her little friends she cackled a bit knowing that now both of them were going to grow massively, under her care. First, though, she had to led them both to their new homes.
After all, animals were supposed to live outdoors.

As she moved closer, she saw that both Kandi and Alan had finally fallen asleep. Kandi, her humongous forms, although they had deflated a bit, still managed to occupy almost a quarter of the room. Alan, instead had grown even rounder, having become an almost perfect sphere.

Laughing a bit within herself, she began to take the appropriate actions to take care of Kandi and Alan in the proper way.


When Kandi woke up she felt startlingly colder than before.

Groggily she looked around but she realized that she didn’t know where she was. Turning her head, she noticed that she was in some kind of massive stall, wooden palisade creeping up behind and at her sides, closing her view of her surrounding but for what was in front of her. Looking in that direction she saw the exterior of the gingerbread house and swiftly realized that, somehow, someone had managed to move her outside.

In a burst of rage, she tried to move, to walk away from there but, suddenly recalled of the vivid nightmare she had, about her transformation, about the pleasure she felt as she saw herself mutate into some kind of freaking monster.

As she looked down, her manic smile seemed to reappear on her face, for she saw that she still seemed some kind of cowgirl hybrid. Tentatively, she moved her massive arms to touch one of her breast and, after barely touching that she felt herself filling up with pleasure.

So much so that she couldn’t resist from crying out loud.

“Mooo!”

It took her a few moments, as she recovered from the intense pleasure, to realize that she had just mooed. Afraid, she tried to speak, to call for help and, luckily for her, she distinctively heard her own voice, although it was a bit deeper than what she remembered.

“Hello? Please, I need Help! I…I’ve changed into something… I’ve… Anyone, please!”

“Why, hello dear. Seems to me you’ve woken up from your nap…”

From behind the corner outside the stall, emerged the figure of the old Granny Ogg, she moved closer to the stall, resting her arms on the wooden door trapping the humongous Kandi inside.

“Y-You? What…what happened…last I remember is… I was inside, you were doing something to me…to my coat… Skin. To my skin! What’s going on?”

“Now now, girl, take it easy. Yes, I’ve changed you.

But can you honestly tell me you would prefer returning like you were? Look at you, you’ve got breasts so big and sensitive that barely touching them makes you squeal…what would happen if someone would squeeze them?

True, you may have a bit of a belly, but, think at all the delicacies you can now enjoy without feeling guilty.

You should thank me, especially after Alan told me he loved you like this…but I understand… I can change you back if…”

Kandi, although agreeing for the most part with the old witch, still had wanted to return normal until, at least, she heard the old woman say something about her Alan.

“Wh-What did you say? Alan…likes me more…this way?”

“That’s what I’m trying to tell you, girl. Still…I’ll let you think a bit more about it. If you truly want to return normal, we’ll se what we can do.”

As she said that, Granny Ogg walked away, leaving Kandi to think on what she really wanted.

The old woman, though, had no intention of losing such a beautiful catch. If Kandi would have asked to return to normal, she had simply to force feed her until she was big enough to satisfy the coven. Otherwise, if she was willing to stay as she was, she could easily trick her into growing even bigger.

As she walked away, she soon reached a large enclosure, within it she saw that also Alan seemed to be starting to wake up. As she moved closer to his stall, she could see exactly how big the once man, and now pig, had grown under her care.

Now that he had had time to digest all the food he had eaten, Alan had lost his spherical form, although he still was so big and fat that he could barely touch the ground with his feet, as he was sleeping belly down. And although his clothes had all ripped off, except for his undies, he literally seemed a massive piggy fattened up for slaughter.

Alan woke up with a groan.

He was feeling strangely tired and uncomfortable, and cold.

As he looked at his surroundings, he noticed immediately that he was inside some kind of enclosure, outside and behind the gingerbread house. And although he was worried on the reasons for him to be there, what got him really worried was that there seemed to be not even a scrap of food in his vicinity.

Slowly, he tried to stand up on his legs but, something seemed to be pushing him down and so, feeling too tired to keep trying he simply began to move, albeit slowly, on all fours, using both his arms and legs to drag himself around. It was then that he gave a look at himself and remained confused for he couldn’t see anything wrong with himself.

Yet, his mind was currently focused on ne thing and one thing only.
Food.

“Hello? Mistress Ogg?”

“Oh, hello dear. How are you feeling?”

Just as Alan called, so the old woman seemed to appear on the other side of the enclosure he was in. Still, as his mind was trying to avoid certain arguments, he managed to answer briefly asking simply for something to eat.

The old woman cackled a bit as she snapped her fingers and the through to which Alan had gotten used to, appeared out of thin air, right in front of his face. The massive man then could do nothing more than drag himself on the ground, moving as fast as he could toward the source of food that he felt he was so much in need to have.

Luckily for him, the massive through had appeared almost beside him and so he quickly placed his head into the thing. One thing that seemed to surprise him was that he could see no food into the through, there was only this strange goop. Still, as hungry as he was, he grabbed the sides of the metal thing and buried his own head in, scarfing down as much as he could of the strange substance.

As he chewed and swallowed, he moaned in delight since that goop tasted amazing to him.

Granny Ogg smiled deeply seeing how hungry Alan was, and she couldn’t resist as she squeezed a bit at some of his massive ass cheeks, pushed as they were into the air. As she grabbed all that delicious fat she could only imagine how delicious he was going to be as soon as he was ready.

“Alan?”

“Yesh…*gruff* Mishtressh Ogg?”

“Would you like to see how Kandi is doing?”

Alan stopped munching suddenly.

He was still hungry and yet, as he thought about Kandi, since last he had seen her was while she was ballooning and growing healthier than ever, he couldn’t think of anything else he wanted more than see how she was doing.

“Is she…is she ok? Has she grown…Healthier?”

“Oh, sure she has, Alan. Come on, let me help you get out…we’re gonna go and see her right away…”

152121211.title: Sam tells Dean

1521212111.content:
Although the Winchester brothers vowed that they would stay in shape in order to counteract the curse, they had difficulties fulfilling that promise. First off Dean was never a picky eater as Sam was so he usually still ate burgers, fries and of course pie. This did not help to fight back against his growing waistline. Sam so was a nitpicker when it came to eating found himself still hungry whenever he finished his meal, making him indulge in eating even more to fill his stomach, the food Dean also ate became even more attractive to Sam as well, with his added girth as well he could really put down food. Added with the curse that had been placed on them by the witch, instead of decreasing their waistline, they only added to it.

Though the brothers seemed to gain their weight differently from each other. Dean's fat mostly settled in his stomach making his gut his biggest feature on his body. When he would move it would slightly jiggle as he would walk, love handles also began form on him as well due to his increase in girth on his frame. A second chin was beginning to form on his face as well, tough it only showed when he tilted his head down, for now at least. Sam, on the other hand, his weight seemed to almost distribute evenly on his frame and since he was taller than Dean it didn't like he gained as much as Dean. But he was embarrassed how his chest seemed to be the part of his body that was growing the fastest. His pectorals had melted into flab and even began to shake whenever he would walk, which he hated deeply. He was constantly beating himself up on how he was always letting himself give into temptation. Dean, on the other hand, didn't seem bothered by it at all.

Sam was examining his physique yet again in the motel's bathroom mirror, he took off his shirt to survey the damage yet again, even when he didn't eat he felt like he was getting bigger. As he was going through the daily routine of touching his moobs to make sure they were real, his stomach gave a pang of hunger, he eyeballed the bag of unopened Doritos that were left on the sink counter, he suspected they were Dean's and he left them there when he was shaving or something Sam tried to resist it but his hunger overtook him and he opened the bag taking a bite of the chip, it tasted delightful and he needed to eat another, then another, then pop! Sam heard something pop but then he realized he also felt relief as he looked down he saw that he had popped the button off another pair of pants. This was the last straw for Sam he angrily went to confront Dean.

"Dean!" Sam said angrily.

Dean was still sitting down on the sofa watching tv with a beer in hand. "Yeah Sammy?" he responded with.

"We need to do something about this I'm sick of gaining weight," Sam said still upset but then he blushed remembering he forgot to put his shirt back on revealing to Dean his moobs.

"Well look at these puppies, you might even make the girls envious if you keep going," Dean said jokingly.

"This is serious! We haven't been doing a good job of keeping our weight down. All we have been doing is eating junk and if we keep this up we will be gigantic." Sam said.

"Oh lighten up Sam, We will find a way to curb this curse don't worry you just needed to relax," Dean said with a soft heart.

"Relax?!" Sam said in shock. Flabbergasted by his brother's calm demeanor Sam went over to his bed and pulled out a flat brown cardboard box.

"Ah, Sam... What's that?" Dean asked curiously.

"A scale, I had a feeling you weren't going to take this seriously so I went out and bought one to show you just how much damage this curse has caused us.

152212.content:
The witch giggled to herself, "This is almost too easy." As she muttered a few words under her breath and gestured towards the man eating away at her fencing, she noticed the air around him shimmer a bit, and felt the spell take hold. Satisfied, she turned away from the window and began preparing. This was going to be a special pig, and the witch would have to treat him just right.

"Hey Dean, we really should get going. I don't think we should stay here much longer." Sam whispered to Dean, barely heard over the ravenous chewing coming from his brother. Just as Sam reached out to grab Dean's shoulder, the older man's face seemed to go slack and he moved towards the house, absentmindedly grabbing at candied flowers and bits of chocolate along the way. Sam attempted to grab his brother, but couldn't contend with the almost supernatural strength compelling Dean towards the house. After multiple futile attempts to stop his brother, Sam realized he was out of his depth. Panicking, Sam told his brother "I can't do anything right now. I don't know if you can here me, but i'm going to get help. I'll be back soon." Tearing up a bit, Sam let go of his brother and walked away into the fog.

As Sam's flashlight faded into the dark, the front door opened in front of Dean. Before him stood a beautiful woman, curvy in all the right places and practically spilling out of her top. "I'm glad you enjoyed the outside of my house, Dean. There's plenty more for you waiting inside. I know it takes quite a bit to satisfy a man's appetite." Dean seemed to recover a bit from the stupor, and turned up his winning smile at the woman. "Well, what's a pretty girl like you doing out in these woods alone? Don't worry, I'm gonna keep you safe". As Dean walked up the steps to the house and crossed the threshold, an odd draining feeling trickled from his head on down his spine. "That's weird... what was i doing here again?" The witch caressed the hunter's shoulders. "You came to pay me a visit, sweetie. And you promised you'd bring your appetite; i hope you won't let me down." Dean's smile perked up again. "Trust me, I never let a lady down". The hunter shed his jacket on the floor and stumbled further into the house. The witch paused for a moment, reaching out and swirling the fog with one hand. "Don't fret, Sammy. Soon you'll forget all about your big brother." She smiled to herself, and followed the pig inside.

There wasn't anything that answered, but the front door creaking ajar. "They must've left it unlocked...", thought Zack already stepping inside. His past experiences told him that this is a bad idea. What he's doing is called something.

"Walking inside someone's home is breaking and entering, Zach!" He remembered Cody barking at him. Yet, when he remembered, he was already a few good feet inside. Sweet smells of deliciously baked confectionaries filled his nose, giving a positive sense of delight. Zach set his skateboard down and aimed his sights for the table made out of cookie dough. Zack and Cody took a wandering detour in the park on their way home from school, but quickly got lost in a thick forest of trees. Cody had the great idea of leaving behind the crumbs of his lunch to mark their path as they searched for an exit, but after a few looping turns, the twins realized that birds had been eating the crumbs all along. Becoming frantic, Cody grabs Zack by the wrist to make sure they kept together, and Zack began tugging Cody along towards a mysteriously sweet aroma. "Maybe it's the churro cart we passed near the entrance to the park!" Zack shouted excitedly. "Maybe at least something good will come of this escapade!"
         "Always thinking about food, aren't you, Zack!" Cody breathed, exasperated with his brother's calm state of mind in this worrying predicament. "Although...maybe you're right!" Cody soon picked up the sweet scent himself. As the boys stumbled through thickets and shrubs, they could see a house among the trees. Upon closer inspection, they realized that the house was made of sweet treats and candies galore!
         Zack wasted no time munching on the chocolate window shutters he saw, while Cody was hesitant at first. It was a little too mysterious for his liking, but Zack managed to mumble through a mouthful of goodies, "Cody! Mmph--this stuff is--mff--seriously so good! Oh god you've gotta---hmmphffumfffmrrph--try this stuff!" Zack then swallowed and let out a small belch. Zack's enthusiasm was enough to convince even Cody that it was okay to eat the treats.
         Only a few bites into their sugary snacks, the door of the house opened and the boys turned to see
152313.title: Zack and Cody

1523131.content:
Only a few bites into their sugary snacks, the door of the house opened and the boys turned to see a kind, gentle-looking old lady. She walked with a cane, as her back seemed to be crooked, and she wore a tiny little pair of glasses through which she squinted to view the twins properly.
         "Oh! Hello there, youngsters," a frail voice croaked. "You seem to be enjoying my house quite a bit!" She gave a quiet chuckle while gesturing to the bite marks next to her windows.
         "S-sorry, ma'am! With a house like this, made of candies and all, we didn't think that anyone lived here!" Cody apologized profusely.
         "Oh, not to worry, dears. I would tell you to help yourselves, but why don't you come inside for a proper meal instead? I wouldn't want these walls of mine to fall in on me in the night! You both look famished. Please, I insist!" The old woman ushered the boys into the house before Cody had a chance to protest any stranger-dangers. When Zack saw the spread laid out on the woman's kitchen table, his jaw just about dropped to the floor and he began salivating like crazy.
         "Cody, don't worry about it! She's just a nice lady offering us a meal while we're lost out here. We're lucky anyone found us at all! It's getting late and we might have never found our way out in the dark. She can help us."
         "Oh yes, you poor dears. How about you spend the night here, and be on your way in the light of day?" the woman suggested gently. "It really is no trouble at all. I don't get much company out here." Cody hesitantly agreed to spend the night, but he told Zack that he didn't trust this woman completely. They needed to be careful and protect each other.
1523131.title: A Kind Old Woman

choices: The boys decide to stay a few more days
Cody wakes up in the middle of the night
15231311.content:
"Well, now that that's all squared away," the woman began, "why don't you boys dig right in. It's about dinnertime now!" Hungry after wandering for so long in the forest, the boys started ravenously on the feast laid before them. Zack first reached for a homemade Hawaiian pizza, while Cody opted for a freshly cooked plate of chicken. The instant the food touched their tongues, both boys' faces lit up with delight.
         "This is delicious!" Zack exclaimed through a mouthful of crust.
         "Seriously top-notch cooking here, ma'am!" Cody agreed.
         The woman smiled and told the boys to eat their fill. "Oh, thank you. You boys are too kind!" she said. "There's plenty for the both of you!" After awhile, the Cody began to slow down as he started to become full. Not long after that, Zack followed suit. Cody had eaten what seemed to be a whole chicken, while Zack had polished off half of his second pizza. They both took big gulps of soda, and before they could take another bite, the woman told them to wait. "You are saving room for dessert, aren't you?" she teased, before clearing away the table and loading it back up with cookies, brownies, cakes, doughnuts, and more.
         Cody's eyes widened in surprise, while Zack just seemed to feel his hunger return at full force. "This all looks amazing," Zack commented before zoning in on a box of doughnuts.
         "Thank you," was all Cody could manage before digging into the nearest plate of cookies. Cody managed to stuff about one and a half dozen cookies into his mouth before finally stopping and washing it down with a large glass of chocolate milk. Zack finished off his box of doughnuts and started in on the brownies, taking sips of milk to complement the chocolate flavor. Zack eventually slowed down his feast again, though the food was so delicious to him that he did not want to stop. "Don't make yourself sick!" Cody commented, while stifling a burp.
         "UUUURRRRRRP--I would never insult such a delicious meal by getting sick off of it!" Zack retorted as he swallowed the last of his milk. He rested a hand atop the rounded curve of his stuffed belly and declared his satisfaction.
         "You boys ought to run up to bed, now. You don't wanna waste too much daylight in the morning!" the old woman called while searching the cupboards for something. She turned around with an ornately decorated platter in hand just in time to see Zack hoist himself out of his chair with some difficulty caused by the heaviness in his gut. Cody had begun a slow ascent of the staircase into the bedroom while lightly rubbing his gurgling tummy. These boys will do just fine, the woman thought with a smile. She loaded up the platter with desserts and laid a hand on the small of Zack's back to help guide him up the stairs, holding him steady. She tucked the twins into the fluffiest, warmest beds they had ever seen or felt, gave them each a pat on the head, and placed the full platter on the bedside table between them. "If you get a little hungry in the night, feel free to have these little treats as a snack. I'll have breakfast ready in the morning! Goodnight, dears," and with that, she was off down the stairs.
         Cody heard lips smack behind him, and he rolled over to see Zack snacking on another pastry as if he hadn't almost been too full to walk just moments ago. "Just one before bed! This place is great; I wish we could stay forever," Zack sighed, licking frosting off his lips. "Goodnight, Code."
         "Night, Zack," Cody mumbled as his eyes fluttered shut.

Cody's eyes fluttered open as he thought he heard someone laughing downstairs. Curious, and a little fearful of what he might find, he slowly lowered himself out of his bed. He looked over at Zack and saw crumbs all over the bed. It seemed Zack had managed to find some extra room in his stuffed gut for a few more doughnuts over the past few hours, though now he was sleeping soundly and even snoring a bit. Cody grabbed a doughnut for himself, as he felt his belly rumble at the sight of it, before slowly creeping his way towards the stairs. He was sure he could hear someone talking in a low voice down there. He turned a corner at the bottom of the stairs and saw a strange green light emanating from somewhere beyond the door. He slowly pushed it open, and saw the old woman standing near a cauldron filled with a boiling green substance. The woman heard the door creak, and turned to look. She couldn't see very well, but when Cody looked at her, he gasped and fell backwards. The old woman no longer looked kind and gentle...her skin had turned green and her nose was crooked and warty. She was a witch! The witch, not being able to see well, squinted at him and said "Oh, rats. I'm sorry you had to see me like this, young man. I really don't mean you any harm!"
         Cody didn't believe her for a second, and tried to run away, but the witch had cast a spell on him which prevented him from moving. "W-what do you want with us!?" Cody stammered.
         "Why, I'm simply going to care for you and continue to feed you such delicious food! That can't be evil, can it?" the witch tried to deceive Cody, but she could tell by his face that he didn't buy it. "Oh, alright. Then I'm going to eat you up, once you've grown fat enough! Now, since your brother seems to love my food oh so much, you're going to help me cook. You'll both be eating, of course, but you mentioned last night about how you love to cook at your hotel that you live in."
         "I won't help you hurt us! Why would I ever do that!?" Cody exclaimed.
         "Because if you don't do what I say, I'll eat you right now!"

Frankie cheered as she then buried her face into the pie, chomping, gobbling and slurping it down like a pig. When she was done, her face was a mess of pie filling. "So yummy! Do you have anymore?" Frankie asked as she wiped her face and glasses off. "Plenty." The woman smiled as she went to get more food. Soon, Frankie was pigging out on cakes, ice cream sundaes, cookies, pie, candy canes and many other odd, but tasty treats. She was so busy stuffing her face, she didn't notice the older woman smirking evilly as she watched. "Soon, little girl, you'll be just big enough for my dinner." She cackled quietly as she consulted a cookbook with the title "How to Cook Children", namely a dish called "10 year old Girl turkey". Frankie didn't even notice as she shoved 15 large chocolate chip cookies into her mouth, bulging her cheeks as she chewed and then swallowed with a giant, yet slightly difficult, gulp, grinning goofily.

What happened next?
1523221211.title: Decides to enter the house for a bite to eat.

choices: Try to escape after her nap?
Wait until dinner to try and make a break for it?
15232212111.content:
2 hours later...

"BBBBBBUUURRRRRPPPPP!!!! Oof man. I'm full..." Frankie smiled, leaning back in her chair, rubbing her now visible and giant tummy as it bulged under her white t-shirt. Numerous dishes, bowls and other items littered the table from her pig-out. The witch came in and smiled at the now obese Frankie, who wiped her mouth with the back of her hand. "Did you enjoy your snack, little girl?" she asked. "Yeah. It was so awesome." Frankie grinned, licking some leftover frosting from a cake pan before tossing the now clean pan aside and drumming her hands on her gut. Aside from her belly, her face was chubbier, her arms and legs were chunkier, her butt was larger and she had developed some boobs due to her weight gain. "I'm glad." the witch smiled as she eyed the obese 10 year old. "Though I guess I kinda overdid it a little." Frankie blushed, playing with her large brown ball of a belly as it sloshed and gurgled in delight. "That's alright, dearie." Frankie smiled and stood up, her belly jiggling as she did. "Guess I better go home now." Frankie added as she started to walk to the door. "Oh, now come dear. It's getting late and the forest is dangerous at night." The witch said quickly. Frankie froze. Her mother and big sister had both warned her against walking alone at night in a strange place. "I guess I could crash here." Frankie shrugged after thinking it over. "Wonderful. I have just the room for you!" The witch smiled as she led the obese girl upstairs. They came to a large guestroom. The bed was made of sponge cake, the pillows were orange candy flavored, the blankets were made of taffy and the bedside table was made of rock candy. "Now, you just rest here and I'll let you know when dinner's ready." the witch smiled. "Thank you." Frankie smiled as she climbed into bed. Almost as soon as she hit the pillow, Frankie was snoring, not even bothering to take her glasses off. After closing the door, the witch cackled quietly. "Soon, I'll feast on a delicious girl turkey!" she squealed as she went to prepare. She was unaware that Frankie had heard her due to pretending to fall asleep. She had secretly held her doubts about the witch during her feast and had managed to sneak a peek at the cookbook when they went upstairs. "I've gotta get outta here or Taylor's gonna be an only child and take my room!" she told herself as she closed her eyes again.

What does Frankie do?
15232212111.title: Frankie becomes obese before discovering the wi...

choices: The witch bounces off Frankie's large belly and flies into the fireplace?
The witch slips on some flour from her cooking, falling into the fireplace?
152322121112.content:
Frankie was later awoken by the witch knocking on her door. "Dinner's almost ready, dearie. I was wondering if you would like to give me a hand?" she said. Frankie took a deep breath. She known she would need to pretend like she didn't know what the witch was planning. "Okay." she said as she rolled out of bed with a thud, causing her to burp loudly. Then she stood up and entered the hallway, following the witch to the kitchen. Inside was a large oven. "So, what do you want me to do?" Frankie asked casually. The witch smiled evilly as she then locked the kitchen door. "To get in the oven, my fat little girl!" she cackled. Frankie quickly pretended to be scared. "Y-Y-y-y-y-y-you mean... you wanna e-e-eat me?!?!" she squeaked. "Yes, you stupid little girl! I intend to have girl turkey tonight!" the witch cackled. "Could I see the cookbook?" Frankie asked. "My mom runs a bakery in New Orleans so I might be able to help." The witch paused. "None of my previous dinners offered to help with their own demises before. But... I suppose it may not hurt." she decided, handing the book over. Frankie took it and began reading quickly. Finally, "Y'know, if you took out the more complicated ingredients, it might go quicker." Frankie offered as she scribbled some of her own advice before handing the witch's book back. Frowning, the witch took the book and read it as she stood in front of the open oven. She was unaware of Frankie slowly grabbing a rolling pin. "I suppose your foolish mortal advice may work, girlie. However," but she barely finished her remark when Frankie smacked her with the rolling pin as hard as she could. The witch staggered, holding her head, but didn't fall into the oven, like Frankie had hoped. "You little brat! I'll burn you into a crispy turkey for this!!!" she shrieked as she charged at Frankie, who bravely readied her pin again. But, something else happened instead.

What?
152322121112.title: Wait until dinner to try and make a break for it?

choices: Tells Taylor everythingand goes to bed.
Doesn't tell Taylor anything and goes to bed.
1523221211121.content:
Just as the witch prepared to attack Frankie with a spell, she tripped on a loose floorboard, sending her flying towards Frankie. Frankie could see she wouldn't be able to escape in time, so she just braced herself. "OOOMMMMPPPHH!!!" She grunted as the witch slammed into her large belly. The witch pressed hard for a few seconds and then bounced out like a shot, jiggling Frankie's belly like a very big bowl of Jell-O. She flew, screaming, right into the oven. Quickly, despite her belly's gurgling protests, Frankie ran up and slammed the door shut, locking it to be on the safe side. The oven rattled and shook for a few minutes, and then calmed down. Frankie slowly opened the oven door. The witch was no more. In her place, was a pile of ash and a hat. "That's the end of that witch." she smiled as she turned to the door. It was still locked. "Dang it! The witch must've had the key on her when she went into the oven." She sighed. Then, she remembered. "Wait a sec.." She sniffed and licked the door. "It's a large chocolate bar!" she smiled. With that, Frankie took giant bites out of the door, allowing her to push it open. "Good door." Frankie smiled, patting her belly. Then, "I better get outta here now." she decided as she grabbed a lantern and set off into the dark forest. Soon, she arrived at her family's apartment/bakery. Her big sister Taylor was waiting for her. "Frankie! Where've you been, kiddo? Mom's been goin' nuts trying to find you and..." Taylor then noticed Frankie's new obesity. "Jeez, Frankie! Looks like you've been hittin' the dessert buffet pretty hard. What happened?" she asked, poking Frankie's belly, causing her little sister to belch loudly. "Trust me, Tay. You wouldn't believe me if I told ya." she smiled, digging in her bellybutton. "Try me, kid." Taylor smiled as she sat down on the couch.

Frankie...
1523221211121.title: The witch bounces off Frankie's large belly...

15232212111211.content:
"Well, while I was out walking, I came across a gingerbread house and a witch invited me inside. She fattened me up and tried to eat me, but I managed to escape because she bounced off my belly and it sent her into the oven." Frankie explained. Taylor was quiet for a moment and smiled. "Right. Sure, Frankie." she said. "I told ya you wouldn't believe me." Frankie shrugged as she then started off for her room. "When Mom comes home, tell her I'm okay and that I had dinner before comin' home." she added as she did. "Sure thing, kiddo." Taylor smiled as she watched her large sister head upstairs. Frankie smiled to herself as she entered her normal room and flopped onto her bed. "Today was pretty weird, but I don't mind." she giggled to herself as she fell asleep, one hand on her large lump of a belly, which bulged under her blankets and gurgled and sloshed in her sleep. Occasionally, Frankie burped and farted loudly, slowly returning to her normal size as a result.

THE END.

What would you like to do now?

choices: He realized the house was made out of candy
152322131.content:
Miles, Louie, Taylor and Frankie were all playing in the woods one day, since they were bored and the bakery wasn't getting many customers. They decided to explore the woods, and then Frankie got the idea of hide-and-seek. Her reasoning was that "there was nothing better to do." Everyone agreed and decided to play. Miles was the first seeker, since he was so polite about letting everyone else choose their role before him, and of course, they all wanted to hide. He didn't complain as he started to count down from 50.

"50...49...48..." Miles counted aloud so the others could hear. However he just decided to count in his head eventually, since it would be easier and the others were probably too far away to hear. "32...31...30..." Miles quickly realized how much of a bore it is to be the seeker. He eventually got bored and started spinning in circles. "19...18...17..." Miles almost finished counting. He was about to be able to actually do something! "3...2...1! Ready or not here I come!" He shouted out for the others to hear. He hoped he could find them soon so they didn't get lost. Little did Miles know that they were watching him, giggling as he would not be able to find them. Taylor had to quiet the two younger children down as Mikes went to seek.

Their plan backfired however, when they lost track of Miles. Well, that is to say Miles also lost track of himself. He got lost in the 'beauty of nature' and the 'exotic wildlife.' Though those words can only go so far when you're in a deciduous forest in America. Miles eventually came upon a decadent smell, one of which was not foreign to him. It smelled like the bakery, and he thought that he was near urban civilization again. But when he heard the lack of hustling people and automobiles, he was a tad puzzled. He passed through the clearing of branches to the see that the smell was coming from a large house. It wasn't as big as, say, a mansion, yet it was not small enough to be some townhouse. He was confused as to how and why someone lived this deep in the woods, but assumed it was due to the 'beauty of nature.' Miles immediately thought that the other three were in there, probably making something they had brought along, and this game of hide-and-seek was just a ruse to get rid of him. He went over to the house and was about to knock when...

Frankie and her big sister Taylor were walking through the woods together. "Hate to say it, Tay, but I think we're lost." Frankie said. "Guess so, kiddo. I knew we should've taken that right at the fork." Taylor sighed. Then, Frankie noticed something. "Hey, what's that?" She asked. Taylor looked up at what Frankie was referring to. It was a house, but not like one the duo had ever seen before. It was made out of gingerbread and other sweets. "You think someone lives there?" She asked. Frankie shrugged. "Only one way to find out...

What do they do?

Enter the house

Look through the windows

or

Walk away

15232213212.title: Fat Frankie

152322132121.content:
The duo decided to enter the house. Everywhere they looked upon entering the house was made of different sugary goodies. Curtains made of licorice, pillows made of bubble gum and/or taffy, "What is this place?" asked Taylor in disbelief. "I dunno, but I think it's awesome!" Frankie whooped as she grabbed a piece of the coffee table and took a shark-sized bite. "Mmmm! Coffee cake flavor!" she moaned. "Frankie! You can't go around eating other people's furniture!" Taylor scolded. "Lighten up, Taylor. How often do you see a house like this!" scoffed Frankie. "Come on, I think we better go find somewhere else to get directions." decided Taylor. "Okay. You go... and I'll stay to warn travelers about the so-called 'dangers' of this house." Frankie smirked as she picked up some loose candies and began eating those. At that moment, a witch arrived. She was around Taylor's height and had green skin, as well as orange hair. "Hello, children." She smirked. "Is this your house?" asked Taylor nervously. "Yes, but I'm willing to share it with young one like you two." the witch said. "I like her. She knows what she's sayin'." Frankie smiled. Taylor quickly pulled Frankie aside as Frankie grabbed a bracelet made of Lifesavers. "Frankie, I don't trust that woman. We should really go somewhere else." She said. "What are you talking about, Tay? She's our sugar momma." Frankie giggled as she hugged the witch before sitting down at the large kitchen table and started eating the sweets already on it. "Delightful." said the witch sarcastically as she then secretly pulled out a book called How to Cook Children.

What happens next?

Taylor remains suspicious while Frankie blows up like a balloon

or

Taylor joins Frankie in pigging out
152322132121.title: Enter the House

1523221321211.content:
Two weeks later...

Frankie was once again sitting at the table, wearing a bib and happily licking a large lollipop the size of her head as Taylor came in, holding some toilet paper. "I can't believe you ate the toilet!" She snapped. "Yeah. You're right." Frankie agreed, putting the lollipop down and standing up, revealing her sumo sized body due to her pig outs. "Probably should've saved it for last." She said. "And another thing, Frankie. I really think you should cut down on the sweets." Taylor advised as Frankie grabbed some Sweet Tart bracelets and began picking them apart so she could eat them. "I think exercising could be good for you." "Oh, that reminds me: I ate the treadmill." Frankie added. Taylor's eyes widened. "But... that wasn't candy!" she exclaimed. "Huh. Guess that's why I've been getting the runs." Frankie joked, jogging in place briefly, only to start wheezing and panting after only a second of doing so. Taylor rolled her eyes and began going through the cupboards. "There's gotta be something I can use to make you a salad." she remarked as she opened one to find a girl's head on a pie. "Hi!" It said. Taylor shrieked and Frankie jumped as she sunk her teeth into a large caramel apple. "What's wrong?!?!?" She asked with concern. "There's a pie with a face on it!" Taylor yelped, pointing to it. "Listen, you two need to get outta here. That woman's a witch, who fattens girls up before she makes 'em into pie!" the pie warned them. "I told you, Frankie. Come on, let's get outta here!" Taylor said as she took off, shutting the cupboard doors so the witch wouldn't know what happened. Frankie slowly waddled after her older sister, panting and wheezing, forcing her to stop briefly. Once she caught her breath, she then headed for the door.

What happened next?

Frankie gets stuck in the doorway due to her obesity

or

the witch comes back before Frankie can escape.
1523221321211.title: Suspicious Taylor and obese Frankie

15232213212111.content:
Just as Frankie reached the door, her hippo sized hips wedged themselves tightly in the doorframe. "Hey, I'm stuck!" She cried. Quickly Taylor ran back and started pulling her large little sister out. "You just had to eat the dishwasher, didn't you?" Taylor remarked. "But it was chocolate and peanut butter flavored!" Frankie whimpered defensively as she stuffed a cookie she'd stuffed into her pants in her mouth just as Taylor pulled her free. At that moment, the witch returned. "What are you little brats going?" she asked evilly, eying the obese Frankie, who whimpered nervously. "Why, it's time for dinner!" The witch cackled, flashing a large sharp knife. "I think I just pooped my pants." Frankie squeaked in fright.

What happens next?

Taylor manages to stop the witch

or

The witch manages to overpower Taylor

Which will you decide?
15232213212111.title: Frankie gets stuck

choices: Franike and Taylor  decied to live in the gingirbread house
152322132121112.content: Taylor tried to knock the witch aside, but the witch was too quick for her. She quickly pinned Taylor to the wall by her t-shirt with her knife. "Now, I can have my dinner!" she cackled as Taylor struggled to get free. Suddenly, "Get away from my big sis!" Frankie yelled, slamming into the witch with her blubbery girth. Her weight threw the witch off balance. The witch toppled into the fireplace and shrieked in agony as she was burned alive. Soon, all that was left was her hat. Frankie waddled over and pulled the knife out from Taylor's t-shirt. "You okay?" Frankie asked. "Yeah, thanks to you." Taylor smiled as they hugged. Then, Taylor wrinkled her nose. "Eeeewwwww Frankie! You really did poop your pants!" she groaned, holding her nose. "I was scared!" Frankie protested with a smile. "We better get home now. Good thing Mom's gone for the month." Taylor remarked. "Yeah. Something tells me I'm gonna need to use diapers for awhile since my hippo hips are too big for narrow doorways like our bathroom's." Frankie said, eying said hips as Taylor smiled.
152322132121112.title: The witch wins

choices: Appear to them as the ‘pie-girl’ freed from her condition by the ‘killing’ of th
Appear behind them as a “reformed” witch, ‘freed’ of her evil side
Cut them off showing them that she’s still alive…and pissed off at them
1523221321211121.content:
As the two girls were chatting about returning home, the witch was watching them intently from the magic dimension.

She hadn’t expected the little one to be able to push her away but, she was still prepared for any situation. So, as she fell in the fireplace, she quickly left her old body there and, in spirit form, managed to sneak out of it.

It hadn’t been as easy as she had planned, nor as painless, but she had survived.

And was now planning revenge on those two pesky girls, watching them from the different dimension as they moved around in her house discussing on what to do.

The little one, Frankie, was basically mowing down everything in her path, still gobbling up anything edible she could let her hands on, while her sister tried valiantly to stop her.

“Frankie! Stop eating that couch! You’re going to be as big as a house if you don’t stop!”

“Aww…C’mon, Big Sis. Just a couple morsels more. The witch has gone, we’re free…I’m just celebrating…”

“Yeah…but you still need to change! You can’t go around in your…condition. Plus, we’ve got to get home before someone begins to worry about us.”

As Taylor reprimanded her little sister, Frankie kept munching on the furniture, adoring the taste of marzipan and mint-flavored sugar of it. She knew she had grown obese already and that she was in serious need for a diet but, since she was already this big, she thought to splurge a bit more.

‘Eh…What’s a few more pounds going to do since I’m already this big?’

Taylor instead was still freaking out.

Not only the witch had almost got her, and her sister, but she also could have turned her Fat!
It was a fate worse than death in the mind of the young gymnast-freak. Luckily her, not anymore so, little sister managed to save her from that fate by toppling that evil witch into the fireplace and so everything was surely going to return to normality.

Still, they had to get out of there. The sooner, the better…

‘Otherwise I’ll have to roll Frankie home…not to mention that of this house wouldn’t remain a single brick to show as proof to Mom if Frankie remains here…’

As the two girls kept debating, they suddenly remembered that, in the house with them, there was still the poor pie-girl who had warned them. Quickly they rushed through the house to see if they could do something to save her.

It was then, at that exact moment, that the witch decided to strike by….



( I know, it's a bit short, but I will make amend on the next ones :) )
1523221321211121.title: The witch wins ( for real now  ;)  )

choices: Frankie is on all fours, currently busy eating the floor
Frankie is sitting on the floor, taking great care in gorging on the residual fu
Frankie is waiting by a column near the exit door, trembling in fear waiting for
She appear right in front of her! And she’s not too happy about being left out
15232213212111212.content:
Before the two girls re-entered the kitchen, the witch acted.

Quickly reforming herself she placed the poor Pie-girl into a different cupboard, the highest one she could reach on her tiptoes.
After that she quickly changed her looks, becoming a youngish twenty-five years old girl in tight fitting clothes with a slight pot belly hanging slightly off. As she inspected herself briefly, Frida (the witch) decided that in the shortest time she had available that was the best she could have asked for.

Then she just laid herself on the floor, waiting for the two girls to arrive and to fall prey of her, magically powered, charm.

As Taylor approached the kitchen door, she briefly motioned Frankie to wait for her in the antechamber, and without waiting an answer she entered the kitchen. As soon as she entered, she rapidly looked around seeing that it was as if a hurricane had gone throughout the kitchen. Most cupboards were open, including the one where the pie-girl had been in, and everything seemed to have been tossed around the room. Then, in the middle of this chaos she spotted the figure of this young girl on the floor.

The girl seemed out of consciousness and so Taylor had time to check her out, so to say, making sure it wasn’t the witch under disguise.

As Taylor inspected her, she noticed that the girl seemed similar to the head she had seen before, sticking out of that pie, and so deduced that with the witch dealt with, this girl had been released from whatever incantation she had been subjected to. Slowly she turned her on her back, noticing that, although slightly fat, this girl seemed to be an impressive hourglass figure. Also, although her clothes were slightly tattered, she could discern them as some kind of cheerleader outfit.

‘Man, she got lucky indeed. If Frankie hadn’t managed to slay the witch…she would have ended up as her dessert.’

As Frida felt the touch of Taylor she slowly opened her eyes, coughing a bit as if she was having issues breathing. Still, groggily, she turned her stare toward Taylor and a sad smile appeared on her face.

“Oh? It’s you? So you didn’t manage to escape her in the end…”

“W-What!? No…I mean, me and my sister did it. We managed to kill her. You…You’re not a pie anymore.”

Frida, as if she didn’t know already, looked at herself with fake surprise in her eyes.

“Wh-Wha? It’s…It’s true? I’m whole again? I’m not…I’m not a pie anymore? Yay!”

With that she grabbed Taylor in a hug and dragged her to the ground, squealing in joy while, not seen, she let her magic flow into Taylor mind, dulling her wits a bit.

‘This girl is way too smart for my tastes…she needs to slow down a bit.’

“Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! I'm so happy to be whole again!
Oh..erm, sorry...” the undercover-witch said letting Taylor go. “I’m Frida, by the way.”


Taylor had just managed to get free from that heart-warming hug and to step back a little, feeling rather happy about saving someone. Also, she slowly realized that her doubts about her being the witch had simply vanished. As if something as boring as that wasn’t worth thinking it over.

“T-Taylor Hathaway. Pleasure to meet you.”

“I can see my hands…and my feet…and my legs…and everything in betwe…oh! Sorry. I was spacing out.
Again, Taylor, I thank you from the deep of my heart. I’m in your debt. If it wasn’t for you, I would be dead, or worse, now. You’re awesome! A true savior! A Legend!”

Taylor began to blush under that barrage of compliments from Frida, but soon she stopped since she saw that the girl in front of her moved suddenly closer to her.

“I know! I’ll prepare something for you to thank you for all you did to save me!”

With that Frida began to collect pans and ingredient from the messed-up kitchen and quickly placed herself to work. Taylor was still watching the scene, partly amused and partly embarrassed by the older girl. Still she was shocked when, in just a couple of minutes, she found herself seated at a table with a plate full of chocolate muffins right in front of her.

Looking around she saw Frida standing near the stove, happily singing by herself as she was still cooking, until she stopped for a moment to address her.

“Uh? You…You don’t like them? I…I’ve made them for you…I…I wanted to thank you but…”

Taylor, seeing the first sign of tears in the eye of the older girl swiftly smiled at her and gave a big bite to one of the muffins, wanting to tell her that it was enough. That everything was fine and there was no need to cook more.
But as soon as the taste hit her taste-buds, she felt herself in heaven. No, better than that.

The taste in her mouth was downright delicious, so good that Taylor began to eat at her muffin faster and faster until she found in her hand’s only crumbs.

‘So good…Uh? Already finished? Aww… Well, maybe I can afford another one…jut this time…’

Frida kept cooking while behind her she could hear the troublesome girl really going at it with the plate of muffins she had prepared for her. Still, to be on the cautious side, she also left in front of her a plate of cupcakes and one of cookies, with a complementary tall glass of milk. Leaving the older girl to eat, she then moved out of the kitchen to greet the little butterball who had tried to kill her.

As she entered in the adjacent room, she saw that Frankie was…
15232213212111212.title: The pie-girl that loves turning girls into pies

choices: Focus on the both, being sure that they forget all about returning home.
Focus on both, treating them as if they both were younger babies
Focus on Frankie. Make her so huge she can’t move anymore
Focus on Taylor. Make her so dull, she will do whatever Frida tells her to do.
152322132121112124.content:
As Frida opened the door she suddenly was bounced back on the floor of the kitchen as a relatively small wall of pink flesh barged through the door. The witch smiled in seeing the young butterball trying to barge in with an angry look in her eyes.

“Ehi! Who are you and what are you doing to…Tailor!?”

As Frankie tried to push herself through the kitchen door she saw this strange girl on the floor, but what caught her attention was the figure of her sister seating at a table, eating what appeared to be a small feast of sweets! The young girl was feeling so angry and outraged about the injustice of it that, not even for a moment, she thought that Taylor could be under some kind of influence.

‘Look at her! SHE talks back to me, telling ME to stop eating…and then I find HER eating away with no remorse whatsoever!? That is NOT fair!’

Frankie, as she angrily thought to her sister, was still trying to forcefully enter the room, until she felt a soothing touch on her shoulder. Looking up she saw the girl that she had pushed to the ground, slowly massaging her shoulder, as if trying to calm her.

“There, there, girl. I’m sorry if I made you worry.

I’m Frida and I must thanks you too for saving me. IF not for you and your sister, I may still be a Pie-Girl and was surely destined to be the witch dessert.

Here, let me help you. I’ve prepared some goodies for your sister as a thank-you gift but, I now realize, I should have prepared something for you too.

Can you accept my deepest apologies?

Name’s Frida, by the way.”

Frankie smiled sheepishly to the older girl, blushing as she realized that in her anger she had knocked this girl off her feet and still she was apologizing to her.

“F-Frankie…And n-no need to thanks me, I…”

“Nonsense!” Frida said with emphasis, as she helped the young butterball navigating through the kitchen until she left her at the table near her sister. “I won’t take no as an answer. I need to thanks both of my heroes. I’m no good in much, except cooking and baking so that’s how I will reward you two.

So, here, eat it all up, there’s plenty more coming.”

Frankie found herself seated at the table in the kitchen, sitting right beside her sister which was still gulping down cookies by the handful until she noticed her little sister sitting there.

“Oh…*gulp*…Frankie…Er, Sorry… eh eh.”

“Yeah? Don’t you sorry me, now. What’s the matter, uh? First you say I can’t eat…But then I find you doing just that?”

Taylor blushed heavily. Her little sister was right but, that food was so good.

“Uhm…You…You’re right. But Frida was going to cry if I didn’t partake and…and… I’m sorry.

Still, we will just have couples bite more and then we will return home, ok?”

Before Frankie could reply, Frida appeared between them leaving to the both of them huge plates filled with food.

“Here girls, dig in! I’ve made it all for you!

For you, Taylor, I’ve prepared a delish Devil’s food cake, with a side of Rocky Road Ice cream and triple chocolate chip cookies…”

As she said that a large plate appeared under Taylor eyes, filled at the center by this towering cake, with the right side overloaded with huge cookies and the left side filled with the ice cream. Without saying a word Taylor found herself unable to tear herself away and began eating in earnest. As she did so she didn’t feel the gentle touch of Frida on her shoulder, as the witch used her powers to make the girl more and more slow, and so more easily controllable.

“And then for you, Frankie, since no young girl should have only sweets, I’ve prepared for you something more…adequate to your age and need to grow up.”

Frankie thought for a moment that she was going to be cursed under the spell of being forced to eat vegetables but, under her eyes Frida left her a large platter covered in huge double decker hamburgers, with a side of fried bacon strips and french-fries. The young girl felt herself salivating only by looking at that food and so, without further ado, she simply began to tear away at her meal.

Frida watched with a smile as the two girls dug in their respective feasts, soon clearing them all. But before either girl could stop, she intervened bringing more food to the two, going to be, gluttons.

"Here girls, I just can't thank you enough!"

as she said that she brought to Taylor a large platter with a relative small pyramid of sweets to her. As a base two dozen's, chocolate glazed, cream filled, eclairs, while on top of them, a different kind of donut per each level. Going from powdered ones, to jelly filled, to cream filled and so on. the poor girl, seeing such a bounty felt her sweet tooth calling her to dig in and, her already dulled mind didn't seem to find anything wrong in that plan.

'Why worry? As long as my metabolism is high, it doesn't matter what I eat, right?'

Frankie instead was enjoying herself immensely, all that junkfood was so good but, she soon found herself staring sadly at an empty plate but, before she could start to mourn, Frida left a new wave of delicacies for her to eat.
Suddenly her line of view was filled with plates full of deliciously looking things.

She saw huge steaks covered in french-fries, a large bowl full of fried chicken wings covered in barbecue sauce and then a large pitcher of milkshake waiting right for her. The already obese girl simply smiled in delight and tried to reach at the fried chicken but, before she could do that, Frida stopped her.

"Now, now...before going at it, wouldn't be better to clean yourself out of those 'dirty' clothes?"

Sadly Frankie began to rise, following Frida but, as soon as they were in the bathroom, she saw the older girl offering to her, her bucket of fried chicken. "Here, Frankie, as I clean you out, you have this, we can't have a little girl as you wasting away, do we? We need to have you as strong and healthy as a fiddle."
The obese girl, while finding tiring to stay standing, she still enjoyed immensely the bucket of KFC as Frida helped cleaning her out.
What she failed to realize, as she kept consuming the fried delicacy, was that for as many pieces she munched on, the same amount seemed to appear out of nowhere in her bucket.

Frida, meanwhile, launched a small spell and cleaned the girl, no point in having her going to be food dirty, and then helped her wear a new set of clothes, one that would fit the girl size.

'I can't believe she's filling right-in in Trudy's dress...That girl had been a real pig and was already at three hundred pounds when she outgrew this dress. So that means that dear, oh so dear, Frankie here weighs..!'

Frida felt overjoyed in the realization that the youngest girl was already so large but, before she could say anything she was interrupted by said overfed piglet.

"Uhm...have we...*gulp*... finished...*munch*... here? I'd still like something more..."

"Uh? Sure, Frankie, dear. Here, let me help you to your seat."

Not much later, Frankie was back at the table eating with gusto at her food, while Taylor found herself staring downat a new plate of food prepared by Frida.

"M-More?"

"Sure! Anything for my savior!"

"N-No! I-I didn't mean..."

Before Taylor could finish her sentence a sheet cake appeared in front of her, offered to her from Frida. Before the older girl could push herself away the tempting aroma of the cake reached her nostrils and forced her to go at it as she was starving.

'I should stop...buts it's so damn good...J-Just one more plate then...O-Only one more after this maybe...'

As the two girls kept eating, the witch gleefully smiled within herself.

The young one was already quite large and, with her unbridled appetite, she wasn’t going to be a problem as soon as she was made unable to move easily. The older one instead, Taylor, had to be brought to be a little bit duller yet, and then she could really begin to pack on the pounds. She just needed for them to be comfortable enough in the house and, as soon as both were truly addicted to her cuisine, maybe then she could reveal her ruse to them.

Frida would love to see them quivering in terror, knowing to have fallen into her trap. But before that, she still had a long way to fatten them up.

She just needed to decide on how to proceed…
152322132121112124.title: An Angry Frankie is a Hungry Frankie

choices: The following morning, Frankie and Taylor greet their Aunt Frida
The next morning only one of the girls is sure of Frida being their Aunt
During the night, Frankie has a nightmare. She need her Auntie!
In the middle of the night, Taylor wakes up hungry, will she call her aunt for h
1523221321211121242.content:
Frida had been checking around her house, restocking magically her supplies and verifying that her delicious meals, which she had already prepared in the past, were still where she had left them. When she returned in the kitchen to check on the two girls, she saw that the two of them had completely cleaned every plate she had given them, leaving both girls bloated and stuffed.

Frankie laid against the table; her large globular belly divided in half against it as she tried valiantly to remain awake after the huge meal she had just consumed.

Taylor didn’t seem to fare much better.

She laid back against her chair, with one hand covering her eyes while using the other to caress her stuffed belly. Advancing on them, Frida, decided that they had probably eaten enough for the moment and were in need to rest, before continuing with more.

“Girls, I think it’s time for you two to rest a little bit. You both seem pretty tired.”

Frankie hadn’t the strength to answer back, although she fully agreed with that plan but, Taylor tried to fight back, if only a little.

“N-No…We should…go home…now….”

“Oh, come on now, a little bit of rest and then we will all go home. C’mon, I’ll help the both of you.”

While helping them standing, Frida brought the two overfed girls to a large room in the back of the house. The room was a bit spartan, just a few wardrobes and two quite large beds, which looked quite comfortable. The witch then helped tuck the girls in them and watched as they both fell asleep almost immediately. As she watched them sleep, she realized that, apart from stuffing them beyond any of her previous limits, she had to do more to keep them in check.

It was then, as she looked around the room, that she had an idea. It was actually very easy. She had just to condition them both to think that they belonged to her. But how to do that?

As she pondered the question she heard Frankie mumbling in her sleep.

“Mmm…No, Mooom…I’m not a kid…don’t treat me…as a child…”

Hearing her gave her right away the solution. Children! She had to change both girls to small children. Now, she couldn’t transform them physically, it was a magic so power consuming to not be cost-effective in the end but, she could condition them. It would be slower, for sure, but also less consuming.

With the plan in mind she moved beside the easier target, Frankie. Creating a direct connection to the younger sister, she began to infuse her with magic, as she also scanned her memories and began altering them.

Soon, she saw what the young girl was dreaming, and with delicate action began to change her memories and her perception of the world.

“Now, Frankie…remember, there is no Mommy…they both love you but they’re not here with you…”

As Frida spoke softly to her mind, so Frankie mumbled back as if answering, albeit slowly.

“No…Mom?”
“No mommy. She had to leave you to your Aunt…Auntie Frida. Frida is your Auntie, Frankie…”
“Auntie…Frida?”
“Yes. Auntie Frida. She loves you very much and take good care of you Frankie…”
“Good…Care….”
“Mh-mh…Remember, you’re just a little child…let your auntie take care of you.”
“No…Child….”
“Yes, you are. Your auntie little princess…and what princesses do? They do what their aunties says.
You’re a child…Auntie’s little child…”
“Child…auntie…princess…”

As Frida interrupted her connection, she could see that Frankie’s memories were changing, the figure of her mother was disappearing substituted by her own. Also, she could see that in every instance, Frankie appeared smaller and much younger than what she really was. Naaturally, Frida knew that this wasn’t going to completely change them overnight but, in a couple of days her girls would be surely more submissive and childish.

Then she turned toward the most difficult one, Taylor.

Her memories were much more solid than those of her younger sibling, but still, the witch established the connection and entered the girl mind, then she began laying her lies, trying to change the girl memories.

“Taylor…you don’t hate your mother but, neither lover her so much…she left you alone with Frankie…”
“MMm..Mom? No love?”
“That’s right. You were left alone with Frankie…alone with your Aunt. Aunt Frida.”
“Aunt…Frida…alone?”
“Yes. But Auntie loves you very much…you remember that. You felt loved by your Aunt….”
“Loved… Aunt…Yes…”
“You love Aunt Frida and listened to her advice… You know she only think the best for you…”
“Listen…advice…good…for me…”
“You live with her and Frankie, at her house. You’ve lived with her for a long time already.”
“Living…with aunt…good…”
“Yes. You’re young Taylor…so young you’ve got to live with Auntie…”
“MMMmm…I’m…older…”

Seeing as Taylor tried to resist, Frida began to try with a different approach. She couldn’t be as direct as she had been with Frankie, so she had to try to sneak past Taylor defenses. Using her own convictions against her.

“Yes, you are. You’re older than Frankie…but still young…”
“Older…than Frankie? ...Young?...Mmm….Yes...”
“You’re Auntie cutie pie…you love the name…you’re a child. You’re Auntie little child…”
“Mmm…Cutie…Pie…good…child…n-no…A-Auntie? Auntie little…child…yes…”
“You love Auntie…you trust Auntie. Auntie does what’s best for you…”
“Auntie…loves me…I…Trust Auntie…I…I do…what she…tells me to do…”
“Good child… You’re so young…”

Now, Frida knew, was going to come the hard part.

She had managed to penetrate Taylor mind defenses, but she had a memory that the witch had to change if her plan was to succeed. First and foremost, both girls had to recognize her as their Aunt. Without that she couldn’t proceed with her plan. And to do so, she had to change Taylor memory of her gymnastic success.

“You would love to do gym…but you don’t do it yourself.”
“Love Gym…MMMmm…I do gym…almost…everyday…”
“You wish to do that…You’re a child Taylor. Children don’t go at the gym…Children stay at home.”
“No…Gym? Mmh…I do…training…”
“Auntie loves you, Taylor...But you’re too young for that. You enjoy the idea of it…”
“Idea of…training? Yes…No training…good…”
“Remember Taylor…you’re Auntie little cutie pie. You’re older than your sister but still a child…only a child.”
“I…am Cutie Pie….I…am…child…young…child…mmm..yes…”

The witch, finally had managed to change also Taylor perspective. Soon her memories began to realign to what Frida had told her. Under her own eyes she saw that the girl began to think less of her old teen life, seeing instead a more childish life with her Aunt. Frida had done more than enough for the first night, without considering that she literally felt depleted, but at the very least, both girls now knew her as their Aunt. And this was a victory in itself.

Now, feeling drained, Frida decided to go and have a quick sack before hitting the sack herself. She had, after all, a Pie Girl just waiting for her in the kitchen.

Then, the following morning, the two girls would have quite full day indeed…
1523221321211121242.title: Frankie & Taylor childish training…

choices: wanted to see her favorite show...Pretty Pretty Pegasus! It was soon on!
needed to ask auntie for more food. She had to grow healthier!
wasn’t Frida's niece! Wait, wasn't she the girl they had saved from the witch?
was confused about Frida but she knew to be twenty! She was no child!
15232213212111212421.content:
The following morning, the two sister woke up finding themselves in a room slightly different from before. There were some frilly looking drawings on every wall and it seemed much more for a younger mind, than a common guest room. But the two of them didn’t find that strange. After all, they had lived there for quite a while now, so nothing to worry about.

As they stood from their beds, both looked at each other for a minute, feeling strangely comfortable in their respective looks.
Frankie, as she looked in a nearby mirror, wondered for a moment on the reason for her big boulder like belly, which overflowed her pajama pants, slightly covering her most intimate place with its flabby fat. She then focused on her face, noticing her double chin, briefly wondering when she'd gotten that, but as time passed she seemed to accept that her size was normal and didn't see anything wrong in being so big, although she didn't remember that waddling around was so difficult.

Taylor instead, was inspecting her small-ish potbelly, lifting the button up pajama top she was wearing. For a few moments she played a bit with it, lifting it with one hand and watching it jiggle a bit. Then she also felt her butt, as she hazily remembered to have felt it firmer in the past, while it was a slightly jiggling mass now. Still, as the two girl inspected themselves, both their bellies rumbled hungrily getting them out of their reveries. Laughing and joking between them, they moved out of the room going toward the kitchen, where they knew that breakfast was waiting for them.

Still, as they went to the kitchen, they both had hazy memories of meeting a witch in the woods and of being scared from her but, they didn’t said a word of it to each other, thinking that they would be ridiculed and laughed at. So, it soon became just a passing dream, something that hadn’t really happened.

Soon, the two sisters entered the kitchen and saw that a figure was standing in front of the oven.

Both of them recognized her, immediately. It was their Aunt Frida. The one who had took care of them as they grew up.

“Good Morning Auntie!” Said Frankie while waddling slowly toward her seat at the table, Soon followed by Taylor who greeted her aunt with a quick hug, before joining her sister for breakfast.

“Good Morning girls! So, how did my Little Princess slept? Had any good dreams?”

“I had a long dream…don’t remember about what but…I feel good and happy, Auntie.”

“That’s my little pretty princess...now, here comes your Breakfast…Remember, honey, in this house we do…?”

“No leftovers policy!”

As Frankie said that with kind of a sing song voice, she looked quizzical for a moment but then relaxed.

To Frida it was clear that the younger girl had absorbed much of the brainwashing and so was more accepting of believing to be a little child. Still, she gave her a big smile and left in front of her a large plate with a four eggs omelet with plenty of cheese on top, along with six sausages and a plentiful little mountain of fried bacon strips.

“Here, dear, have this and then I’ll bring you the rest.”

After giving that first plate to Frankie she turned toward Taylor which was doodling a bit on a piece of paper, drawing animals, cakes and pastries and…some kind of gym equipment's.

That was worrying.

Frida, though, smiled at the twenty-ish teen and greeted her with a quick peck on her cheek.

“And how’s my Cutie Pie doing this morning?”

“I feel good but…It’s as if I’m forgetting something, Auntie.”

“But of course, honey…You’re forgetting breakfast!”

As she said that she promptly gave to the teen a large platter with almost a dozen powdered donuts, along with a hefty slice of sheet cake and half a dozen’s, gooey, chocolate hash browns while, surrounding all the rest, there was a ring of triple chocolate chip cookies’s.

“Here you go, Cutie Pie, eat it all up. You need to eat healthy to grow healthy.”

Taylor looked quizzically at her plate. For an instant she seemed to remember something about diet and what not, but it soon passed away. For that moment she wondered why she was thinking about diets, but then she simply dove in her breakfast, reminding herself to ask it later to her aunt.

As both girls pigged out, the witch began to influx the two of them with a simple spell, letting them feel more at ease with their growing bodies. As if there was nothing wrong in growing, since both of them were still supposed to grow out more. And so both Taylor and Frankie quickly polished their first plate, with Frankie being the first in licking her plate clean.

“Good job, Frankie…Now, here comes the train from Breakfast station!”

The witch then proceeded to provide more and more food to the two girls, always accompanying each plateful of food with a childish remark, reinforcing into the girls the idea that the two of them were younger that they seemed. And plate after plate, both girls began to outgrow their own clothes. Strangely enough, it was Taylor the first one to grow out of hers.

As she was cleaning out the last morsel of her third plateful of food, her button up shirt gave up the fight and simply ripped at her middle, showering the kitchen with buttons. At first the girl was shocked. For that moment she looked down and saw how big her belly was, how bloated and full of, oh so yummy, food. But Frida was expecting it and quickly moved at her side.

“Good Job, Cutie Pie! A healthy girl sign is to outgrow her clothes! I think it’s time for a celebration!”

Taylor, too dumbfounded to say anything could only stare open mouthed as a large cake seemed to appear in front of her, it appeared delicious and it even smelled wonderfully, but still she had a nagging feeling that something wasn’t right.

“Er…Auntie? Ehm…Thanks for the cake but…Shouldn’t I be on a diet? I vaguely remember something about that…”

Frida mentally cursed the strong mind of the teenager, still she smiled and played it cool.

“Naturally. We talked about it a couple of weeks ago. You were worried about having a hard time growing out and growing healthier so, we decided to have you on a healthy little diet. And you did it, Cutie Pie! I’m so proud of you!”

Taylor felt strangely in conflict, from one side she felt that what her aunt was saying was in line with what she remembered. After all, she had thought about a diet…So it had to be the growing out diet she was talking about.

And yet, something didn’t seem to match.

Taylor turned around and looked at Frankie, she saw the little girl still completely focused on her meal. She knew that her little sister was growing out too, a little better than herself at least, but still she appeared at her eyes younger than she should have been…or at least she thought that she should have been older than what she saw. It was all so confusing for Taylor.

What was going on? As she pondered about that she also took in the size of the cake that Aunt Frida had given her. Had she to eat it all by herself? It did seem to be the right thing to do and yet…somehow, it also wasn’t.

Suddenly, just as she was to take a piece of the cake with her fork she remembered what she had forgotten!

She…
15232213212111212421.title: Good Morning, Aunt Frida!

choices: Bedroom, a simple change of clothes with something more roomy
Bathroom, need to be in a diaper to make it convincing
Kitchen, with an apron on she could be Auntie’s taste tester!
Garden, with a bit of fresh air she could feel hungrier faster
152322132121112124211.content:
Taylor had been full of doubts for a moment.

That single instant had seemed to her to have lasted hours but, suddenly everything seemed to be washed away as she remembered what she thought to have forgotten.

Who could care about something as boring as diets and gym, or about Auntie not being actually auntie. There was a biggest thing that was worrying her now.
Pretty Pretty Pegasus!

Her favorite TV show was going to start soon and she didn0t want to chance to lose it.

“Auntie? Can I bring this one with me? My favorite show is starting soon. Please?”

Frida smiled as she realized from where that question came from. Her mind had finally broken under her influence and now Taylor was accepting her role of being a little kid a bit more. Still, as much as she liked that fact, she had a role to keep.

“You know the rules, Cutie Pie, no left overs. Still, you’ve just outgrown your clothes so it is your day.
Alright, But I’ll be bringing some snacks for you. You still need to grow healthier.”

“Thanks, Auntie!” Taylor then rose from the table and went, albeit slowly since she still had her belly full of food weighting her down, toward the couch near the TV set in the main room of the house. Once there she sat comfortably and started up the television, using the remote to reach the channel where her favorite kid show was going to start.

As she was waiting, Frida arrived bringing her the celebratory cake she had left untouched and some more snacks for Taylor to consume as she watched the cartoon.

“Now, Cutie Pie, remember. No Leftovers. You’re such a good girl.”

As she said that she literally surrounded Taylor with food. On the table, beside the large cake, Frida had left also a large tray overloaded with brownies, waffles, donuts and even a few pies. To top it all off, she also had left a rather large pitcher of shake that Taylor could use if she got parched on the food. The teenager nodded and began slowly eating the cake, but all her attention was riveted to the screen, as her cartoon was starting.

Taylor couldn’t believe that she had almost lost an episode of her favorite cartoon and, although focused on the screen, she still began eating faster and faster at the food her Aunt had brought her, trying to finish everything before the show was over. Quickly she began stuffing her mouth with brownies, covering her entire lips with gooey chocolate, after which she grabbed the first slice of cake taking huge bites from it, as a few gobs of it fell from it on her big, distended belly. Still, Taylor was enjoying way too much her show to take notice of how messily she was eating. And so, bite after bite, morsel after morsel she managed to clear put the coffee table n front of her of all the snacks her aunt had brought her.

The teenager then, unconsciously, began to sit more comfortably on the couch, spreading her legs wide so to give her bloated middle more room to breathe. Giggling like a little girl she then began to truly enjoy her cartoon without any further distraction but, alas, it was near the end of the episode and so she just decided to lay there, watching some more cartoons.

Frida tough had other plans for the teenager. Seeing that she had cleared her stash of snacks she quickly approached her, to take those plates away but, also, to bring her some more.

“Was everything good, Cutie pie?”

“Everything was…*urp*…perfect Auntie!”

“That’s good, since now is time for your mid-morning snack, dear. You still need to grow as healthy as your younger sister.”

Taylor gave a quick glance to Frankie noticing, once more, that she still seemed bigger than her.

“Alright, Auntie! I will grow healthier for you!”

“That’s my lovely cutie pie. Here, why don’t you have these while watching some cartoons? I still need to change your little sister.”

As she said that, with a snap of her fingers she quickly made appear several cakes, pies and a lots of sweet treats all around Taylor, which had begun immediately to dig in, trying to match the size of sister in the shortest time possible. the girl didn't even bother trying to understand from where that food was coming. Her Aunt had simply brought it to her, end of story.

“Good girl! Eat all up and grow healthier for Auntie. Later on, as soon as the Little Princess is resting, I will come and play a bit with you ok, darling?”

Taylor, holding a rather large slice of cake in one hand and an oversized éclair in the other, nodded once with a smile plastered on her face as she chewed on her large mouthful of cake while moaning in delight for the great taste.

The witch looked at the situation, seeing the twenty something girl convincing herself more and more to be a little kid. It was hilarious and just too good. The only way to make it perfect was to let her get so fat that she couldn’t move.

And with the appetite she was showing off to her ‘Auntie’ surely wouldn’t take too long.

Meanwhile, as the older girl was busy eating and changing herself into a little girl, Frida had to take care also of the younger sister, Frankie. Now, the little ten year old was already a glutton at heart and, she had only to let the beast out of its cage, but it was time to push a little bit more into her that she wasn’t a ten year old anymore. She had to realize that she was way younger.

Turning around she saw that Frankie was still seated at the table, literally licking her plate.

“Such a good little princess you are! Here, have some more and then we can go and change you, baby.”

Frankie didn’t have any doubt about her situation, she was staying with her auntie, ate a lot of goodies that helped her grow healthier and that was it. Still, as she attacked her new plateful of food, she idly wondered what her Auntie meant by changing her? After a while, though her food was delicious, she felt herself slowing down. Looking at her belly she saw that it appeared much bigger and rounder than it was when she had just woken up.

Burping a little she tried to resume to her, still half full, plate but felt as if she couldn’t finish.

“A-Auntie…*urp*? I..I don’t think …I can finish…this…”

Frida stopped cooking for a moment, turning to look at the little girl, grinning wickedly within herself. The girl, thanks to the enhanced food she had given to her and her sister, seemed to have inflated pretty decently. Little Frankie, in fact was now little only by name. Her belly was so big that seemed to pull the little girl down from her seat at the table, forcing her to sit hunched forward. Yet, as happy as she was, there was still the matter of the made up ‘Leftover policy’ to take into consideration.
