In order to defuse the situation she moved beside the overstuffed little girl and began massaging her rock hard, dome shaped gut.

“Here, let Auntie help you finish eating your breakfast. We can’t have you starving now, can we?”

As the witch massaged that huge belly, she also managed to let a squeeze or two to mix in between of the massage, enjoying the feeling of such a fatty girl in her hands. Still, as Frida massaged, Frankie felt herself feeling better and began taking large bites out of her last plate of food. Still, although she managed to clean it all out, she still felt incredibly heavy and stuffed. So she couldn’t do more than basically collapse against the chair she was sitting on. Frida, meanwhile, was still rubbing that huge boulder belly, enjoying the sensation immensely, until she saw Frankie almost ready to fall asleep.
She couldn’t let it happen.

Rising, she moved beside the stuffed girl and gave her a quick peck on the cheek.

“Good Job, little Princess. You cleared everything out. Now we just need to change you into something more comfortable.”

Frankie didn’t know what her Auntie meant but, she had to admit that her pajama pants were cutting quite painfully into her underbelly so, although feeling sleepy from eating so much, she still rose from her chair and began waddling beside Frida, which was navigating her toward the….
152322132121112124211.title: TV Shows and plenty of snacks

choices: Several tubs of ice-cream along with quite a large spoon
lots of pitchers full of a milky brown shake and quite a wide funnel
large platters choked full of hot dogs and hamburgers
several huge bottles of frying oil
1523221321211121242112.content:
Soon Frankie found herself in the bathroom of their house. As she looked quizzically around, wondering why they were there, Frida asked her to lay on the marzipan counter and began to undress her. Being with her Auntie, Frankie, didn’t see anything wrong in what her aunt was doing until, she saw that she had picked up a very large diaper bag. For some reason, Frankie didn’t want to wear one but, big as she was and tired as she was feeling, she didn’t have much to fight against her aunt.

Frida, noticing the angry glare of the younger girl, simply smiled as she caressed her cheek.

“Now, now, Princess. You know we have to put this on. We can’t have you going around the house without it. Come on, it isn’t hurting you, is it?”

“N-no…”

“See? Come on, let me help you wear it and then you can have some of your favorite food as a snack.”

Instantly, Frankie brooding changed into a dreaming smile, as she thought about her favorite food.

Only by thinking about it made herself drool a bit.
She couldn’t wait to have some of the dish that her Aunt had created just for her.

A slab, a couple inches thick, of deep-fried bacon along with fires and a super healthy milkshake!

Frida smiled as she placed that image in the little girl mind. Only thinking how many calories it was worth it almost managed to send her over the edge, and that was counting it without the bulk-up shake she was going to prepare for her little niece.
Oh, she just couldn’t wait but, first she had to have the extra-large diaper on the obese girl, so to reinforce in her the conviction to be a much smaller kid. Swiftly, and with expert movements, Frida placed the large diaper on the girl and then began watching as little Frankie began to waddle around getting a feeling of the large diaper on herself. For some reason she noticed that she felt quite embarrassed, even though it was a small though in the back of her mind. Still had to admit with herself that it was rather comfortable.

The witch then helped Frankie to waddle back to the kitchen where, as she had promised, was going to give her a prize for being a good girl. Frankie, although waddling quite a bit more slowly than before, followed her aunt back to the kitchen and rapidly took her seat but, as she did so, she quickly noticed that something was wrong. First, even though her aunt had brought her the large plate with her food, she seemingly had forgot about cutlery's. And second she was now advancing toward her with a rather large bib in her hands.

“Now, my Little Pretty Princess must not be a messy eater so, I’ll just put this on you and then I’ll help you eating as much as you desire.”

“But, Auntie…” Frankie interrupted “I can eat on my own…?”

“I know you can, Honey, but wouldn’t you prefer to be my Little Pretty Princess? And Pretty Princesses are hand fed by their Aunt.”

Frankie, although the logic seemed somewhat wrong, was feeling conflicted. She knew how to use cutlery but, the thought of being fed seemed to grow stronger within herself as if it was more natural than her eating. Unknown to her it was the mind changing impulse that the witch had planted in her the night before. Although feeling embarrassed by it, Frankie felt herself surrendering to that strange impulse, letting her aunt to take care of her.

Frida smiled as she saw the young girl letting herself go, swiftly she moved beside her and began cutting large pieces of the fatty meats, only to push them forcefully in the young girl mouth.

“Here comes the pla-ane! Open wide, dear…”

At first Frankie felt humiliated by the treatment but, as more and more food was offered to her by her aunt, she began to enjoy it. Here she was, treated just like a Princess, being fed the most delicious dish she had ever dreamed of, and she hadn’t need to lift a finger for it. In truth she was starting to truly enjoy this pampering even though she still felt kind of embarrassed to be treated as a little kid.

The witch instead was enjoying this immensely, more so knowing that Taylor was trying to spy on them, looking rather enviously at her little sister. Maybe she could take advantage of that in the future but, for the moment she had to completely fill the little girl in front of her.

As time passed, even though Frankie had a remarkable capacity, she reached her limit. Burping and belching she began to solely caress her overburdened belly, trying to sooth it but, just as she did so she saw her aunt bringing forward another bite to her.

“Auntie, I’m…*Urp*…fullie…Can’t…”

But before she could finish Frida pushed between her lips the fork with the greasy fried pork, forcing her to chew on it.

“Now, now, honey. Pretty Little Princesses must eat to grow healthier. You still have lot more to eat before calling it quits.
Open wide, here come the tra-ain!”

Just as Frakie swallowed, so another bite was rapidly forced into her mouth. Slowly she munched on it, feeling both pain and pleasure. Her overdistended belly gurgled painfully, but the taste in her mouth was so good. It was just a shame, for Frankie, that as soon as she swallowed the delicious taste disappeared with the morsel. After some time, finally the plate had been licked clean. Frankie was now breathing hard, feeling as if in her gut there was a heavy bag of cement. Without even the strength to burp, she tiredly looked up and had just the time to open widely her eyes in shock and surprise as she saw her aunt place in her mouth a large baby bottle.

Unable to do anything else she began swallowing, feeling a rather strange taste in her mouth. It wasn’t very tasty but, it wasn’t so bad either.

“Good girl, drink it all up. Seriously, you really had to be thirty. That’s it…to the last drop.
Good job Honey!”

Frankie, feeling herself stuffed to the gills couldn’t do more than absentmindedly nod at her aunt words, although she blinked in surprise as she heard her Aunt still complimenting her.

“You’re such a good Little Princess, aren’t you Frankie? Yes you are. You’re so good you just drank all the oil I’ve used to fry your meal… What good Little Princess you are.

Now, rest a bit. Pretty Little Princesses have to have their naps…”


Taylor, Meanwhile, was cleaning out the last few snacks her aunt had given to her. And yet, even though she felt herself full, she kept going. She had seen how her Aunt treated her little sister and, although she felt in the back of her mind that there was something wrong, she also felt envious of Frankie.

Due to this she began to attack even more vigorously her food, stopping only when she realized that, in her anger, she had cleared all plates and had started eating the muffin like armrest of the couch. Whimpering a bit she turned a fearful gaze toward her Aunt, seeing her moving toward her.

“A-Auntie…I…I didn’t mean….I did not wanted to…”


Frida, having seen already what had happened moved closer to the whimpering twenty-ish girl seating on the couch, simply gazing at her silently as she took in her fattened body and bloated middle, all covered in crumbs and chocolate stains.

“Cutie Pie?”

“I…I swear…*Burp*….Auntie…I didn’t want to…*Hiccup* to damage your couch….”

“Shh…There, there sweetie. You haven’t done nothing wrong. These things just happens. Now, wait a moment for me and we will try to stop these hiccups of yours….”

Taylor kept sitting there, occasionally grabbing a few handful from the already broken armrest, waiting for her aunt to return.

After some time, she saw her coming back, holding a huge tray in both hands, while balancing on it there were…..
1523221321211121242112.title: Every child needs it…None wants it. What is it?

choices: Summon a magical helper to assist her in fattening the two Hathaway girls
Animate Taylor’s food so that it would directly push itself in her mouth
Focus only on Taylor, letting Frankie sleep some more
Focus on Frankie, letting Taylor sleep some more
15232213212111212421122.content:
Frida looked at the girl on the couch once more, as she walked toward her. She still couldn’t believe how easily Taylor had fallen under her influence of acting as if she was a small ten-year old girl. Yet, she couldn’t say she wasn’t enjoying it.

As she approached her she placed the, quite heavy, tray on the nearby small table and began caressing the girl on her rounded out middle.

“Now, Cutie Pie, try to hold still and we will cure you of this pesky hiccup, ok?
Stay still…I’ll just place this…here… Good, such a good girl you are.”

As Frida kept talking, she placed the funnel on Taylor’s mouth, directing the girl to keep it there with her own hand. Then she explained to her what was going to happen and how to be a good girl and not let a single drop to fall out.

“Cutie Pie, I’m going to pour you my own recipe for a healthy shake, you just have to swallow it down, take your pace but don’t be too slow or it won’t have any effect….”

That being said she grabbed the first two-liter pitcher and began to pour its contents into the funnel, letting Taylor gulping it down at her own pace. At first she swallowed it slowly but, soon enough she herself began to increase her pace, until Frida had to constantly refill the funnel with more shake.

Taylor felt that divine taste in her mouth and kept drinking it in earnest, some drops of it began to fall from her almost closed lips but she couldn't care less. She was only concerned with filling her body with as much as she could hold of that special Shake that her Aunt had made just for her. As she swallowed she realized why she had been feeling insecure all day about her situation there. It wasn't that she thought there was something wrong. She simply needed her Aunt attention to be on her. It had to be that the reason for her feelings.

She knew Aunt Frida loved her dearly, given the fact that she had given her since a long time her nickname of 'Cutie Pie' but, always seeing her treating Frankie as a Princess had made her jealous of her own little sister. But now, Aunt Frida was taking care of her for once, caressing her bloated belly, encouraging her to grow more and more healthy. Pushing her to go over her limits to become the beautiful little girl she had to be.

Even the 'incident' of before, her outgrowing the pajama top, which she had still on. Also that had to be Taylor call for attention toward her Aunt. And it had worked for a time until, she realized, she had blew it for what? Watching some cartoon on television? How could have she been so foolish?

But it didn't matter, she had finally made it. Now she only had to keep her doing what her Aunt wanted so that maybe Aunt Frida would spend more and more time with her.

As Taylor reached that conclusion the last part of her true self fell back in the deepest part of her mind. Unable to emerge against the influx of new memories and childish logic, the True Taylor could only cry in silence as she slowly merged with the darkest shadows of her own mind, quickly forgotten and left out.

So Taylor kept drinking, while Frida kept encouraging her, while always checking how the girl middle was faring.

‘Yeah, she’s really fallen into her role. She’s trying her best to fulfill her aunt’s wishes. And look at her gut, it seems to be inflating right under my watch, growing bigger and more bloated at her every swallow.

I reckon that with some five liters in she should be ok for quite a while…’

As time passed, Taylor kept swallowing up more and more of those health-shakes her aunt was giving her.

It didn’t matter anymore the reason for which se was doing that, it didn’t matter that her hiccups had stopped already, nor it mattered the attention she was receiving from her Aunt. Taylor kept swallowing more because her Aunt was giving her more.
And Frida was pouring more since the girl was drinking more of it. It seemed to be the start of an unending cycle which was bringin pleasure to both women.

As the fourth pitcher had been emptied Taylor began to feel strange. She was having a good feeling, deep within herself, something primal, something for which her childish mind didn't know how to name but, it was there. Unable to restrict herself any further she began moaning, as she tried to move herself, but her hugely bloated, shake filled belly wasn't letting her change position, keeping her pinned there as more shake was being poured within her.

It was then that her Aunt stopped pouring. Frida had noticed that the girl body was reacting strangely, as if the girl was aroused. So, to prevent her from remembering she stopped, mentally taking note to visit her that same night to make sure that she didn't think of herself more than of ten-years old. Also, she had noticed that, even though the girl was willing to continue, she had reached her limit and so she simply began to soothingly massage the over-bloated orb that Taylor would have called belly.

“Good Job, Cutie Pie. You see, no more hiccups.”

“You…were…right..Auntie...
Still..I feel…so sleepy now…

Auntie?”

“Yes, Cutie Pie?”

“I love you…I don't want...to ever...leave...”

With that Taylor crashed on her back, collapsing against the couch feeling way too full and too tired to even think about going to sleep. She just fell back and slept away, trying to recover from her humongous meal she had just consumed.

As the enormously bloated girl sleeping on the couch, as her stomach gurgled ominously trying to digest the huge load of calories it had received, Frida kissed her lightly on her cheek, stopping near her ear to whisper softly something to her.

"Don't ya worry, Cutie Pie. I'll make sure that you'll never be able to leave. You can count on it..."

As frida said that, she could see how Taylor seemed to smile contently as she returned to her deep sleep, just as if she had heard her. The witch, then, looked at the two stuffed girls, both sleeping so deeply that a bomb could have exploded right there and both would have simply kept on sleeping.

‘Oh Yes, Girls. If you enjoyed this morning together…you’ll definitively love the rest of your days here.’

For the rest of the morning, Frida let the two girls to sleep off their respective feasts but, as soon as the clock banged loudly the two pm, she began to wake her nieces up from their slumbers. Once more she helped both of them to reach the table in the kitchen, Frankie was beginning to have some issues moving around, not that that stopped her from doing her hardest to move and reach her seat at the table. Meanwhile also Taylor needed some help due to her still rather full-ish belly, which sloshed noisily around, still partly filled as it was with her healthy-shakes.

Frida had prepared for th two of them a veritable feast of sort to be consumed as lunch.

She was going to hand feed Frankie, so to make it look like it was a normal occurrence, but she also had to keep following Taylor.

As she though about her dilemma she realized she had a couple of solutions…
15232213212111212421122.title: Shake and funnel for fast consumption

152322132121112124211221.content:
Lunch time was approaching, and Frida knew that she had to take care of both the girls but, while handfeeding Frankie she couldn’t properly follow Taylor’s growth, so she had to find a way to keep both girls under her care. But she had a solution readily at hand.

Smiling wickedly, she went into the kitchen to gather a few ingredients, including the Girl Pie she had stored in the high cupboards. Quietly at first, but cackling quite loudly in the end, Frida began to throw ingredients into a small cauldron she had previously stashed into a cupboard, while also reciting some alchemical formula’s. As she kept going a thick smoke began to exude from the cauldron until it formed a cloud within which two eyes opened. These eyes were inhumanly alluring, perfectly shaped and completely alien.

“Rise from your resting place, Gluttinia! I, Frida of the Dark arts, command you!”

“Mmmm…What is it? I was sleeping you know? It’s not even midday….”

Frida had to choke back an angry retort. It was always like this with the demoness. She had always to ruin every scene she used to rouse her from her sleep.

“Gluttinia…It’s half past noon, now. And I need your assistance…So Do as you Master Comman…”

“Yeah…yeah…I got you the first time. No need to shout oh, so powerful, Master…”

The voice coming from the cloud was undeniably alluring and had quite the charm in it, although Frida knew it was also mocking her.

“Er…Right. Then Come here and help me…you ungrateful demoness…” As Frida began grumbling she also dissipated the cloud and waited. And waited some more.

As she was ready to explode with rage, a portal opened up on the floor and from there appeared a young looking demoness, with indigo skin and a pair of cutely horns on her head. Dressed in skimpy clothes she began to move alluringly toward the witch, only to stop suddenly when she saw that Frida was looking at her with a bored look.

“What?”

“Look, Gluttinia. I know I don’t usually have you do a whole lot but, at least, could you please watch from time to time what’s going on in here?!

I’ve two girls in the other room whom I’m fattening up, convincing them to be little girls and for which I need your help in dealing with. And you appearing here dressed like that is not going to work!”

The demoness looked around seeing the two girls, one a twenty something and the other a ten something years old, sprawled around the room.

“Oh! I didn’t saw them last time I checked…are they new?”

Once more Frida mentally slapped herself on the face. Gluttinia could be a valid gluttony demoness but was also as vapid as one could be.

“Yes. They are new. And they also tried to kill me.
So, I’ve convinced them both to be younger, then I’m going to fatten them up and, when I decide they’re ready, I will eat them!

Now, can you give me a hand in following this plan?”

The demoness laughed at the angry tone of the witch but then, suddenly, she began to act more seriously. Swiftly, with a snap of her fingers, she changed her clothes and her physical appearance, assuming the shape and clothing of a young woman of the same age as Frida, dressed in skinny jeans and a tight tube top. Her features changed as well, her skin becoming that of a tanned young woman, with quite long blond hair.

“Now, do you prefer me this way Frida? I was just joshing you. You’re way too serious sometimes.

Anyway, how are we going to make it work? I’m a friend of yours? Close friend perhaps?”

The witch, stunned into silence with the quick change of pace, scrolled her shoulders and began to lay out her plan.

“Alright, you’re going to be a cousin of mine, Tina Glutts, coming here to visit and you’ll focus on Taylor, the twenty something girl that’s laying on the couch. Remember, they must not be reminded of being actually more grown that what they think to be.

Taylor there believes to be a twelve-year-old…and Frankie here, instead, I’m forcing her to behave as if she’s five or six.

Ok, now help me place yourself inside their memories and then we can wake them up. It’s time for lunch and both girls need to grow way more healthily than what they currently are.”

Working quickly the two of them managed to add that little detail of Tina coming over a few times to help Frida out with her girls, so as soon as they were up, Taylor and Frankie shouldn’t have any worries about her.

When Taylor woke up she found herself sprawled on the couch, as someone was soothingly caressing her middle. As she groggily looked at her belly she saw that it wasn’t as bloated as before, instead it had grown soft and had reduced slightly its size, while still being quite a large paunch.

As her stare rose she saw who was caressing her so sweetly and a small peep of joy escaped her lips.
It was Tina, her aunt cousin, and the one person, excluding Frida, to which she felt more connected with.

“Aunt Tina! You’re here? When…?”

The demoness, who had placed herself in Taylor’s memories as one of the few favorites of the girl, smiled at her sweetly, while still caressing that soft paunch.

“Just a few minutes ago. I was going to visit Frida to see how she was doing but, I was hoping to meet you.”

“M-Me?” Taylor felt herself blushing as she tried to sit more decently on the couch.

“Sure” Replied Tina “I see you’ve grown healthier since last time…and yet you’re still so skinny. That won’t do. I’ll help you fill out and becoming the healthiest girl around. Would you like that, sweetie?”

Taylor, squealing in joy simply moved forward encasing Tina in a tight, and yet soft, hug.

“Yes, Tina! Thank you so much!”


Meanwhile, in the other room, Frankie had woken up.

Also she was noticing that her body had seemed to go with some changes. It wasn’t anymore as bloated as it had been and she neither felt so painfully stuffed. Looking around she saw she was still in the kitchen but she had been moved on a comfy plush chair, which didn’t actually restrict her movement but was even bigger tan her. As she looked down she tapped her belly a couple of times noting how soft and squishy it was, even though she couldn’t see her feet anymore. Her belly in fact had grown bigger with all she had consumed, overlapping her legs up to the knee, dividing itself in three large belly rolls.

Still, as she sniffed around, she smelled a delicious and tasty smell coming from behind her and, craning her neck she tried to see what it was but, her Aunt Frida voice stopped her.

“Hi Princess…Had a good nap? Good.
Now, I was going to wake you up since it’s almost lunch-time but wanted to tell you something first. Just wanted to let you know that Aunt Tina will be staying with us for a few days.

Do you remember her, don’t you?”

Frankie, her mind sluggish from the constant reminder of being actually younger than what she really was, took a little time to think about it but, in the end, she nodded, making her double chin jiggle a bit as she did so.

“I remember her…Auntie. She’s…the Blonde auntie…isn’t she?”

“Yes, she is. What a smart little girl you are.
Now, you hungry, sweetie? I’ve got quite a lot of food to place in your, so little, belly…”

As Frida said that she began taking large spoonful’s from a nearby pot of enchanted fattening casserole and began to push them into Frankie’s mouth, the girl accepting each load with a smile as she felt her hunger grow at each bite. With every spoonful, the witch, also kept encouraging the girl while using those catch-phrases so commonly used with little children.

“Open up, here comes the plane landing in Airport mouth…There we go…and now once more, another plane incoming….”


end part 1...onto part 2! ( character count limit reached for the whole chapter, verdammt!)
152322132121112124211221.title: Enters Miss Glutts, Succubus of Gluttony (part 1)

choices: give an XXL sweatpants and top to Taylor and go check on Frida, with her.
Offer her a pair of short shorts and a sleeveless shirt, then return to the couc
Forget about clothes, leave her in her undies and focus on her growth there!
As Tina keep on searching, let’s see what’s happening in the kitchen…
1523221321211121242112211.content:
Frankie kept eating all that her aunt provided her with, feeling her own belly beginning to bloat up and out, filling up on delicious food. And yet, as much as she ate, she still felt hungry. Slowly, she began caressing her bloating middle with her fattened hands, her eyes were deeply lodged in whatever new morsel her Aunt was spoon feeding to her.

As time went on, and several pans of casserole and stew were consumed, Frankie began to feel some tightness compressing her. Looking down she could see that her pajamas were getting awfully tight but, she knew, that was a good sign. That meant only that she was growing healthy!

As the last spoonful of cake passed within her lips, she saw her auntie put down her spoon and, for a moment, she began to worry that lunch was already over. But then Frida turned again on her, this time with a small hose, pushing it gently against her lips.

“Now, Pretty Little Princess, it’s time to drink something to clean up your mouth. Here it comes, the chocolaty river is coming!”

As she said that Frankie’s mouth was inundated by a slightly chocolaty shake, but she swallowed it anyway since it was what her aunt wanted her to do. Gulping down, load after load, Frankie could only stare as he own belly began to inflate faster than before, pushing more and more tightly against the confine of her pajamas. Yet, she kept drinking it down, focused only on the lovingly smile that her Auntie was giving her.

Sadly, all good things had to come to an end and after some time, the shake stopped coming and Frida removed the small hose from Frankie’s mouth. Letting the girl release a loud and wet belch.

“Was it good, Princess?” Frida said as he cleaned with a napkin the slightly smeared face of the girl.

“T’was…good.*Belch*….But…Auntie…I’m still…hungry…*urp*”

“Well, if my Little Pretty Princess is still hungry…I shall feed her, shouldn’t I?”

The witch smiled wickedly as she saw the potential of the clothes outgrowing thingy. Both girls were going to push themselves so big, she only had to summon larger and larger clothes for them.

In truth Frankie was feeling quite full already, but she wanted to see herself bursting out of her pajamas and so decided to keep on eating. If her big sister had done so she could. True, she was already healthier than her big sis, but it didn’t matter to her. She had to grow more.


Meanwhile, Taylor was feeling strangely ravenous.

She was there, sitting on the couch with an oversized éclair in one hand and a similar sized donut in the other, while a large mound of food was already waiting for her on the nearby coffee table, and Aunt Tina was beside her, constantly telling her how beautiful she was going to be as she kept ‘growing up’. Taylor kept biting first one and then the other an yet she wanted to have more. Much more.

Unnoticed in her eyes, for every bite she had her belly didn’t seem to be bloating up but, apparently it simply grew fatter and wider, as the rest of her body was doing. It was as if anything she ate was immediately converted in new adipose tissue and, due to this, she was constantly feeling hungry. Soon enough, as several dozen donuts were resting in her large stomach, she felt a couple of tiny rips and suddenly the pajama top she was wearing as a jacket simply ripped, leaving her naked from the torso up.

Tina, immediately, hugged her lovingly.

“You’re such a good girl, Taylor. Look at you, growing out so healthy! Now, finish quickly those donuts and then we go to our room to help you change into something else. You can’t stay like this…”

The girl, quickly polishing off the donuts, tried to stand on her own but suddenly realized that it was going to be more difficult than she remembered. For every time she tried to stand, the weighty belly she was sporting kept pinning her down. With a curious glance she tried to move it aside, to lift it to see if something was blocking her movement but, didn’t see nothing. Suddenly, though, she found herself being helped up by Tina.

The young woman, apparently without any issue, lifted the girl up and helped her standing and waddling around the room as she directed toward the bedroom she shared with her sister. As they waddled around, Taylor was initially surprised as Tina suddenly pushed a whole large meatball into her mouth.

Questioningly she tried to look behind her, but Tina simply pushed another one in and whispered to her in her ear.

“Now now, Sweetie…this will be our secret, ok? Frida may want you to focus only on the sweets but, I think that some meat would do you good. Just keep eating and don’t worry about it, honey…”

Taylor, swallowing down the latest morsel simply accepted the next one, chewing it as fast as she could. If she had to say the truth, she was feeling quite naughty in keeping a secret from Aunt Frida but, as Tina said it was going to be a secret between the two of them. And better yet, the meatballs were delicious!

With each waddle they took to reach the bedroom, Tina managed to sneak in Taylor’s mouth another meatball. By the time they were in the bedroom the girl was beginning to feel tired by lugging all that weight around, and yet was satisfied by having eaten so much already. As they stood in the room, Tina helped Taylor to lay on the bed, as she also undressed her, and soon left in her had a large bowl chocked full of triple chocolate chip cookies.

“Here, sweetie, as I search for something comfortable for you to wear, you have this little snack, ok?”

Nodding, and already munching noisily, Taylor began to stuff those amazing cookies into her maw, blind as always to the effects that all that food was having on her body. As she laid on the bed, she couldn’t see how large it had grown. Her already big bust had grown even more, but had lost its perkiness, slapping down on her hugely fattened middle. Her breast in fact had grown so big that they had started to be forced on either side of her, divided by her humongous belly. This one was a sight for sore eyes, it jutted hugely outward, obscuring everything below it for a t least one foot in range. When not full, it divided itself in two large belly rolls and a very deep bellybutton.

But it wasn’t the only thing that had grown.

Her legs and her rear had also inflated, her legs were now almost as big as tree trunks, forcing them to be always in touch, no matter how spread apart they were. Her butt instead was growing larger and wider by the minute, accumulating so much fat that was starting to jiggle at her every step.

All in all, per Tina estimation, Taylor had to be a tad below the three hundred pounds already and, at the rate they were fattening her up, it wouldn’t take long to let her reach five or six hundred.

Still, as she refilled the bowl of cookies for taylor, Tina still had to find something for her to wear but what?

And, also, she had heard some strange sounds coming from the kitchen, she wanted to quickly wrap it up in there and go see what was going on….
1523221321211121242112211.title: Miss Glutts, Gluttony Succubus ( part 2)

choices: Both girls dream their past and realize they’ve been tricked!
Only Taylor remember the truth of their origins
It’s a momentary flash, she forgets about it as she thinks of the next meal
Tina heard them talking and prepare countermeasures
15232213212111212421122111.content:
As Taylor kept blindly stuffing her mouth with more of those fattening cookies, Tina soon found something she could use in the wardrobe. It was a pair of very large sweatpants with their matching top. Quickly she grabbed it and, as the girl kept munching, she helped her to put it on.

“There we go, Sweetie…First one leg…then the other, yes. That’s it.
Much better, don’t you think?”

Taylor, swallowing down the last cookies in the bowl was ow able to look at herself I the mirror in the room, she looked at her reflection with a moment of surprise, seeig herself so wide and large. As she looked she saw her belly jutting forward, and slapping lightly on her thighs down to her knees, and, as if she couldn’t believe it, she used her hands to try and hug her own belly.

“Is…Is that really all of me?”

As she said that she turned around and her stare got fixed on her jiggling buttocks which created a jiggling shelf behind her back.
As Tina confirmed it, Taylor let out a little squeal of joy. She was finally growing healthier! She was soon going to reach her little sister and finally be healthy as Aunt Frida wanted.

Giggling like the little girl she thought she was, she turned and hugged fiercely Tina, until the young woman moved aside.

“Now, Don’t let it go to your head. You’re still a long way to be perfectly healthy.
So, why don’t we go to the kitchen and see how Frida and your sister are doing?”

As the two of them moved from the bedroom toward the Kitchen, Tina kept on stuffing Taylor mouth with goodies, ranging from muffins to hot dogs. The girl could only open her mouth, chew and swallow and then repeat the process as they moved toward the kitchen. She felt comfortably good in the new clothes too and that was a challenge, since now she had to outgrow those too to keep growing healthier.


As the two of them waddled toward the Kithcen, Frida was encountering the first problems of dealing with a little child.

“Come on, Princess, open up…the plane is waiting for the airport…”

Frankie had kept eating all that Frida kept pushing within her lips but, feeling herself quite full and bored she didn’t want to continue. Plus, her body felt strange. And her arms heavy.

In truth the Frankie that had seated on the chair at the table was vastly different from the one that was currently seated there. First of all, her massive butt had grown hugely, overflowing the chair leaving the little girl in an uncomfortable position, made all the more painful by the diaper she was wearing.

Also her belly had grown in stride, becoming so big that it began to hang lower than her knees and, while seated as she was, she could feel every gram of its huge weight on her back. All in all, she had grown as a small blubbery mountain and could feel every gram of her weight seated as she was.

Due to the brainwashing Frida had performed on her, Frankie couldn’t even think of suggesting to be moved somewhere else, she simply knew that something was wrong and painful and she didn’t want to continue doing anything,

Frida was reaching her limit with that girl.

She had to be already at four hundred pounds, if not even more, and yet she refused to eat and do as she was told. It was so frustrating that she was going to scare the shit out of her, blowing her cover, just to force her to start eating again. Luckily for her, Tina and Taylor arrived just in the nick of time and, while Taylor began to play a bit with her sister fat body, the Demoness tried to calm down the witch.

“What’s happening, Frida?”

“Is that Girl! She doesn’t want to eat!
No matter how much hunger spells I cast on her she still refuses to eat!
It’s driving me nuts!”

Tina, looking closely at the hugely obese Frankie, could only point out what she thought was obvious.

“You said she’s refusing to eat? And that she doesn’t answer anymore?”

“Correct…I don’t know what to…”

“Well, maybe if you let her stay on the floor she would stop crying and start eating again…”

Frida topped in mid-sentence. Why would the girl cry? She had casted enough spell to not let her feel the pain from overstuffing her... As she gave a proper look, now that she was at a certain distance she could clearly see what the issue was.

“So she was refusing to eat since she was in pain? But why didn’t she tell me?”

“Well, Frida…for one who had a lot of children in this house you know very little about them. She was in pain but she didn’t want to disappoint you. So she just stopped eating, hoping you would get the message.

If you convince her to be a little child, you cannot expect her to articulate a conversation, you know?”

With the situation defuse, between Frida and Tina, they managed to let the humongous fattened Frankie down from her chair, to rest comfortably on a few pillows directly on the floor. With the pain gone Frankie felt once again the good pain of being hungry in her belly.

“A-Auntie…my…tummy…is…hungry….”

The witch smiled at the girl, while moving closer to her, bringing forward a trolley with many kind of fattening recipes ready for consumption.

“Here I come, sweetie…open up!” and she added, as she saw Taylor sitting at the table,” And you Cutie Pie? Have you finally outgrown the last of your pajama? Good Job! That's my Cutie Pie! Tina will be with you in a moment to help you grow out more and more…”

Soon enough both girls were enough submerged by a deluge of sugary treats, Frankie, messily trying to eat as fast as Frida pushed more and more food in her maw. Quickly covering her face in grease and juices, still the little girl, although she found she couldn’t move her arms of legs, she still kept eating whatever her Auntie Frida brought to her.

She was the adult and she knew how to become healthy.

Taylor instead was feeling like putty in the hands of Tina. She blindly consumed anything the young woman brought her to eat. Her stomach had begun to hurt a bit, but she didn’t want to disappoint Tina by asking for a breather. She simply kept swallowing down loads of cakes and pies, as her body began to swell outward and outwards.

And yet, as Tina fed her, she could feel her own body answering to her commands slower than before. As she kept accepting any morsel provided she simply decided to think about it later, when food wasn’t around.


This pace kept going for all afternoon and ofr most part of the evening, until Frida and Tina finally decided to let the two girls have a well-deserved night of rest. After tucking them both to bed, the witch and the demoness, left them alone in their room, preparing the banquet needed to fatten them up even more in the following day.

Finally alone, although overly full, both Frakie and Taylor could have a moment to chat with the other.

“So…Frankie…how...*urp!*…was your…day?”

“*Beelch*…Auntie Frida…gave me…so much…food…so good…gonna grow…so healthy”

“Yeah. *Hurf!* Me too…Yet…something…is strange…”

“What…Big…Sis?”

“I…I can’t…seem…to move…my arms…I would…like to …caress my…belly but…I Can’t…”

“Same…Here…I can…barely…move…but who…cares? There is…food…good food….and…we’re…growing…Healthy!”

Taylor was going to give her sister confirmation but, suddenly, she had a flash of in front of her eyes.

She saw a girl similar to her, but more grown up, trying to push a, still rounded but smaller than now, girl similar to Frankie.

Something was indeed strange. Yet, she couldn’t place where she had seen that image..
15232213212111212421122111.title: Clothing issue:Solved. Situation assessed:Not yet

choices: Don’t tell her anything. Better to wait and see…
Tell her! She’s been crying for Frankie! She must be able to provide some help!
Try to guess her intention using a coded phrase as Tina did to her before
Tell or not to tell? Mmmm…Is that food? I'm growing hungry. It may help think.
152322132121112124211221112.content:
That night Taylor slept like a log. She had eaten a lot of food, and gained a lot of weight, in the span of a few days. BY logic it shouldn’t have been possible but for Taylor it still was true. Yet, as she slept, the thought of all the food eaten seemed to bring to her mind a memory she had seemingly forgotten.

In her dreams she saw herself, although her dream herself was a mature twenty something young woman, and her sister. While her sister was already quite ballooned up, she herself hadn’t gained all that she was currently sporting on her frame. Both girls were fleeing from something. Something that apparently terrified them… Then she saw dream Frankie getting stuck in a door and that monster managed to reach them and attack dream Taylor.

As Dream Taylor faced that monster, the creature identity revealed itself as none other than…Her Aunt Frida!

Taylor woke up with a start. Breathing raggedly as she tried to recover from the nightmare.
It wasn’t real. It couldn’t be real…and yet, as she looked around, at the room they were staying in, at her body, overgrown with fat, she realized it was real.

It hadn’t been a nightmare in her sleep. She WAS living the Nightmare.

Somehow, the monster she remembered as Aunt Frida was the same Aunt Frida which had grown them in that house. At that moment something else broke in Taylor’s mind.

‘How can that be?
Aunt Frida grew us up in this house since our mom left us here…And yet...It seems so right that we have had a mom that has seen us growing up.

I…Am I going crazy?’

As she stopped and tried to recollect her childhood memories, which seemed strange to do since she was a child, she began to remember things that didn’t coincide wit the life she was having there. She remembered her passion for gymnastics, Frankie’s love for books…But how could it be? Unless…

It was then that, in her mind, the dam broke down. The spell that was keeping her memories from couldn’t hold any longer under the stress she was putting in remembering and, everything she did in her life, every achievement, every joyful laugh with her mom, every moment, including the last meeting with the witch, came back to her. For a minute or so Taylor sat silent on the bed until she whispered, her voice seething with hate and anger, toward the culprit of this all.

‘That witch! She did this to us.

She must have casted a spell on us to forget about everything and remember only her. But how can I tell Frankie about this?

She still believes in the tale that the witch told us. She still believes to be younger than she is…’

In all this, as she mulled it over, she realized with a sudden start that she had a bigger problem before her.
For, as she was thinking for a solution, absentmindedly, she grabbed a piece of the bed and munched on it, swallowing and taking a second one. When she realized what she had done, she almost shrieked from the shock.

‘Crap! She got me this addicted to this stuff? No…It’s the eating. She got me addicted to eating. I gotta be careful, if I get too big I will never leave this place.’

But, she knew it wasn’t going to be easy.
She had to manage to stay alone with her sister, to try and wake her up from the spell of the witch and, at the same time, she couldn’t just stop eating, otherwise the witch would realize she wasn’t anymore under her control. As she sat there, trying to curb her eating at least during the night, she began to lay down her plan.

‘I need to get the witch distracted. But how? There is no way she would leave us alone…unless we aren’t alone! Yes.
Aunt Tina!’

She tried, again to search her memories for Aunt Tina but, apart from a quick series of flashes she couldn’t see her anywhere. And yet, the monster in her dream had been only Frida. Was that supposed to mean that Tina was also an innocent caught in the web of the Witch? Ow that she thought about it, Tina seemed rather against the Witch, in small ways.

Maybe it was the only way she could show that she wasn’t a slave of that monster?

‘Or maybe, what she said to me yesterday was her way of saying that she could back me up? Didn’t she said that it was a secret we shared together against Frida?

Yes, that must be it. She is forced, as us, to be here and her only way to tell me had to be to say that.
And I blindly did nothing! Stupid, Taylor.

But, shall I try to approach her tomorrow?’

She didn’t want to fall asleep but, her being able to broke through the witch spell took out all her energies and so, without even realizing, Taylor fell asleep.

When she woke up the following morning, she tried all she could to keep up the façade of still being under the witch spell. In truth, she didn’t really had to push herself that much. Her own gluttony had been growing since she had arrived and so, when she waddled beside her little sister, noticing how really big Frankie had become, she quickly felt the hunger awakening within herself. Still, even though she almost lost it, she managed to rein in her gluttonous hunger, and stopped herself to eat until the food induced coma.

But her sister wasn’t as fortunate.

Frankie, still thinking to be younger than she already was, kept accepting every food laden spoon that Frida gave her, until she was as round as a ball, and literally full to the brim. Taylor, faking herself napping, saw that the witch seemed to be pleased and slowly watched her as she got out of the kitchen.

In that moment, Taylor realized she was alone with her sister but, Frankie was out of commission. Stuffed full of anything edible, she was completely out of her senses. And yet, Taylor, had to do something. She couldn’t just wait for Frankie to be in herself, she couldn’t wait for another chance.

‘Who knows if the longer I stay here, I wouldn’t succumb to the hunger I still feel deep in my body?
I don’t want to grow any fatter but, I can’t even starve myself!’

In that moment, as she looked around, she saw Aunt Tina entering the room. She saw her and again debated with herself if she could reveal her secret to her. She was mostly sure that also Tina was a trapped soul as they were, forced to be there in the witch house against her wishes.


Tina was moving into the kitchen, she saw the little, blob like girl, collapsed onto the floor. Frida had really done a number on her. And yet, the girl seemed to be able to keep growing, larger and wider. As Tina caressed her form, she knew that in a pair of weeks little Frankie wasn’t going to be so little anymore.

Or mobile as she now, however weakly, was.

And yet, a single tear escaped her eyes.

Suddenly afraid she quickly cleared it away, turning wildly around to check if she had been seen. She, Gluttinia, crying over the bloated shape of a little girl? It wasn’t possible.

And yet, deep in her corrupted heart, it was true. Not out of compassion or pity to the girl. She was only envious of her.
Yes, she remembered the old times, when she was a free demon, able to travel around the planes and grow herself as big as a planet! But now she was in the service of the Witch, Frida. And had to respect her rules.

Clearing away her tear, she made to turn and walk away, but a flicker of movement behind her picked her curiosity.



Taylor had been afraid of having been found out when Tina entered the room but, all her fears had melted away when she aw the woman cry at the sight of Frankie.

‘YES! She must be forced to stay here with us! She might even be able to help me remain alone with Frankie!

I can’t back down now. I’ve got to let her know that she’s not alone.

That I gained back my memories…If I don’t do it now, It may be too late…

And yet, I still have doubts if it is really a good idea…’
152322132121112124211221112.title: Of truths and memories...

choices: Frankie dream of an endless growth
Frida enters the room. She doesn’t know about Tina’s betrayal
Frida rest and recover energies. She sees the betrayal
1523221321211121242112211122.content:
Taylor was still debating within herself when she saw Tina beginning to leave the room, in that moment she reached her decision and called her.

“Er…Aunt Tina? Could I talk to you for a... for a moment?”

The demoness, pivoted on her heel and turned to face the large twenty-ish girl sprawled on the couch, with an expert eye she saw immediately that the girl was only pretending to be stuffed full, and that intrigued her. Why would Taylor try to refrain from eating, and growing healthier, ? There had to be an explanation.

So, she quickly moved beside the already very large girl and sat right behind her, calmly placing her hand on the fattened-up girl, caressing her big belly with slow movements.

“Yes, sweetie? What’s up? Is something the matter?”

Taylor, blushing from the touch and beginning to feel the hunger in her starting to rise once more, knew she had no choice but tell the truth. She had to lift this huge load off her chest before her hunger forced her to lose control. She had to recruit the help of the young woman sitting behind her before she lost all control over herself.

“Y-Yes…I…I…”

“Please, Taylor, tell me. You know you can trust me…”

“I Know what’s going on in here. I know that Aunt Frida is not my aunt and she’s a witch bent on fattening up me and Frankie for whatever reason. And I know she has you I her grasp as well.

I… I need you help to escape this place.”

As Taylor kept talking about the situation and her plan, the demoness was somehow distracted. Tina kept following the girl as she spoke but, Gluttinia was thinking ahead. Taylor had somehow gained back her memories, luckily it appeared that her sister was still ignorant of It all and yet, she had to warn the witch of this. And yet if, somehow, the girls could manage to overpower Frida again, and so kill her, then the contract binding Gluttinia to Frida would be broken and she could finally fulfill her own wishes.
Yet, to betray the Witch so openly was suicide. But the reward would be so good.

The demoness had to think about it and, basically told the same to the girl as she finished speaking.

“…You see, Tina? Me and Frankie can’t stay here much longer or else we won’t be able to move. Will you help us escape?”

“Mhmm... So you have your memories back and you want my aid to escape.
Still, I can’t openly oppose Frida, she would do worse than killing me, if I did that.
Yet, if you managed to escape I could find a way to be freed too.

Listen Taylor, we need to keep appearances up.

So, whenever she’s in the room you’ll have to act as childish as you can, and I will keep on helping you grow, but when she’s not here we will figure out a way to have both you and your sister to leave this place.”

The demoness, standing up from the couch, gave one last caress to Taylor’s cheek before leaving the room.

“I’ll try to find a way for the two of you to leave. Just, don’t let Frida suspect anything or we will both doomed. Now…” As Gluttinia entered once more in character her features softened slightly, “I believe a certain young girl still need to grow healthier, wouldn’t you agree, honey?”

Taylor, quickly realizing that Tina was maintaining appearances quickly nodded and replied in her most childish voice.

“Yes, I do! I will grow healthier for Aunties!”

“Good girl, then here start with these and I’ll bring you more as soon as possible. You need to eat to grow healthy.”

The demoness then pushed a rather large platter covered in sweets to the already quite fat girl n the couch, watching with trepidation as she looked at the platter and then back toward her. Gluttinia could see the fear in the girl’s eyes. She was afraid of losing control and indulge like she did before, up to her stuffing point, which was exactly what the demoness wanted. True, she wanted to be free of the witch but, she still couldn’t let those two beautiful girls leave from there while being still so small.

Taylor instead was looking at the huge platter in her lap, she felt her hunger grow stronger the more she looked at those pastries and yet she was afraid. She realized they had to keep appearances but, she still was afraid of letting herself go near food. Her eyes darted for a moment on the figure of her little sister, slumped on the floor, stuffed so full she had been forced to fall into a sleep so deep it almost seemed a food coma. And yet, the hunger in her kept rising beginning to fill any space in her mind, until she couldn’t stop herself even if she wanted.

With a ferociousness uncommon to her, Taylor began to feast on the sweets and pastries that Tina brought to her, munching and swallowing, biting and burping, quickly mowing down all platters that the woman beside her kept bringing her. As her hunger became less demanding, Taylor began to think about their escape from that place, without realizing that as she was deep in thought, she never stopped herself from reaching for more, nor she noticed that the Demoness kept bringing her more and more food to eat.

The girl kept munching and eating her way through several pies and scones, covering her face in a mess of cream and jam, still she kept scoffing food down her throat. Her already quite big belly growing even more, rounding out wider and wider, as more and more food was pushed in there by the hungry girl.

As the Demoness left a few more platters and cakes near the girl, she once more caressed her head, giving her an affectionate little pat, as she left the room. Gluttinia wasn’t going to betray the girl, that much she had decided but, she wasn’t going to help her either. Fighting the witch would be the worst decision of her, almost endless, life.

Taylor saw Tina leave the room deep in thought. It wasn’t the result she had wished for but, at least, she had now an ally in that madhouse. She now had only to be wary of the witch. As she began formulating plans upon plans on how the escape could made possible, she seemed not to realize how much she was eating, morsel after morsel and handful after handful, her whole body began to grow larger and wider and fatter from consuming so much enchanted food. Her entire form began to occupy more and ore space on the couch, until she alone almost occupied the entirety of it.

And yet, even though she had grown so big and so vast, she kept eating as she was so taken from trying to find a way to save both herself and her little sister.

Meanwhile…
1523221321211121242112211122.title: A shaky alliance

choices: Your hunger will never be satisfied…
you’ll be too dumb to realize that you’re trapped
you’ll be too childish to stop yourself…
Wait a moment…Why aren’t you falling for my spell!?
15232213212111212421122111224.content:
As Taylor and Gluttinia were talking, the Witch had been in her private room to recharge her energies, meditating in silence. As she opened her mind to the other planes and felt the dark energies filling her body with power, her wandering mind brought to her the scene of Taylor sprawled on the couch discussing an escape plan with the demoness of gluttony.

As Frida watched in silence at the betrayal of her minion, she felt a rage she had never felt before invading her limbs. She wanted to scream, to launch all manners of spell all around herself but, she didn’t.

She let herself calm down, as she stewed that rage inside of her, turning it from the blazing hot spike it was to a freezing cold icicle of revenge. She was going to get back at the demoness for turning onto her but, she was going to do it only after the two girls were dealt with. More immediate was the threat formed by Taylor. Somehow, the girl had recovered her memories and managed to bring the demoness on her side.

Frida knew that she had to do something major to prevent any further intromission from the girl. She had tried to dull her mind a bit, hoping that it was going to be enough to stop her, but it had been for naught.

Now, she was going to act accordingly to stop her once and for all.

Awakening her body, she felt herself fully recharged and ready to bring on the plan she had concocted. Frankie was still blind to her real self and, with a hunger spell casted upon her, Frida knew that the girl was going to be so absorbed by her own gluttony to not be able to oppose her in any way.

Taylor, instead, was going to suffer something unpleasant. The witch, although hated the idea of causing unnecessary pain, knew she had to inflict some on Taylor. It was the only way to stop her.

In the kitchen, meanwhile, both girls were awake and were currently keeping themselves busy as best as they could. Frankie, still trapped in thinking herself as a little child was currently sitting down on the mattress on the floor, eating away with her bare hands at an enormous cake that her Aunt Tina had left within her reach. The poor girl couldn’t notice that for each morsel she swallowed her body seemed to grow larger and wider, slowly outgrowing the mattress on which she had been left on. Her body seemed to inflate, constantly albeit slowly, with fat each time she swallowed. Already her torso had grown so massive the she couldn’t stand up on her own even if she wanted to. The more she kept eating, the more she began to resemble an outrageously large reversed ice cream cone. With her butt and hips, encased in the biggest diaper ever seen acting as a jiggly ice cream ball.

Taylor instead was lazing on the couch, trying to eat as little as she could, resisting the urge to scarf down all the delicacies that surrounded her. Given her disposition to indulge if she let herself get distracted, she tried to keep her wits about her every minute, trying to focus her mind on problems and on her own memories. Still, occasionally, her hands seemed to act on their own, grabbing here and there, some of the confectionaries all around her. Her Aunt Tina, although had promised to help them, had nonetheless left all that food surrounding her, under the pretext that the Witch would have found them out otherwise.

Taylor, although fighting back with all her might, didn’t want to look at herself, afraid of losing her mind if she was to realize how big she had gotten. She ignored every sign that her body kept forcing under her eyes, trying to focus herself on something else beside her appearance. Otherwise, by the constant jiggling of her monumental, dome shaped, belly and the related three gravid belly rolls, she would have realized that the three hundred pounds had been already surpassed by a long time. She also tried to ignore the fact that, even though she was sitting on the couch she was way higher than she should have been, the extra thick fat tissue covering her butt forcing her to stand higher than she remembered. Not to talk about her arms or legs, each wider than a tree trunk, causing her issues to simply bend each one of them.

Still, Taylor decided consciously to ignore all of this, focusing all of herself on thoughts about escaping from there.


When Frida appeared in the hallway that would have brought her to the Kitchen, she saw Gluttinia in her human form, standing near the entrance to the kitchen, her eyes riveted on the humongous size of Frankie. Passing beside her, the witch whispered in her ears some false promises, to keep her quiet and not raise any suspicions, before uttering in her ear a magical command, that would force the demoness to lose her own free will.

“Don’t you worry, Gluttinia, when this will be all over, I’ll let you be as big as you wish…for a while of course but, still, enough time to let you recover a bit.”

The demoness, still staring at the huge size of Frankie couldn’t refrain from nodding her head in agreement, before realizing that with that phrase her Master had to know about her betrayal. Before she could turn around or raise her defense, her mind registered the next words from Frida, as she felt her own free will slowly vanishing, until there was only the purest will of obedience toward the witch.

“Gluttinia forzatus indenturabis servitudes…”

The demoness knew what was happening, for an instant she was feeling terribly afraid of losing her own freedom but, as that moment passed and the magical command impressed itself in her mind, all that fear melted into happiness to serve her master.

“How may I serve you, My Lady?”

Frida smiled at the now enslaved demoness, knowing that deep within her mind, she was till as traitorous as she had been, but now forced to feel happy of being a slave to her wishes.

“You shall keep the façade of helping Taylor’s escape plan. You will convince her that the only way to escape from her is to lay low and, to do that, she will have to stuff herself as much as she can.
You will guarantee her that any food given to her will not make her fatter…”

“But it will, no?”

“No…” Frida smiled wickedly “The food you will give her will not make her fat…will do something else to her. Her time will come though.
Now go and do as I commanded you.”

“Yes, My Lady. I shall do as you ordered me.”

The demoness, still under her disguise of Aunt Tina, went then to Taylor, bringing forth the plan concocted by her Master. The twenty-ish girl tried to fight back, to reason with her Aunt Tina but, in the end, could only agree to do as she said. If Tina thought that there was only that way to escape, and she didn’t find a better solution, she could only go along with the plan.

So, she began stuffing herself, letting her gluttony to roam free once more, grabbing whatever sweet confection fell under her grasp to be placed within her lips and swallowed hungrily. The girl didn’t want to admit it to herself but, she had grown to love the feeling of all that food in her mouth and into her globular belly. Suddenly, though, she realized that Tina had been right, the sweets she was consuming didn’t made her larger, nor did they add a single additional pound on her already fattened frame.

With her mind freed of fear, she let herself go with those confections, claiming as many as she could, gobbling them down in haste, trying to sate the hunger that she had tried to leash in within herself.

From the shadows, Frida, watched the girl gorging with wicked grin on her face.

“Yes, Taylor…Eat more…Enjoy it all you can, soon you will forget everything about escaping.

Soon, your only thought will be toward eating since…”
15232213212111212421122111224.title: Seeing is believing...

choices: Frida focus Frankie, Tina to follow Taylor
Taylor followed by Frida, Frankie helped by Tina
Have the two placed beside the other, focus on both
Frida cooking and Tina serving both girls
152322132121112124211221112242.content:
Taylor didn’t know that the witch was observing her attentively, all her focus was now turned on the food surrounding her. She felt wrong to feel so much pleasure in stuffing herself and yet, she kept at it. Blindly following Tina’s plan, thinking that she was still helping her in the releasing from that fattening prison.

Those thoughts, though, didn’t stop her from cleaning all the food around her but, in her mindless indulgence, she failed to notice that the sweets around her kept reappearing every time she cleaned a plate. After the first hour of gorging Taylor saw that the food was still surrounding her, and she began to worry that something about the situation she was in was very wrong. She had left her gluttony roam free, taking control of her actions and now she was unable to stop herself. At first it scared her but, as more and more delicious confectionaries entered in her mouth, so her thoughts began to drift away from her worries. It started so slowly that she barely noticed it happening.

Until she looked at a delicious apple pie and, suddenly, she found herself thinking at the name of the sweet she was going to eat.

Dumbfounded, she stopped for a moment.

She knew it had a name but, for some reason, she couldn’t remember it.

Her body pushed her forward, but a tiny part of her mind started to get, really, worried.

Immediately, as her gluttony-controlled body pressed onward, she tried to recall things she had enjoyed doing or names of persons she had held dear but, she couldn’t. It suddenly seemed too complicated for her to remember anything. Everything around her was becoming more and more difficult to do or to think to.

Feeling a cold shiver on her spine she suddenly turned her head toward the door, and she saw the Witch…Frida? Was that her name? She wasn’t sure but she kind of remembered that something about that person was dangerous. But what it was?
It was then that her personality divided itself I two distinct beings. From one side there was Normal Taylor, unable to stop the flow of events, forced to watch as control disappeared from her and was transferred to her new identity.

Dumb Taylor.

This last one was growing dumber and more foolish with any crumb consumed. Memories, loved ones, names, anything connected to her brain was slowly vanishing, leaving only the simplest commands, rendering her more like a doll than a person. Normal Taylor could have screeched her horror if she had a voice. From her point of view it was utterly terrifying, to see how her world changed based on the POV of that gluttonous bimbo which was now controlling her body. To make matter worse, although she trie to influence her other identity, Normal Taylor realized she was fading away, pushed away as if her identity wasn’t anymore needed to operate her own body.

She couldn’t interact with the world surrounding her, she felt like she was in a dark room, in front of a screen replaying her own life, but with no control over it as shadows began growing around her, obscuring her sight, closing on her and taking away everything from her. As Normal Taylor felt herself being swept away, in the darkest corner of her own mind, she could only whimper and cry, pitifully, as Dumb Taylor took full control of her life.

After a few more morsels, Taylor stared at her surroundings. Wide eyed she looked around trying to figure out where she was and what she was supposed to do. She felt like she had just arrived there, waking up after the longest sleep. Turning around she saw an enormous girl, sitting hugely on the floor, her whole front covered in icing and chocolate. She seemed familiar.
A name sprung in her mind.

‘Frankie? Oh yeah, she’s my little sister Frankie…has she always been that big? Is that normal?’

Frida had enjoyed every moment of Taylor transformation, every instant of her change toward being the most ditzy girl in the entire world. She had especially enjoyed that instant in which the girl realized something was wrong, but was unable to do anything to save herself.

Judging by the girl interrogative glances at her surrounding she knew Taylor was ready. Rapidly she approached her and, staying behind her she began whispering in her ear as if she was voicing her own thoughts.

‘Your name is Taylor. You’re the Big sister of Frankie there…you both came here to this house to grow normal sized. Your sister is growing nicely but she’s still too thin. And you, Taylor, are so much smaller than her.
You know you’re not as smart as her but, you know you can beat her in this.’

Taylor, too dumb to realize someone was behind her, thought that the voice she was hearing was all in her mind. It made perfect sense to her that she had heard her own thoughts. Afterall, she knew she wasn’t as smart as others. And if those “thoughts” were saying the truth than, also the rest had to be true.

“So, like, I’m too, like, thin, uh? Well, duh. Look at her, she is bigger than me…and she’s still thin. So yeah, like, I’ve got to grow…more bigger, right?”

‘Yes, Taylor. You’ve got a long way to go…but your aunt Frida is here to help you both. You know she’s only thinking for your best.’

“Y-Yeah? So, Aunt Frida is good to me? Sounds like, about, right? I…I think, like, so? So, more bigger is, like, more better, isn’t it? Man, it so hard…but, if that’s what I’m thinking, it must be true.”

'You can trust Frida. She knows you. She will act only for your best. You will do willingly whatever she tells you to. She knows more things than you. She…'

The whispering of the witch soon became some sort of lullaby, it was so pleasant to hear it that Taylor could do nothing but enjoy it, learning from it, to impress it deep into her mind. Until it became the basis of what she was. It was then that she understood what was going on. She and her sister had come to that house, to their Aunt Frida, to grow healthy, to finally be big. If her aunt wanted them to become big and healthy it had to be the right thing to do. She did think, for a moment, that she was forgetting something important but, if she indeed had forgot about it, it surely hadn’t been that important.

“So, Aunt Frida will help us be the biggest and healthiest gals around? Yay!”

It was then that the witch appeared from behind Taylor, taking her face within her hands, feeling the young girl bloated cheeks in her hands.

“But of course, dearie. You both are so thin and in need to grow more. Especially you, young lady. Look at your sister. She’s way bigger than you and yet she’s still has to grow a lot to be healthy.”

“So…um…Shall I, like, eat…or something, to get as big as her?”

“Why, Cutie Pie, of course you will…but both of you need to grow bigger. Only bigger children are healthy children. Now, let me prepare you both a snack…let’s turn your bodies into bigger bodies!”

Taylor, giggling childishly, nodded her approval as already her hands grabbed some slices of the cakes surrounding her, stuffing them into her maw. But, as she chewed, she gave a strange look at the woman beside her, looking her over from head to toe.

“But…Aunt Frida? If, like, big is healthy…then…why are you not, like, big?”

The witch turned once more toward the dumbed down girl, swiftly caressing her head with one hand as she pushed another slice of cake through her lips with the other.

“But, dear, that is obvious. I’m an adult. Adults don’t need to grow big…only children, and young ladies as yourself, must. Now, now, less chatting and more eating. Clean all your snacks as I prepare something more substantial for the two of you.”

Taylor, swallowing down what she had been munching on, simply nodded as she began grabbing more sweets from all around her, even taking out chunks from the couch she was seated on. She was still a bit dizzy about something, but if her Aunt said that she had to eat, then that had to be true. And if that was true, so it had to be regarding her size. As she cleared a platter out of the cake it had contained, she quickly gave herself a glance, stealing one then from the form of her sister.

‘Yep. I am smaller than her…so I must be bigger. I’m the Big Sister after all…’

As the witch walked away, she couldn’t stop thinking of Taylor’s figure. The girl was going to be huge now that she had her under her thumb. Her already quite fat rump was soon going to grow softer and squishier, her thighs and legs more like trembling pillars of fat. What to say of her belly, already divided in two hefty belly rolls, she just couldn’t wait to see how many more rolls would appear as soon as she began to grow once more.

Still, before entering the kitchen, she passed beside the humongous form of Frankie.

Looking at her, filled the witch with desire for more. True, the youngest sister had grown hugely, already she wasn’t able to lift herself from the floor, and her arms were growing weaker just as much they were growing fatter. In Frida’s eyes she was almost there, just a little bit more and then she could finally enjoy a good meal. But, she had also to think about the future.

What would happen once the two current girls were done for? She would have to wait for someone else to come at her door…No, she needed to have some additional meals guaranteed. And the only way was to take them from the friends of the two girls. Taylor would be profitable to get new people in, dumb as she had become.

Frankie, instead, was probably going to resist a bit but she too would fall under her control.

But on which of the two she had to start? Was it better to start on Frankie, so to let her grow the needed and extract info on her future meals to come, or maybe it was better to keep her focus on Taylor, since she was so smaller than Frankie?

Choices... choices…
152322132121112124211221112242.title: The making of a fattened Bimbo

choices: The following day Scott Tomlinson come to the house searching for Taylor
The next week Michelle Hathaway arrives, invited by Frida
Emma Hawking and Meadow Macintosh knocked on Frida’s door the following day
Penelope Prittchard has lost herself in the woods and find Frida’s house.
1523221321211121242112211122421.content:
Frida decided to focus firstly on Frankie, in order to have her ready for the oven at the soonest, while also managing to have any of her friend to come to there. With this plan decided she quickly launched a few spells in order to summon some sweets to feed her with and called Gluttinia to her side.

“Listen well, Gluttinia. You shall ow take back the forms of Aunt Tina and will focus yourself in making sure that Taylor grow just as big as her sister. It doesn’t matter how long it takes but, she have to reach, at the very least, her sister in size.

Have you understood?”

The demoness, bowing down quickly, changed her appearance and took once more the form of the young Aunt Tina. Then she left the kitchen, while she summoned some food to give to Taylor.

Frida watched her for a few, enjoying the sight of the dumbed down Taylor as she squealed in delight seeing her other aunt bringing her a cartload of goodies to eat but, before long she resumed her work and brought forth a large trolley of food toward Frankie, enjoying the sight of the immense girl sitting on the floor.

“Princess? Wake up, dearie.”

Frankie woke up with a start, while erupting with her throat with a loud burp, finding herself exhausted just for doing that.

“Uff…Sorry Auntie…”

“No need to be, Dearie. You’re just a growing Princess…Now, are you ready for some more?”

Frankie was feeling hungry alright but, before she could show her auntie that she was ready, a loud sound erupted from her behind, still encased in her diaper. Frankie tried to look behind her but, due to all the fat accumulated on her body was unable to. Still, thinking she was just a child, she didn’t know how to react to that and so she simply stared quizzically to her aunt.

Frida, from her part, had expected something like this to come. She promised herself to cover both girls with a specified spell that would avoid just this kind of situation but, now that the issue was there, she just couldn’t forget about it. With a smile and a caress on Frankie bloated cheek, she helped the huge girl to stand on her own feet, aided by a bit of magic, and then started to navigate her toward the bathroom.

“Now, now, Princess…We need to clean you up, then I’ll give you something very tasty to have…We can’t have you all dirty like this.”

“Why not, Auntie? I’m hungry…”

“I know you are, my little Pretty Princess, but we have to have you clean…otherwise all your friends will not play with you…”

As Frankie waddled slowly, without realizing that it was only thanks to the witch’s magic that she was able to walk, she seemed to recollect something out of her memories.

“Auntie? Is Mommy coming here, too?”

Frida, expecting something like this to happen was already prepared. Quickly infusing some more of her magic into the girl mind she easily cancelled all recent memories from her brain, leaving there only the oldest one, such as her mother and her friends.

“Sure, you only need to give me her phone number and I’ll have her come in here. Would you like that, Pretty Princess?”

Frankie squealed in delight in response, just as they were entering the bathroom and, once there, Frida quickly lifted her and placed her on a sturdy table, cleaning her up and having her wear a new diaper. As she helped her returning to the kitchen, the witch was able to extrapolate the phone number of their mother quite easily and, she promised herself to invite the mother at the soonest.

First, though, she had to fill Frankie up.

Swiftly leaving the young ultra-obese girl on her mattress, Frida soon began to push spoonful after spoonful of food into her mouth, almost giving no time to the hugely fattened young girl to breathe.

“Here comes the pla-a-ne….”

Frankie, from her side, didn’t saw anything wrong in having her aunt feed her so much. Under Aunt Tina ministration she had grown used to these massive portions and was actually beginning to be feeling a bit hungry to say the truth. Still, the news that their mother was soon going to arrive warmed the young girl heart, and between spoonful’s, he even managed to relay the news to her big sister…although Taylor didn’t seemed enthusiastic as much as she was.

“Taylor! Taylor...Mom…is going…to come…soon! Isn’t it…great?”

The bimbo-ed girl, at first, didn’t seem too fazed by this news, focused as she was in being hand-fed by her aunt Tina. But, as a few more bites were pushed within her lips, her mind was able to focus on something else than food and so she turned her head toward her little sister, giving her a dull smile, before returning to focus only on the food she was currently receiving.

Tina, leaving her master to work on the little obese one, focused only on Taylor, letting the girl eat at her own pace. Still, after a mere ten pounds of meatballs and sausages consumed, she saw that Taylor seemed to be slowing down. Refusing to acknowledge that, she began pushing more and more food toward Taylor, trying to entice her into eating more. Taylor, at first, tried to resist. Even as dumb as she was, she felt full and didn’t want to continue, although the food still smelled delicious to her.

“Aunt…*urp*…Tina…I can’t…have…more…too…full…”

“Now, now, Cutie. You barely started. How will you grow healthy and strong if you don’t eat? C’mon…open up…”

Just as she said that, she began with taking a couple of large meatballs from one of the platters she had brought with her and pushed them forcefully within Taylor’s lips. The poor girl, eve tough feeling full, began to chew on those, swallowing down as fast as she could but, still more of those delicious morsels kept being pushed into her mouth. Soon, she felt her own belly grumbling louder and louder until, with a loud snap, her sweats ripped in shreds, letting her belly to expand freely on her lap. Gurgling in pleasure, and pain, Taylor kept munching and swallowing, unable to see how Tina was able to force so quickly and constantly food in her.

After what seemed an eternity, Tina finally stopped, letting Taylor to swallow down the last morsel of food in her mouth and finally breath free of any other impediment. Right at that moment, she heard her sister calling to her, telling something about their mom coming there for a visit. Taylor, still too proven by the sheer amount eaten could do nothing more than reply with a smile, as she noticed that Tina was creeping closer to her holding a new platter within her hands.

“M-More?”

Tina smiled impishly as she brought the platter closer to Taylor’s double chinned face, revealing a large amount of fried sausages and bacon strips.

“Yes, Taylor…You’re so thin. We absolutely need you to grow healthier…open up, Cutie pie.”

Before any thoughts related to how full her belly was, Taylor found herself opening her mouth up, allowing her aunt to force even more food into her, enjoying the taste and the feeling that her overfull belly gave her when confronted with even more food arriving.


Frankie, confusedly stared as her sister focused once more on his food but, before she could ask her if something troubled her, she saw Frida moving on her, a large spoon filled with cake moving toward her own mouth. The little girl didn’t complain, she was actually still feeling hungry for more and so eagerly began once more to accept all spoonful of sweets that her Auntie Frida was pushing on her.
