If she could have look down, she would have seen her huge apron belly growing quite bloated but, actually, not yet full.

Still, with the news that her mother was soon to arrive, she let herself go completely to Frida’s feeding, wanting to show her mom how healthier she was growing.

Frida smiled seeing the girl letting herself go and proceeded to stuff her full, since she was so willing.

She could just imagine how big the two girls were going to be in a week and how their mom would react in seeing them that big, before she too was going to fall under her control.

She could hardly wait…
1523221321211121242112211122421.title: Planning ahead

choices: Next day, Frankie gone on her ‘Trip’, focus on the Hathaway diets…
Oh no! something’s wrong! The oven is too small for Frankie!
Why don’t have a bit of fun before her meal?
Frankie's roasted and ready to be eaten!
15232213212111212421122111224212.content:
As the week progressed, Frida focused on both girls, enjoying how Frankie reached her final stage, getting completely immobile. Becoming nothing more than a pile of fat with hands and feet. She loved seeing the girl trying to move, only managing to make her whole body start to madly jiggle, without moving of an inch. Frankie had become a veritable mountain of fat, her head had already begun to sag a little into a small valley of chins, her neck literally vanished from view. Her arms, so filled with fat, that she couldn’t actually move them, even when she tried to move her hands, or fingers, she noticed that she wasn’t capable, anymore. Her legs had been buried under her apron like belly since a long time already, only indication of their existence given by the indentures in her belly and by her humongous ass, creating a huge wobbling shelf behind her.

Frida could tell that Frankie had reached her limit and was ready to be processed and turned into a very good, very filling, meal. Still, she was waiting for their mother to come, before proceeding. She had actually called her and invited her to her abode, telling her that her daughters were there too, as her guest.

Her mom had sounded both relieved and worried about her daughter’s wellbeing, although Frida did her best to reassure her that both the girls were healthy. She almost laughed out loud as the call ended, when she saw Taylor covering the marzipan couch, she was on, with her mass. The witch had constantly given the girl new outfits, always in larger sizes, enjoying immensely as the girl burst out of any of them.

She looked at her as she was currently wearing quite the large blouse, with floral decorations, closed at the top with a row of buttons. Taylor was currently going to town with an entire roasted chicken, diving face first in its side, as it was held high by Tina, covering her face with bits of meat and grease. Her body seemed to inflate constantly with fat, already threatening to rip apart her blouse. Still, although she was growing fatter, she still was a long way away from reaching her sister size.

That didn’t mean that Frida was going to relent on her. Quite the contrary.

But just as she was moving closer to Taylor, she heard her doorbell ringing. Guessing who was going to be, she placed a plastered smile on her face and went to open the door. At her doorstep she saw a middle-aged woman, with blonde-brownish hairs, with a hopeful and yet, worried, expression on her face.

“Good Morning, are you Michelle Hathaway? I’m Frida.”

“Yes! Are my daughter’s here? Are they ok? I’m sorry…I was so worried when I didn’t saw them at our house…”

Frida smiled at the woman, already preparing a spell within her mind to be casted at her will toward the woman. “I know how it is. Not to worry, though, they’re both quite happy and healthy. Please, come inside, I’ll bring you to them…”

As soon as Michelle entered the main hall she stared speechless at the scene in front of her eyes.

She first saw an almost amorphous blob left on the floor, near the entrance to the kitchen, she noticed that it seemed to be jiggling quite a lot but, she didn’t yet realize she was seeing one of her daughters. Her focus instead moved toward the fattened girl on what appeared to be some kind of couch made of marzipan. At first the idea of furniture made with baked sweets intrigued her but, as she realized that her daughter Taylor was the fattened-up girl sitting on it, all of her focus turned onto her.

“Taylor!?”

The girl, stopping her gorging, slowly turned her head toward the sound of the voice, showing her face covered in grease and bits of chewed up chicken to her mom.

“Hey mom…How’s going?”

Michelle was on the verge of a hysterical crisis. She almost shrieked toward her daughter, when she heard a gurgling sound coming from her side. Turning that way, she finally noticed that the blob on the floor was currently looking at her, trying to call her. It was then that she realized that both her daughters were there. Each of them fattened up to an impossible degree. She was just turning around toward the owner of that abode when all her worries seemed to vanish into nothingness.

Frida, had enjoyed seeing how Michelle reacted in seeing her daughters but, wasn’t going to let her be a distraction for any of them. Quickly she launched the spell she was charging, making a blank slate of Michelle’s mind. Now, the woman was ready to see how her new life was going to be.

“Michelle, You’re the mother of both Frankie and Taylor.

You sent both girls here to let them grow healthy and now you’ve come too, to give them an example of how to grow healthy. To your eyes, Frankie is ready to leave this house, sending her on a promised trip of discovery…while Taylor will still be unhealthily thin, no matter her size.

Frida and Tina are your own cousins, you trust them with all your hearth.”

Michelle, thickly under the spell mumbled back all the instruction she received, making them as if she had thought of those herself. For a moment, her face showed the anger she felt in seeing her daughters turned into freaks but, as the spell cleared her mind she slowly assumed a seraphic expression of serenity, as her memories changed to be in line with the instructions she received. A few minutes later, as the spell ended, she turned toward Frida, as if she had known her since a long time, and hugged her, thanking her for taking such a good care of her daughters.

“Oh, Thank you Frida. And, you, Tina! But I see that someone is still behind…Taylor? What’s the meaning of this?”

As Michelle said that she moved closer to Taylor and grabbed one of her belly rolls, shaking it in her hands, making her entire gut to shake and jiggle.

“You’re still so thin! Oh, I know…you just need an example of how to grow Healthy, don’t you? Don’t worry dear…I’ll show you.
And you Frankie, dear! Oh, such a good little girl you are! So healthy and so full of energies!”

As the woman left Taylor side, she moved toward Frankie, grabbing her and hugging her as much as she could, as the childish girl fell in a giggling fit.

“Now, girls. I’ve come here to help you grow as healthy as you can be. And I’ll do that by showing you how it is done. Well, that is true for you Taylor…Oh god, your still so thin…But you Frankie. Oh, such a healthy girl you are. I believe you’re almost ready to go for your Health Trip. Isn’t she, Frida?”

As she said that she turned toward the witch as if asking her confirmation.

Frida simply nodded, as she moved closer to Frankie and Michelle, explaining to the two of them how they were going to proceed from that time onward. Frida already imagined how it was going to go, she only had to explain it to the two with some white lies to keep them calm. In truth, as soon as both Taylor and Michelle were going to bed, she would have Tina assist her in moving Frankie into the kitchen and then, she would simply place her into her biggest pan. Judging by the size of the girl, she decided to make of her a delicious roast. And then she would enjoy it late into the night.

As the day came to an end, Frida accompanied both Taylor and Michelle in their own room, letting Michelle take the bed once occupied by Frankie. Taylor, as stuffed as she was didn’t have even an ounce of strength to point out that oddity although, as dumb as she was, she barely noticed it. Still, Michelle went to bed without any worries, falling rapidly asleep, even though her own Healthier diet was going to start only on the following day. As soon as the two girls were asleep, Frida quickly returned to the kitchen finding, quite surprised, that Tina had Frankie already under a sleeping spell and placed her into a vast pan that was going to be, soon, placed into the oven.

Frida licked her lips at the view of the hugely fattened girl. Soon, she was going to enjoy a delicious roasted Frankie. She just couldn’t wait…

‘Now, nothing could go wrong…could it?’
15232213212111212421122111224212.title: Welcoming in Michelle Hathaway

choices: Taylor get in the lead, eating up until lunch time
Michelle show off her skill, out-eating her eldest daughter
Both girls soon are stuffed to the gills, Tina force-feed them to eat more
As the two Hathaway girls get stuffed, Frida wakes up feeling rather famished…
152322132121112124211221112242121.content:
As the evening turned not night, the witch and the demoness cooked ad prepared meals upon meals for both the Hathaway’s women, as the youngest of the family, had been already placed under a spell that kept her unconscious through anything that may have happened to her. Frida may have been a man eating, cackle emitting, evil witch but, she was no monster. As Frankie was in the oven, being cooked, the spell protected her from feeling any pain.

The girl had been placed under a spell so powerful that only true love could have released her but, with it on her, she would have passed away into nothingness without even noticing.

It was late into the night when Tina opened the oven, as a cloud of vapor exuded out of it, filling the kitchen with, for the witch, the heavenly smell of roasted girl. Frida awaited seating at her kitchen table, a napkin already tied at her neck, as Tina levitated with magic the vast platter on which the roasted Frankie was, leaving it right in front o the witch who could admire how perfectly cooked it appeared.

“Good Job, Tina. And you, Frankie dear, you’ll be marvelous.”

It was the early morning when Frida woke up, still seated at her kitchen table. Her own blouse had torn in half, as her massive stomach billowed out in front of her, full as it had been with the roast that she had so enjoyed, that she had found herself unable to resist but to gulp it down in one single bite. After a long night of digestion, she was finally waking up, her body having digested most of her meal, softening up quite a bit, and yet leaving Frida still a bit groggy.

Tina, loyal servant that she was, quickly was at her side, helping her up and aiding her to her private room.

“Don’t worry, Master. I’ll take care of our guests; you may rest and finish digesting your meal.”

Frida, too tired and sleepy nodded slowly as she let the demoness accompany her to her room, without noticing a strange glint in Gluttinia’s eyes, as the woman observed carefully the reaction of her Master after she had enjoyed a delicious and filling meal.
Still, leaving the witch on her bed, to sleep away her meal, the demoness returned to the kitchen where she began anew to prepare the food for the guests that were going to be up that morning and that were so much in need to grow healthier.


It was around 9.30 AM when Michelle woke up with a loud yawn, feeling completely refreshed and recharged. As she stirred a bit in her bed, she looked around dumbfounded for a moment, before remembering that she was in Frida’s house. Looking around in the room she saw her daughter still sleeping in her bed, her huge gut rising and falling with her every breath. Giggling a bit with herself in seeing her daughter finally growing healthier she looked for her second daughter but, seeing that she wasn’t there she realized that Frankie had already started her trip to a healthy discovery.

Frida had told her about the evening before, about how needed it was for such young girls to embark on this trip on their own, as soon as they where at their healthiest.

And, although it hurt a bit for Michelle not having the chance to see her youngest daughter, she still was happy for her, hoping to be able to see her again, sometime soon. As she rose, though, her thoughts diverted from her daughters to the furniture in the room, as she realized how good looking and comfy was looking everything in the room, she was in. She carefully observed the bed, for example, noticing that the structure was made entirely in Oreo cookies, the mattress seemed to be made of sponge cake while the covers were a couple of layers of cotton candy sewn together with sugar strands. With a smile she imagined herself making these kinds of furniture at her home, or even better, selling them in her bakery.

As she told herself to ask Frida about them, Taylor woke up with a yawn, slowly bringing herself to a sitting position, aiding herself against the headboard of the bed. As she had finally managed, she breathed deeply, finding herself very tired after such a feat, until she noticed her mother looking at her with pride in her eyes.

“Hey…Mom…Good…Morning…”

“Hi, Sweetie, had a good sleep?”

“Yeah…this…place…like…rocks…Could use…some…breakfast…though…”

“But of course, Sweetie, I’ll go and inform Frida we’re up, then I’m sure we can arrange to bring you breakfast in bed, today.”

“That…would…be…cool, Mom.”

Taylor had just finished speaking when the door to their room opened, revealing Tina coming through with several trolleys trailing behind her.

“Oh, I see you’re both up. You know it’s not very healthy to wake up before 10.00 AM in the morning, right? Anyway, between me and Mast…I mean, Frida, we will manage to correct these small mistakes.
Now, both of you, get back to bed. I’ll bring breakfast to both.”

Michelle, giggling within herself, feeling as if she was a young lady once more, returned onto her bed, seating into it, with her back against the headboard, as Tina began bringing plates to both girls, starting with Taylor.

“Now Ladies, this morning, me and Frida decided that both of you need something more dedicated, to help you grow healthier. For this reason, this morning, I’m going to bring you a full English breakfast course.
Taylor… ”

Tina turned toward the blown-up girl serving her a large platter filled to the brim with fried eggs, sausages, bacon strips, a small-ish bowl of black pudding, potato waffles and baked beans. Taylor, grabbing fork and spoon from the tray, upon which rested the platter, began immediately to dig in the meal, taking no mind to the grease that slowly cascaded from her lips onto her double chin. The woman then turned toward Michelle, bringing forth a similar tray and platter, although slightly different.

“For you Michelle, since you need to set an example for your daughter, we choose to provide you with something a bit more, mixed, than the usual Full English Breakfast. Here, enjoy…”

Saying that she passed on the shapely legs of the middle-aged woman, the tray and platter, filled to brim with even more food than her daughter. Not only it appeared to have almost the double amount of food Taylor had received, but it held, also, a half dozen’s donuts, a rather large slice of Devils’ food cake and quite a pile of gooey chocolate brownies.

Michelle took in the huge breakfast that was awaiting her with hock and, yet, seeing as her daughter had already gone at it without any worries, she realized that already she was setting the bad example.

‘I’ve got to show Taylor that she needs to eat to grow healthier…Can’t let her go undernourished.’

With that thought in mind she also began digging through her platter, having bite after bite, moaning in delight at each morsel, feeling herself growing hungrier and hungrier each time she swallowed. Already her belly began to bloat up, filling up with the rich and heavy breakfast food, and yet she powered on, unabashed at the tightness of her clothes on her torso, with the final goal in her mind to show her daughter how a real girl ate healthily. Soon enough the two ladies seemed to have started a competition, both of them looked at the other, as they munched through the huge breakfast they had been served. Tina watched from the sidelines, a small mile creeping on her lips, as she enjoyed the show brought forth by the hunger spell, she had casted on the food. First to clean up her platter was, naturally, Taylor.

Although slower than her mother, due to her fattened body, she still had plowed through the food as a machine, managing to leave the licked clean platter in front of her, as she breathed in and out rather quickly, finding herself short of breath only by eating. Michelle wasn’t far behind. Although she had received much more food than her daughter, she still had gone at it as a raging beast, feeling her enchanted belly roaring constantly for more.

A few minutes after Taylor, Michelle finally cleaned the last brownie from her plate, feeling in ecstasy by the delicious taste of it and yet, her stomach seemed to demand more. Taylor, instead was still too short breathed to be thinking of food right away but, seeing Tina bringing a second platter to her mom, made her realize that she was falling behind.

‘Crap…I feel…so full...and yet…I’m like, hungry. Mom…already has…her second…plate…while I…am not? That’s like…like not cool. Gotta…gotta have more…’

Tina, seeing the hungry glances that Michelle was giving to her bed, smiled a bit with herself and approached the woman, bringing her a new tray, with a new platter.

“Here you go Michelle, Ready for seconds? And you, Taylor? Don’t worry. I’ll be bringing you your next platter in a jiffy.”

Michelle, although she was feeling full and, quite restricted by her PJ’s, she still felt a gnawing hunger in the pit of her stomach so, when Tina brought to her a second tray, she didn’t say anything. She just began once more to dig in, going at it as fast as she could. Taylor, meanwhile, massaged her bloated belly with both hands, feeling as it had filled somewhat but, not enough.

‘Still, like, hungry… Need to have more…Bring me more…and more and, like, so much more.’
152322132121112124211221112242121.title: Mother-Daughter bond-eating

choices: Tina checking on the Hathaway girls, prepping Frida for her next meal
2 Frida wakes up for a snack, the Hathaway girls are in need for more…
Michelle Hataways begin to feel full, she give her plate to her daughter
Taylor is full, she helps her mother catching up
1523221321211121242112211122421214.content:
Tina watched happily as the two ladies kept eating at her enchanted food. Both were so entranced with it that they had yet to notice that they were still digging into the same plate. In front of their eyes, blinded by the unbridled gluttony forced on them by Tina, the plates were refilling every time they had almost cleaned it. This forced them to fall in an endless loop. The more they ate, the hungrier they got, the hungrier they got, the more they ate. Moreover, the plates were refilling by themselves and they would stop only when the ladies reached their fullest point.
This trick had been necessary by Tina’s point of view. In her spellbound mind she still was the most loyal, pleasure giver that her master had.
And by that, since she had seen how pleased Frida had been after her meal, she resolved that Frida too needed to have more frequent meals. But to cater to her, she’d had to keep the other two women busy.

So, Tina left the room, leaving mother and daughter alone in their perpetual hunger, as she moved to the kitchen, where she started preparing something filling also for her master. As she began magically cooking a delicious full course meal, she began also to entwine in it spell after spell, in order to make the most pleasurable experience her Master could receive.

When Frida opened her eyes she found herself laying down on her bed, groggily she began to stand up, realizing that, although most of her meal had been digested away, she still managed to gain quite the amount on her overall body. Standing and posing in front of a mirror, wearing only a rather tight shirt and a pair of ill-fitting shorts, looking at her reflection with a mix of pleasure and worry.

Her breast had increased of a cup while her torso had bloated up quite a bit, as she pinched at a small layer of fat on her body. Still, all in all, she could say that she was at still something below the 180 lbs. A bit of a diet and some magical transfer of fat would do wonders to her figure. She was still checking herself out when the door opened, and Tina entered bowing to her.

“Greeting, Master. I had hoped of finding you awake.”
“Good Morning, Gluttinia. So, how are our guests this morning?”
“They’re both currently enjoying a self-replenishing breakfast meal, Master. They won’t stop anytime soon.”

“God, your devious, Gluttinia. If we keep at it, soon another one of them will be ready to become my meal.
I simply can’t wait.”

As Frida massaged her small pot belly, she noticed that her Demoness was still bowed toward her, clear sign she wanted to say something to her.
“Yes, Gluttinia? What is it?”
“Master, if I may be so bold. I noticed you enjoyed deeply your meal. Based on this I wanted to ask you if you would like a meal to be served to you? I hope it will be as good as possible considered my lack in capacities and ingredients…”

The witch stood silent for a few minutes, deeply thinking on the situation, until she simply shrugged it away. Tina was heavily under her control. It wasn’t possible that she was trying to betray her. It was probably a reaction to her late-night meal.
“Sure, I’ll be in the kitchen in a few…”
“As you wish, Master.”

A few moments later, just as Tina was applying the finishing touches to the table, Frida appeared out of nowhere already sitting at one end of the table into the kitchen. As she grabbed the cutlery, she smiled seeing her Demoness, so often jesting and joking about her, so meek and servile.

“Here, Master. I’ve prepared something of an appetizer for you…”

Frida stared open mouthed as a plate was slid in front of her, filled with delicious looking, small sized, cubes of fried eggs mixed into various combinations. Some were eggs and bacon, other were with cheese, others yet with vegetables. Without thinking too much, Frida began to bring each of these bite sized morsels into her mouth, squealing lightly in delight as the taste reached her taste buds, overloading them with their flavor. It seemed to her that in the blink of an eye the plate was already empty but, just as she pouted a little, a second plate was slid under her eyes. Before she could even question it, she found herself taking again those bite sized morsel, moaning in pleasure every time she had them in her mouth.
Tina, from the side lines, watched with a joyous expression plastered on her face.
‘The Master is Loving it… I need to continue! I have to bring pleasure to the Master!’

As soon as the second plate had been cleaned, Tina swiftly replaced it with a slightly bigger plate, this time leaving something more substantial for her Master pleasure. Frida was enjoying the delicious taste a bit too much. Usually she didn’t partake of her own creations, often finding them to taste like ashes in her mouth. But Tina’s prowess was proving more than enough to break the iron will of the witch. As soon as she had the last morsel in her mouth, she noticed that the plate had been replaced with another. This time there were some eggs ‘a-la-Benedict’, with a side of fries, sausages and bacon strips.
Before she knew it, she was already having her fork going toward the eggs, loading them with some sausages and then filling her mouth with the fried bacon. Once more her mouth was assaulted by a colorful mix of delicious flavors, before she could think she began to scoop more and more out of the plate, filling herself up with the tasty cuisine of her servant. Plate after plate began to be brought under the witch nose, ad every time she found herself unable to resist them, unable to stop herself from digging in for more. Had she been more careful, she would have noticed that such a sudden spike in hunger couldn’t be normal, she would have questioned herself and realized that she was eating enchanted food, and it would have been a small battle of wills to free herself of the trap.

But she hadn’t.

As she kept on consuming plate after plate, as breakfast meals gave place to first courses and second courses, moving on toward desserts of all kind, she barely noticed the toll her body was being subjected to under such an influx of so much food. Her belly had begun to pool in her lap, growing fuller and fuller, until it seemed to reach the breaking point. Yet, Frida didn’t stop, having now become powerless to free herself from the same enchantments she so often had used on her meal-girls.

Tina watched with a manic grin, seeing as her Master clothes were strained tightly, trying to contain her growing form, and yet the Master kept eating, frenzied into having more and more food in her. The spellbound demoness stood there, captivated by the scene, until a loud ripping sound woke her up from her reverie. With a start she looked at her Master, wondering if she had hurt her but, she smiled realizing that it was only the Master clothes that had broken apart, unable to contain her glory anymore. Frida, from her point of view, as she heard the ripping sound had one instant of recognition but, soon enough fell back prey of the hedonism she had been magically induced into.

‘Good…I can finally go for more!’.

Time became secondary in that kitchen, Tina placed herself to work, cooking up a storm of food, trying to match the magically fueled up hunger that Frida was feeling deep in herself. Already her form was growing more and more voluptuous, her breast expanding in size, as her body grew larger and larger. Her thighs, even though she had started to spread them apart, still were touching each other. Her entire form was inflating with fat as more and more food was being shoveled inside of her. Still, as potent the hunger enchantment was, Frida soon reached the point where she was having troubles moving her own arms.

As this happened, she began to pout and wail, and it was then that Tina turned around noticing the discomfort of her Master. When the Demoness realized that her Master wasn’t anymore happy but was getting sadder, something broke inside of her. As a gurgled pained cry emerged from her throat she teleported at the side of the witch, bringing forth a forkful of food toward the addicted witch.
As Frida realized that food was available, she began to eat anew, constantly feeling that gnawing hunger consuming from inside. As hours passed and lunch time approached, Tina began to clean up the face of the now obese witch, precariously sitting on the unstable chair in the kitchen with her almost three-hundred-pound body.

Frida was too delirious to realize what had happened; her stomach was feeling so full that she was afraid she might blow up at any moment. As she breathed in and out, she turned her stare all around herself, noticing that the kitchen was still pristine clean. As the effects of the enhanced food vanished from her system she breathlessly turned toward her servant.

“T-Tina…How much…Did I…Ate?”
“Master, you enjoyed a meal prepared by this loyal servant of yours.”
“Hmm…so…why do I…feel…soo…Full?”
“Master, If I may. I would say that you might be simply not used to eat so often.”

Frida, while currently unable to think clearly due to how exhausted she felt, turned her stare once more on her servant.

“Yeah…maybe…maybe you’re right…maybe I …I should start…to eat…more often…”

Unbeknownst to Frida, Tina had casted on her a spell that, in the deranged servant mind, had to have the effect of not have anymore a sad Master. As it was, she had managed to make Frida blind to her own weight. As the witch soon began to collapse on her chair, falling asleep on the spot, while making excuses about her tired state, Tina realized that her Master was also finding happiness in fattening up their two guests. With that fact recognized, she promised herself that she was going to provide to her Master all the happiness and pleasure she could manage.
1523221321211121242112211122421214.title: A dutiful servant is not always the best choice

choices: The witch notices something wrong with her clothes
Someone at the door interrupts the witch snack
As the witch balloons up, so do the Hathaway girls
15232213212111212421122111224212141.content:
Tina would have loved to sit there in the kitchen, watching the growing forms of her Master as she slept away her ungodly breakfast, yet she had also the other two guests to take care of. With a sigh, she rose from the chair she was seated on and moved out of the kitchen, walking swiftly toward the bedroom where the Hathaway girls had been having their own breakfast. As she opened the door, she saw a beautiful sight.

The two girls were now asleep, their magically, self-replenishing, plates had been placed by both girls on their bedstand as they both seemingly had reached their fullest point and simply fell into a deep, digestive, sleep. The demoness moved closer to the ladies, observing their form in detail, loving what she was seeing.

Taylor had grown as the largest, apparently, her titanic form overflowing the bed she was laying on.

Her cherubic head lay on the soft pillows while a satisfied smile filled her face, her four chins wobbled slightly at her every breath. Her breast had grown larger, pooling out on her sides, jiggly masses of fat that they had become, her arms too, had grown up tremendously. Those had puffed up hugely, giving her large bingo wig that, if she was able to move them, would have wobbled at her every movement. Her gut, then, had risen as bread in the oven, pushing out of her of at least three feet, and yet it still had grown larger, reaching up to her knees, even though she was laying down. With a smile, Tina, realized that it had also grown wider, overflowing slightly the bed on which Taylor slept, almost reaching the ground. Her legs too had fattened up quite considerably, her thighs now permanently touching each other, no matter how wide Taylor would move them. Her knees and calf so covered in fat to be almost able of consider them as pillars, instead of legs. The demoness smiled as she patted slowly the humongous dome shaped gut that Taylor was sporting, until she moved to the other woman in the room.

Michelle too had grown fantastically that morning.

The older woman seemed to have grown hugely after her hunger enhanced binge. Michell had grown softer and fatter allover her body, although she seemingly had grown the most on her rear. Her ass cheeks pushed her up even as she laid on her bed, giving her a perfect pear-shaped form. While her torso had grown softer as well, giving her some lovely belly rolls, thick and juicy, the lower portion of her body had increased massively its own mass. Her ass and hips had been spreading behind her far and wide, forcing her to sleep a little uncomfortably, as it pushed her pelvis up higher than the rest of her body. Her legs too had grown softer, adding a large amount of fat on her legs, making them appear as large as tree trunks. Inversely, her arms seemed to have retained a lesser amount of fat tissue, as well as her breast and shoulders.

Still, it was almost lunchtime and Tina didn’t want to slow down the healthy growing that the two women had been doing.

Slowly she woke them both up, and helped them, one at the time, to stand up from their bed in order to weigh them both so to have a clear picture of how healthy they both were getting.

“Michelle? Taylor? Girls, please, wake up…”

Slowly, the two woke up from their slumber, yawning loudly as they tried to move their fattened bodies, finding the task harder than they both remembered. Yet, this finding had a different impact on the two girls. Taylor woke up first and, upon notice that she was having a hard time to just change her laying position to a sitting one against the back head of the bed, she harrumphed loudly about it, but soon she lost interest in that as she began to grow more and more interested on how healthy she had seemed to have grown.

‘Man…Surely I’m growing healthier! I’ll catch up with Frankie soon enough…I’ve got to, like, do it faster, though…’

Michelle, instead, seemed shocked to see how big her lower half had gotten, as her hands caressed her huge rear, as if trying to verify if it was really there. Yet, as soon as she saw her daughter on the opposite bed, all her worries vanished, seeing how healthier she was growing. A smile appeared on her lips, one of satisfaction for a job well done. Sure she had to set the good example but, her daughter growth had the priority and, seeing how massive Taylor was getting, she felt herself filling up proudly of motherly love.

As the two guests woke completely up, Tina moved beside them and helped them to stand on their own, Taylor wasn’t able to sustain herself up on her own and so Tina willingly helped her, moving her with her magically enhanced strength until she was standing on the huge scale that had seemingly appeared out of nowhere.

“There we go, cutie-pie. Now hold still on the railing there and let me see how healthy you’ve got…”

Kneeling down, Tina watched with glee as the numbers on the scale frantically began changing, until the finally showed her the final weight of the huge, fattened-up, twenty-ish young woman.

‘503 lbs… in less than two days you’ve managed to grow up of almost 75 pounds. Oh, Taylor, you’re growing out so nicely…’

“Good job, Taylor. You surely are growing healthy. Still, you can always grow healthier. Here, let me bring you back to bed…Just need to change your clothes though…”

As the demoness helped the girl to get out of the tattered clothes, exchanging them with a new blouse, just a bit larger than the girl herself, Michell began to move on her ow toward the scale. Not that she was going to be able to see the results for herself but, knowing her daughters needed all the help she could get, she didn’t want to distract Tina with her own needs. The demoness, having placed Taylor back into bed, turned and saw the older lady standing proudly, although red-faced, on the scale. Quickly she smiled at her and kneeled once more to read the results.

Again, she smiled toward the heavy-set woman. “You must be proud of yourself Michelle, you’re putting out such a good example for your daughter.” Still, even though Michelle had managed to get herself up to the 300 lbs, Tina knew she had to grow way larger to even be widely considered as worthy for her Master.

“Now, girls, you’re both growing out nicely but, you still gotta get used to grow a lot more. For this, we will do a little exercise.”

Quickly, Tina set up both ladies under a plethora of dishes, letting them know that they had to eat until the plates were all empty. As she said so, she began distributing them such an ungodly number of dishes that both girls appeared shocked, even with the hunger enhancement they were subjected to. Still, licking their lips, both women smiled at the prospect of eating again. Although they both had felt full, before, they were now feeling once more the hunger within them growing more and more demanding. With no further ado, Tina began to surround both girls with delicacies, such a large amount of food that could have fed an army.

Taylor was soon surrounded by fried foods and greasy plateful of meats, from various cuts of steak, sausages and mountains of bacon, to huge buckets of fried chicken and greasy ribs. The girl began to assault the food surrounding her, without taking any notice in the unusual way she was being fed. The food itself, as it was, moved on its own toward her mouth, leaving her huge arms to simply lay at her sides, caressing the wide mass of her apron-like gut.

Michelle instead had been completely surrounded by sweets. From cakes to pies, from buns to donuts, all kinds of sweet treats had been placed all around her growing out form, and yet she acted quickly, snatching these delicacies from their trays, gobbling them up as fast as she could. Also, in her case the food seemed to move of its own volition toward her mouth but, that didn’t stop her from helping herself with her own hands.

Tina watched the two girls gorge on the fatty foods for a while, until she turned and left them to their meal, deciding to be coming back later, to bring them both, lunch. Now, though, she had to go back and take care of her Master. She also needed to grow up happier and more satisfied.

Frida, meanwhile, woke up slowly on her own. Groggily, she picked herself up from the table, realizing she was still in the kitchen. She hazily remembered of her breakfast, foggy memories of a small breakfast which had left her stupefied, both in how delicious it had been and, also, how shockingly small it seemed to be. As the witch rose from the chair she noticed how hard it seemed to be but, since looking at herself she didn’t see any changes to her figure, she imagined she’d been just tired. As if on cue, Tina appeared on the doorway, seeing as her Master was up, she quickly moved at her side, aiding her to move from the kitchen toward the living room, where she placed her Master on the couch.

“Here, Master. Seat here and I will prepare you something to snack on…”

“Thanks, Gluttinia. I’m feeling rather winded this morning…”

“You must be tired and growing weaker from all your hard jobs, Master. Please, let me take care of you until you’ve regained your energies.”

“Mmm… You must be right. Alright, Gluttinia, I’m in your hands now. Still, how the two piggies are going? Are they growing fatter and fatter?”

“Yes, Master. Right this morning, Taylor reached the 500 pounds, while her mother managed to get at almost three hundred. I’ll make sure they reach, if not go over, the same weight of the little one you enjoyed so much.”

As the two talked, Frida didn’t seem to notice that the demoness was once more at her side, trays of food all around them, ready to have her Master dig on more and more food…
15232213212111212421122111224212141.title: Growing out Hathaways and preparations for Frida

choices: As Frida naps, Michelle wishes for a bigger Taylor…
While Tina cooks for Frida, Taylor notice weird things about herself
The witch dreams about herself being as prey of another witch
Someone, suddenly knocks on the entrance door…
152322132121112124211221112242121411.content:
Frida, now comfortably seated on the couch in the living room, didn’t yet notice that her servant was still moving trolley after trolley from the kitchen toward her. She was still rather winded and tired, although she couldn’t understand the reason, and yet when Gluttinia moved closer, offering her a tray of cinnamon rolls, Frida felt she could hardly refuse.

‘It’s just a quick pick-me-up, Nothing serious…’

“Thanks, Gluttinia, I was feeling rather hungry for a quick snack…”

The demoness didn’t reply, as she kept on smiling, while leaving the tray of sweets in front of her Master. As she sat there, near Frida, intently watching her she though back to the spells she had used on the food she had given, and was going to give, to her Master.

‘Master seems so happy while eating…I’ve got to pleasure Master. If Master eats, then Master will be happy…’

Frida, as soon as she bit the first roll noticed that there was something weird in those treats but, as the hunger spell took effect, all the Witch could think of was the painful hunger pang in the pit of her stomach. Rather quickly she polished off the two innocent looking rolls from her plate and actually smiled as she saw Gluttinia replacing the now empty plate with one filled to the brim with donut holes covered in powdered sugar.

The witch, happily, began to toss them, one after the other within her mouth, hastily chewing on them making her lips smack in joy. Still, her hunger seemed to continue unabated, and so all she could do was keep eating, losing herself in the wonderful taste of all those sweets that her servant was giving to her.

As time passed, and the portions given to the witch grew, her clothes began to feel rather tight in her body. Frida began, slowly at first, to squirm in place, feeling that something wasn’t right and yet, unable to stop eating. Gluttinia, from her side, had been noticing that her Master was starting to slow down in her consumption and knew that it was probably due to how tighter her clothes were getting.

And yet, something deep within herself told her that seeing Frida bursting out of her clothes was going to be one of her fondest memories, so she simply began providing more to the witch, hoping to be speeding the process up.

Frida, although unaware of the changes happening to her body as she kept gorging on the magically enhanced food, felt finally better when a loud ripping sound came out from somewhere in her surroundings. Still, before she could investigate the source of the sound, her servant left in front of her a massive mincemeat pie and all she could think of was to have that delicious treat inside of her.

Quickly, without even pausing for the cutleries, Frida began to scoop up pieces of it, bringing them to her mouth.

The demoness, instead, was in awe.

She couldn’t stop herself from seeing the scene of Frida’s clothes bursting out, replying itself in front of her eyes. How the witch’s jeans and short tube top had began growing skin tight against her increasingly fattening figure, until they couldn’t simply hold anymore and started to rip apart as the flabby fat of the witch pushed out in a continued fight for freedom out of those restriction.

Still, although Gluttinia was lost in those memories, her hands moved on they own, providing more and more to the witch, which found herself subjected to the strangest, and yet pleasant, treatment she had ever experienced. While Frida grabbed treats and sweets from the plates that she had in front of her, the demoness would then suddenly push within her lips chocolate chip cookies or buttery pastries, forcing her to chew on at least three different things at the same time. At first she wanted to protest, although her hunger pangs softened somewhat faster, but, as the treatment continued she found herself enjoying it.

The witch began to chew faster and faster, trying as hard as she could to keep the pace with the demoness, but she didn’t stand a chance. For as much as she pushed herself, Gluttinia managed to be faster and more precise than Frida could ever hope to be. In fact, as the demoness stroke with deadly precision, managing to push food in the witch mouth when she opened it up, Frida herself was starting to miss her intended target.

As the feeding grew more frantic, it was more and more common for the witch to smear most of her pastries in her mouth, making a mess of herself in a very short time.

Noticing this, her servant relented a bit and moved closer, while holding a napkin, as a devious idea came to her mind.

“Here, Master, let me help you…”

“Th-thanks…*urf* Gluttinia….”

While cleaning her Master with one hand, the servant soothingly used the other to massage the witch on her shoulder while using her own powers to change her master mindset, making her more prone to laziness and less adult in mind.

“Come on, let Auntie Gluttinia clean you up a bit…”

“Ye…*urp…es…auntie…”

As the feeding continued, Frida’s body began to blow up, constantly filled with delicious, fattening, treats, her rather chubby body began to grow larger and wider, until it started to even overflow the three seaters couch, she was on. It went unnoticed by the witch the fact that it was the same couch that Taylor herself had seemingly overgrown on one occasion as, instead, her focus was all getting toward the next moutful of food tha her servant was going to give to her.

All good things, though, have an end, as it did for Frida’s. The witch, was feeling full, completely stuffed, her body unable to accept any tiniest bit more of treat. The demoness saw this and while gently caressing the witch’s head, she swiftly began to whistle a simple lullaby, enticing the overfed witch to fall, rather quickly asleep.

As Gluttinia admired her handiwork o her Master, she was aware that most of the bloating would go away, reducing the massive size currently held by the witch. And yet, so much precious fat was going to be appearing on her Master body, making her able to gorge even more on the next gut bursting meal that she was going to give her.

The demoness, which orders received were being corrupted by her own lust, whistled a bit with herself, pleased by the progress she had managed to reach.

While the base of her orders were clear, the need to make Frida happy, how she could reach those orders was changing. It wasn’t anymore the absolute obedience that she had to give, instead if she fattened her Master up, she could let her gorge on food, making her happy, while also fattening up the two guest’s so that they could soon assist in having a happier Frida around.

Yet, in the depth of the corrupting mind of Gluttinia, a new thought was emerging.

‘What if I make Master more complacent about her situation? If she wanted to grow bigger and larger, wouldn’t she be happier about having more and more to eat?

I would only have to make her more childish in nature, teaching her that fat is healthy and then she could grow as the happiest, biggest, Master I’ve ever had…’
152322132121112124211221112242121411.title: Frida's getting her own just dessert

A device similar to a remote, but made of Marzipan
