152322132121112124211223.content:
As Frida finished the preparation for the banquet to which both girls were going to be ideally pushed to participate, she noticed something peculiar while watching them sleep. Taylor, although being the eldest, didn’t seem to have gained as much as her little sister. In the witch eyes, although Frankie was the major culprit for her pain, Taylor still needed to grow more. She was the older sister, so it could be made as an example by being also the biggest.

With this logic in mind, she let Frankie sleep some more, deciding on bringing only Taylor to the banquet, forcing her to clean the table all by herself. With a manic grin, Frida, already imagined how big the eldest girl was going to be as soon as she had polished the feast. Swiftly she moved beside the older girl, waking her up softly.

“Taylor? Wakey, wakey, Cutie Pie…”

“Mh…? Oh, Auntie…what’s going on?”

“Cutie Pie, it is time for your next meal. I’ve prepared a little something for you, as a reward for being the good girl you’ve been today.”

Taylor, still feeling groggily from waking up, smiled absentmindedly to her auntie as she slowly managed to stand upright and waddled slowly after Frida, getting out of the living room, where Frankie still lay asleep, and moving into the dining room. Once there, after the surprise of how big everything seemed in the room, she was directed by her aunt to sit at the head of a massive table covered in plates upon plates of food.
The girl even though was still digesting part of the humongous snack her Auntie had given her earlier, still smiled in anticipation at the feast that was awaiting her. With a gleam in her eyes she urned toward the witch, asking her politely about the feast.

“Auntie? Is this…Is this all for me?”

“Of course, it is, Cutie Pie. You’ve been such a good girl lately. This is a reward for being such a polite little lady. Enjoy…”

Before she could start however, Frida tied quite a large napkin around Taylor’s neck and then gave the girl a quick peck on the cheek.

“Enjoy this little snack, dear. You need to grow healthy and strong…”

With that said, Taylor grabbed her utensils and prepared herself to have a go at it but, before she could grab a plate, she squealed in pleasant surprise as she saw the plates moving on their own until they arrived in front of her. Not one to discuss a gift so pleasant, she quickly began to dig in the first course that she was presented with, a large plate of fried Chinese noodles with pork and eggs. Helping herself with the fork, Taylor began to move massive morsels within her lips, moaning in delight at the delectable taste of the noodles. Soon she began to have more and more of it, without even waiting to having finished to chew on them, forcing her to keep her cheeks completely filled out, as sauce and grease covered her mouth.

Still she managed to chew and swallow, stopping once or twice to smile at Frida which sat nearby, watching her intently. The girl easily cleaned the first plate, and, before she could even say anything, the same began to drift away, as a similar one moved closer to her until it stood again under her nose.

This time she saw that it was a quite large bowl of Fried rice with small cubes of bacon and pork, also fried, within it. Exchanging her fork with a spoon, Taylor began quickly to stuff spoonful after another in her mouth, eating away as fast as she could as she suddenly remembered that to grow healthier one had to eat the food as fast as possible.

Frida watched in silence as Taylor began to gorge faster and faster on the rich and heavily fried food that appeared each and every time under the girl nose. It was so easy for her to quickly manipulate the subdued mind of the girl making so that all of her advices simply turned I fake memories in the girl’s mind. Still, she tried not to interfere too often, she still wanted both girls to condemn themselves with their own gluttony, now that she had freed it from their restraints.


As Frida was busy with Taylor in the other room, Frankie suddenly woke up still in the living room.

She had been woken up by the hungry rumbling in her belly. Although her Aunt had fed her beyond her limit, now that she had woken up, she found herself hungry once more. The little girl, slowly rose from where she had fallen asleep, standing on her own two legs, feeling rather winded, but her hunger made her dismiss those thoughts, focusing only in finding more food to eat. For a moment she heard her sister and her aunt voices coming from the hallways but, thinking that her Aunt wanted her in the living room she decided not to go and investigate. Still, she didn’t seem to find any plate or meal ready for her and already a little tear appeared in the corner of her eye. But, before a single sob could emerge from her lips, she realized that there wasn’t need for a plate or a meal to be given, she literally was walking within a plethora of food!

With a smile anew on her face, she waddled toward the library, and began to take out a rather large book out of the shelf, noticing that it was made of marzipan and sugar-coated sheets, resembling paper. Smiling the young girl began to eat as many as she could, as she waited for Auntie to appear. When the remaining books weren’t reachable at her height, she quickly began to eat directly the shelves, enjoying the taste of the chocolate covered marzipan, feeling better as her sizable gut began to fill with satisfying food.

Hours passed as both girls kept eating and eating. In the living room, Frankie had now moved herself toward the couch, taking massive bites out of it, devouring the pillows on it and moaning in delight at her every bite. Taylor wasn’t feeling exactly the same.

Although she was enjoying the meal immensely, she was starting to feel full and yet, plates full of food kept moving toward her, stopping in front of her, while Frida motioned her to continue eating. She had already cleaned almost half a dozen plate of foods, between noodles and fried cuts of meat, and yet, another plate slid in front of her, this time bringing her a bucket full of fried chicken with a side of greasy onion rings.

Stifling a burp, the twenty-ish girl began to eat the chicken, cleaning each piece up to the bone, while also taking a few of the rings every few morsels. Still her belly began to bloat out more and more, and yet she tried her best to keep on eating, feeling the encouraging stare of her Aunt always fixed on her. Frida saw how Taylor was starting to struggle to keep on going on her feast, but she also saw how she tried her best to keep going. For this reason, she decided to help the young girl out. Disguising her gesture as an encouragement, she caressed quietly the girl shoulder, while at the same time, she began infusing her with magic, letting her body not only able to process faster the food into fat but, also, giving her a major stomach capacity. With the deed done, she patted a few more time the girl and then stood back once more.

Taylor had been feeling pretty full, even though she wanted to please her aunt she was struggling to continue until, suddenly, she burped quite loudly feeling herself freeing some space and soon was able to keep going without any other issue. Quickly she cleared the current plate and earnestly tackled the next three without feeling any fuller. As Taylor kept munching on, she failed to notice how her body was reacting to that massive influx of calories. As she kept cleaning plate after plate, she began to grow slowly bigger, her thighs growing closer and closer to each other, as her belly billowed forward pooling on her legs as it filled of calorie laden foods. Her breasts also were growing, although losing perkiness they were increasing in size quite constantly.

Still, Taylor kept on going, it wasn’t anymore a matter of satisfying her hunger but, more about to show her aunt that she could manage.

Meanwhile, in the other room, Frankie had eaten more than enough to feel herself satisfied, having eaten most of the couch, part of the library and a portion of some cupboards.

In doing so she found something that put a smile on her pudgy face…
152322132121112124211223.title: Focusing the eldest, leaving the youngest.

choices: Suddenly all of her lost memories returned to her. Frankie needs help!
Suddenly she didn’t know who she was. What was her name? Where she was?
As she looked at herself, she saw that she was fat! What was going on?
She tried to recall something about a certain Frida. Who was she?
1523221321211121242112231.content:
Frankie smiled widely at her findin. As she munched through a cupboard, she suddenly discovered that a device was lying on the bottom.

Quickly swallowing her morsel, she began to inspect more closely the device until she realized that it seemed to be a mobile phone but made entirely of hard candy. Giggling she grabbed it and was astonished in seeing that it was working. Giggling within herself she began to explore its apps until she found something called one that seemed to be funny.

The app was called ‘Forgotten Memories’ and from what she was able to discern it was some kind of puzzle game under which she had to achieve knowledge through the guessing of a secret pass code.

Giggling excitedly, she opened the app and began trying words upon words, although trying to guess a secret word without knowing who the owner of the phone was seemed rather difficult. Still, little genius as she was, she kept on trying, overly excited about this game as any little kid would be.


In the other room, Frida was watching open mouthed, as a mix of astonishment and pleasure filled her, to Taylor as she kept cleaning plate after plate, with no intentions to stop anytime soon. Entire tins of pie, whole sheet cakes, even a full roasted turkey didn’t stop the girl from keep on eating. Between her powered up digestive system and the need to prove to her aunt that she could grow just as healthy as her sister, Taylor was pushing onward with all of her might, through any delicacy that appeared in front of her. Her body began t billow out on all direction, slowly pushing her away from the table as her belly grew wider and bigger and fatter, but even though she seemed to be moving away from the table, the pates kept moving on their own, even leaving the table itself and using Taylor’s belly to reach their destination.

The girl now was becoming a mess of crumbs and grease, her eyes were glazing over, clear sign that she wasn’t focusing anymore on what surrounded her but only on her need to eat. And still she kept shoveling food into her mouth, chewing some and swallowing the rest, clearing space for a new load. As her body grew, so Frida began to make some adjustments, by moving a second chair closer to the girl so she could rest more comfortably her huge rear, spreading her legs apart, so letting her bloating belly to sag a bit under the table, giving Taylor more room to maneuver. But, most importantly, she stood really close to the gorging girl, squeezing her growing body, pinching her belly rolls, even playing a bit with the newly formed rolls of belly fat that she was sporting. In all of this, Taylor was solely focused on the eating. She needed to have more, to grow healthier, to show Auntie that she was better than her sister.

Frida was mesmerized by Taylor apparent endless hunger. She surely hadn’t cast the spell to her and yet she seemed to be trying to push herself as much as she could. Already she was seemingly inflating with fat, her whole body puffing out, as the tattered clothes that covered her ripped literally to shreds.

Enjoying the view Frida decided to give a second chance to Taylor, to see if she really was going to be able to outgrow a second dress in just a few days. Smiling to herself she quickly summoned it from one of the closets in the bedroom, having a large camisole with a similarly large pair of jeans appear right in her arms.

Then she quickly approached the gorging girl, stopping her momentarily.

“Cutie Pie? We can’t have you be a proper little lady without any clothes on, can we?”

Taylor, her mouth covered in frosting and crumbs swallowed the last morsel and nodded at her Aunt.

“So, before continuing with your snack, why don’t I help you wear something comfortable and yet, proper for such a beautiful young lady?”

Taylor, regaining focus on her aunt simply nodded as she swallowed her last morsel, then aided by Frida stood up from the table and took off all tattered remains of her old clothes, as she put on the new ones. Both the camisole and the jeans were an early perfect fit, as Taylor looked at herself, and she smiled broadly to her aunt for the nice gift.

“That’s now a proper young lady. Yes, you are, Cutie Pie…Still, need to finish your snack. Remember what is the one rule when growing healthier?”

“No…Left…overs…”

Taylor said that with a smile as she sat back again at the table, as the plates began once more to move on their own, getting near her, so that she could cleaned them out of any food they contained. Right at that moment a large platter moved under her nose, this time filled to the brim with some oversized corn dogs. Licking her lips Taylor began to eat them one by one, quickly leaving behind only the small wooden stick. Just as she cleared that one plate, a long line of others began to appear n front of her, and yet she couldn’t stop. Once more, her eyes began to lose focus on her surrounding as her mind was soon solely focus on what course she was going to be served next. As more and more food she swallowed so her growth started anew, this time, though, her body began soon to feel constricted by her new clothes, and yet this did not stop the girl at all. Instead it only fueled up her need to have more of it, to grow healthier and bigger as her aunt wanted. Nothing in her eyes seemed more important that.

As time passed, her body began to bloat more and more outward, tightening its hold against the clothes she was wearing, and yet, Taylor was slowing down. Although the witch magic had increased the eating capacities of Taylor, she still seemed to have reached her filling point.
Although she tried to keep eating, she simply wasn’t managing. Her mouth seemed to refuse to chew any morsel she had, her throat was unable to push it down and her stomach couldn’t keep it there. Frida had been so ecstatic when she had seen the girl growing out, she truly had thought that Taylor could have been capable of tearing apart two set of clothes in few days, as only one girl had done it before her.

And yet, Frida now knew that she wasn’t going to do it.

Taylor was trying to make room within herself, she wanted to continue with all her hearth, to show her Aunt that she could do it and yet she was failing. Sleepiness was taking her over. Through bleary eyes she saw the disappointed look in her aunt eyes and that alone broke her hearth apart.

Why she wasn’t able to do it? How come her sister could? Amidst teary eyes she began to lose hope until she steeled herself suddenly.

‘NO.’ she thought. ‘I won’t let her defeat me again. She always gets the compliments and the rewards from Auntie…I will not be beaten this time around.’

For a minute or so Taylor did nothing but massaging her hugely bloated belly, feeling as it was jam packed with food and was pushing tightly against the confines of the camisole she was wearing. She kept massaging it with slow circular movement, until she finally exhaled with a loud burp, releasing some gases from her overtaxed gut. And with some of that space released she began once more to eat at the pastries and cakes that had been under her nose for all that time. Bite after bite, with bits of frosting and cream that fell from her mouthfuls dirtying her clothes, she powered through until the first few top buttons of her camisole suddenly popped out, banging loudly against the next wall. Her flabbier cleavage began to push ut of her shirt, and yet Taylor kept gulping down morsel after morsel.

She felt it deep within herself that she could do it.

She could make her Auntie proud of her.

As more and more globs of cake fell from her mouth, covering the bloated meat sacks of breasts she was sporting, yet some other buttons popped out. This time the lower ones, which soon started a chain reaction on her jeans button. Her jeans soon were facing much more pressure from the front but also from the top and soon also those popped out with a loud ripping sounds. As soon as those crumbled, her clothes began to simply tear apart, ripping away on the sides and on the front, leaving plentiful gaps from which her caramel colored skin began to push out. In a matter of minutes, as Taylor swallowed a rather large morsel of sheet cake, both her pants and shirt seemingly exploded in shreds, shooting buttons here and there as Frida began to smile widely at the tremendous feat that the girl had managed to achieve.

Taylor was now happy. She had finally done it. She could finally rest.

As sleep began to take her away, she barely had time to express one thought to herself:

‘I’ve finally managed to have Auntie proud of me. Soon, will also be healthier than you, Frankie!’

In the other room Frankie turned suddenly her head, as if she had heard someone calling her name, by doing this she misspelled the current word she was trying and by mistake gave it a go. Suddenly the screen lit up, as a loading bar appeared in the middle of it and after a while, a list of names made it presence on the screen. She was unsure of what the list was referring to and already he was growing bored of the game, until she reached the end of the name’s list and two name appeared under her eyes.

The first entry was her name, Frankie Hathaway, then right after the name of her sister Taylor.

With a smile in seeing her name before the one of her elder sister, she clicked her name and then something happened that shocked her…
1523221321211121242112231.title: A way to call outside ?

choices: Cavalry’s here! Michelle at the candy house!
Michelle arrives but get captured pretty quickly
No sign of Michelle yet, Taylor keeps on growing
Michelle hasn’t arrived yet. Frida focuses on Frankie’s now
15232213212111212421122311.content:
She had just clicked the button with her name and suddenly a huge headache overtook her. In the span of few seconds all the memories that had been locked away by the witch suddenly returned, and those along with her current one began to merge. Quickly Frankie stood horrified as she saw what the Witch had done to both her and her older sister. Still too horrified to say anything she tried to look around herself, realizing only in that moment that she still was holding the magical mobile phone n her hand. For a moment all she wanted was to throw it away with as much force as possible. Hopefully at the witch for what she had done to her and Taylor. But she stopped herself.

She knew, logically, that the phone was her only chance of getting out of that house alive.

Although she was still able to waddle around, escape was not an option. First, she couldn’t run fast enough to escape the much more fit witch, but secondly she wasn’t going to leave her sister in the hands of that monster. Quietly rising from the floor, she tried to walk stealthily toward the dining room, where last she had heard Taylor and the witch go to. As she spied on both she could distinctly hear, although a bit muffled, the voice of the witch as she was talking to her sister.

“Cutie Pie? We can’t have you be a proper little lady without any clothes on, can we?”

Instead of barging in, as she would have done, in order to try and free her sister, Frankie slowly backed up, closing the living room doors behind her. In silence she began to think on what she could do to finally get rid of the witch. In truth, she wasn’t really keen on leaving the house. She was enjoying quite a lot all the eating she had done while in there, if there wasn’t the witch trying to eat them up, the place would have been a paradise for her. Still, the witch was there and had to be dealt with.

As she tried to come up with a plan, she looked at the phone and began to form a plan in her mind. Slowly, trying to be as silent as she could, Frankie began to compose a number on the phone ad then she started the call. As the phone on the other side rang, Frankie simply stood alert and in wait of an answer.


Michelle had just returned from her trip, she had to visit some of her family since her cousins wasn’t feeling too well but finally, she was able to return home. Home, where her two beautiful daughters were awaiting her.

Except, they weren’t there.

First came the cold logic.
‘They’re surely just outside playing. They’ll be back any minute now…any minute now.’

Then came anger.
‘Where the hell are those two!? I’ve specifically told’em to stay here at home!’

Until arrived the panic.
‘Oh Lord! What if they’ve been kidnapped? What if they’re hurt? What should I do? Should I call the police? Should I go out and search for them?’

So panicked she was getting that she almost didn’t heard her phone ringing. In blond panic she tried several times to answer, always failing miserably until she finally managed.

“Hello!? Darlings? Where are you? Are you ok? Who are you? Where have you taken my daughters?”

“Mom? Mom, It’s me Frankie. Listen, I haven’t got much time…Me and Taylor were walking through the woods when we saw this strange building made of candies…”

“Candies? Frankie what are you saying? Are you al…?”

“Listen! Please!”

As soon as Michelle heard the pleading voice of Frankie she immediately shut herself up, swiftly taking notes on what her daughter was saying.

“We reached this house made of candies and we stopped there. Then this seemingly nice lady invited us in and we found ourselves unable to refuse. As soon as we were inside, we began eating like crazy and when she deemed us ready the old lady tried to cook us and eat us. Luckily, I managed to push her into the fireplace and so we thought we were saved but the Witch returned!

She did something to us, a spell or something like that and she robbed us of our memories. As we speak Taylor is still under her influence and doesn’t remember much aside me and her being siblings. I managed to have my memories back but I don’t know what to do. We need you to come and take us out of here!

Please mommy, Please!”

Michelle could barely believe something like that from being possible, although, with what had happene to her in the house they were living now, it did seem actually possible. But what moved her the most was the terror she heard in Frankie’s voice. It was true, it wasn’t a lie.
Whatever was going on in the house she was hold captive, something had completely terrorized her daughter. That, more than anything else, made Michelle trust what Frankie said.

“Frankie, listen to me, dear. I WILL come and find you. Never worry about that. But I need you to be strong. Don’t let the person keeping you there to understand you’ve freed yourself. Keep doing what they ask you to.
I’ll come as fast as I possibly can.

Don’t worry, dear. Mama is coming.”

Within minutes Frankie hung up the phone and Michelle immediately left the house, running as her life depend on it toward the woods. Her daughters were in danger and she was going to save them.

There was no other option.

Meanwhile, Frankie quickly hid the phone within her cleavage as she closed the call with her mom. She had barely returned to her seat when the doors of the living room opened and in came Taylor, fattened beyond belief.

Wider than the double doors that she was, with some difficulty, coming through, Taylor had been fattened up massively. With thighs so big that were chafing against each other no matter how widely she spread her legs. Her hips and ass also had grown hugely, her hips rivaling her massive gut, touching the doorframe as she was pushed through, actually blocking her there even if only by few inches. Her gut though appeared even bigger than the rest of her, bloating out as wide as an overinflated beachball it stood up high, tight as a drum, full of still undigested food as it was. Everything in her had been supersized. The old glory days of Taylor being part of the school team were officially over. And yet, the girl had a pleased smile on her cherubic face, as her cheeks appeared inflated up, just like those of a chipmunk, and her now three definite chins wobbled this way and that as she was being pushed into the room by the witch.

Taylor more asleep than awake did nothing to help the witch in moving herself inside the room, all she could do was massage her hugely overstuffed belly as even her undergarments began to creak, on the verge of tearing themselves up.

Frankie, stared at her sister open mouthed, seeing how big she had grown under one feeding from the witch. Speaking of her, as soon as Frida entered the room, still pushing Taylor onward, Frankie had to use every inch of her willpower not to glare in hate at her. Still when Frida entered the room, she was partially amused and displeased in seeing that most of the furniture in the room had been munched on. But, with a smile she helped Taylor sleepy body to rest on a small couch left untouched, leaving her there sleeping away as she focused on the younger girl still in the room.

“Such a delightful older sister you have, Pretty plump Princess. She’s growing so healthy…wouldn’t you be able to grow as much? Would you?”

Frankie managed to bite back and angry retort, managing instead to act childishly toward her sister change in figure.

” Wow! Big sis is very big now…she’s healthy, Auntie?”

“Oh, no. She’s still needs to grow healthier…and so do you. But seeing as you’ve had a snack, I think that you’ve had enough, my sweet Princess. Your sister, instead, may still be able to grow some more…Aren’t you, Taylor?”

Although more asleep than awake, Taylor weakly pushed herself onward, looking groggily at her aunt, nodding as much as she could, with her three chins in the way. Frankie stared dumbfounded between both her sister and the witch. Unable ti understand how Taylor could even think about keep on eating.

“Yes, Taylor. I thought as much. My sweet Cutie Pie, is always hungry isn’t she?”

Taylor, once more, nodded in a sleepy fashion although, when Frida made a large cake appear in front of the obese girl she seemed to wake up completely as she began stuffing large pieces of it into herself, unnoticed to her of how even larger and wider she was getting. As Frankie stood there, she could only watch Taylor as she kept blindly stuffing her mouth with more and more cakes, as her whole body kept growing larger and bigger and heavier. Already the small couch where she was seated began to creak under the immense weight of the girl and yet Frida wasn’t stopping. Forcibly pushing more and more food into Taylor, enjoying as she kept on growing more and more fat.

Frankie, taking the chance on the witch distracted by feeding Taylor, quickly she cheked the phone again, managing to return to the page where she had found her locked memories. As she scrolled the list she soon found an icon named Taylor but, instead of being a simple button, it revealed some information about her older sister. Specifically, there were notes about the spells used on her. Quickly scanning the phone and verifying that Frida was still distracted she quickly realized why Taylor seemed still so hungry.

Below her name, in the app, she saw that Taylor was currently under the spells of memory loss, increased stomach capacity, increased conversion ‘food to fat’ ratio and a never-ending hunger spell.

Much as Frankie tried, it seemed that she couldn’t undo those spell as she managed to undo her own memories and, she for sure wasn’t going to let her memories return now, as they were both still in danger. She only hoped their mother would arrive soon…
15232213212111212421122311.title: Old Frankie in the body of the New Frankie

choices: Michelle miss the witch. Frida exact revenge on them
Witch wins, Michelle escape with Frankie
Witch wins, Michelle escape with Taylor
152322132121112124211223111.content:
Michelle had been running like a maniac through the woods and had yet to find anything. Still she pushed on, searching through every nook ad cranny, trying to find a trace of her missing daughters. As she started to lose hope, she faintly saw some light coming from deeper into the woods. With renewed vigor she moved over there until she finally saw the house.

As soon as the building was on sight, she realized that it was the perfect trap for kids and teen alike. Most probably Frankie had been the first to arrive and Taylor had remained at her side to try and defend her. Still, now both her girls were trapped in there and she had no plan to try and save her. As Michelle mulled it over, she began to take stocks of what she was seeing and what she knew about the situation. As soon as the house was visible, she understood where she had already seen it.

She remembered about a plaque seen in a library when she was just a kid. It shown the house of the Witch in the tale of Hansel and Gretel.

It almost seemed a 1:1 scale replica of that.

Knowing this she tried to remember anything she could about witches she knew in the fantasy tales. She remembered that in the Hansel and Gretel tale the witch was defeated by being tossed in her fireplace but, as Frankie told her, this witch seemingly had survived that. Then, as she tried to come with some ideas she remembered of another tale that she had often heard from her mother.

The tale of the wizard of Oz.

Also in there, there were witches and she barely remembered how at least two of them died in the tale.
One, being crushed by the house as the whirlwind transported Dorothy and, the other, by being in contact with water…!

There it was her answer. Water! She needed water to fight the witch. Luckily for her, she still had an empty bottle in her bag so she quickly searched around the candy house for a stream of water, managing pretty quickly to find one. She knew it was a gamble, there was no guarantees that river water was going to be actually effective against the witch who held her child’s prisoner.
Still, it was better than nothing, and now that she finally had found the house, for sure wasn’t going to leave her daughters alone.

Gathering her courage, she moved toward the door and without any warning began to launch herself against it using her own shoulder as a battering ram.


Inside, the Witch had finally managed to leave Taylor completely stuffed and overfilled. The poor girl was so full and bloated that she could barely breath, and even blinking seemed to take all of her energies. Frida laughed fully, as she saw the older girl finally at her maximum size…for that day at least. Smiling wickedly, she then turned toward Frankie but, before she could say anything, something began beating heavily on the main door of the house. Grumbling from the interruption, Frida quickly left the room moving toward the door, always keeping the living room under her control. For some reason, even though she had no proof of it, the younger girl seemed way smarter than before. Too occupied by checking the living room she wasn’t ready for what happened as she opened her main door.

As soon as the door opened, Michelle ran forward, tackling heavily the witch on the floor. Frida, caught completely unaware, could do nothing as she felt herself being violently pushed against the floor, banging her head with such force on the ground that she fell unconscious.

Michelle quickly recovered and, once checked that the woman was completely out, she quickly ran into the living room where she found her daughters. Both appeared fine although…they were quite heftier than she remembered. Still she ran first toward Frankie, embracing her as much as she could and then she turned toward Taylor standing speechless when she realized how big her elder daughter had gotten.

Frankie couldn’t believe what she had just seen. The witch finally down on the ground, apparently unmoving, her mom right there in the room with them. It seemed as if she had just woken up from a nightmare. Finally feeling safe she could relieve herself of all her pent-up emotions, the fear, the panic of finding herself trapped in there, the feeling of being alone as Taylor had been under the witch spell still.

As she thought about Taylor she quickly tried to warn her mother but there was no need.

Michelle had already knelt beside Taylor, caressing her dimpled cheeks, trying to wake her up from the apparent food coma she seemed to be in. Frankie didn’t need to speak to see that her mom was worried about Taylor but, as she saw her grasp her sister hand firmly, she also understood that she was relieved of being finally together as a family.

“Mom? Mom Taylor is still under the spell of the witch…I…I don’t know how to free her from that.”

Michelle turned toward Frankie, staring for a bit at her fattened daughter, although not as much as Taylor, and yet she smiled at her, while cupping a bit of her face in her hand softly.

“Don’t worry, Frankie. We will find a way to free her. We’re all together now, that’s what is important. But we can’t celebrate yet. We still have that woman to take care of.”

Frankie began trembling again, although her mother presence helped, the Witch was still scaring her especially now that she feared Frida could take everything away from her.

“Mom…Let’s take Taylor and run home…I don’t…I don’t want to stay here anymore. I like my new size but this place...I don't want to stay while she's still here...”

“I know Frankie but, Not even with the two of us we can move your sister, unless she’s awake and helping. Moreover, I don’t like leaving her here to plan revenge on us. I would prefer to deal with her once and for all.”

Just at that moment, both Michelle and Frankie stood speechless seeing as a dark cloud began to shroud the shape of the Witch, as a dark chittering sound filled the house and their hearths of fear.

“So, you thought you could fool me, again? Is always you, little one, who tries to hurt me the most.

Couldn’t have you fell head over heels for me as your sister did?

Look at her, look how happy she is! I could have made you just as happy if not even more! And you! You’re their mother, aren’t you?

How dare you stand against me! Don’t you know who I am?

But don’t you worry…soon you’ll know what I am capable of!”

In front of Frankie and Michelle, the Witch rose from the floor, held in midair by that cold and dark shroud of darkness, as her eyes gleamed of sickly yellowy light. Frida’s voice became then a cracked, broken version of her past own, as she began to conjure a massive spell right there as she floated in the middle of the hallway.

Michelle took a step forward, hiding Frankie right behind herself, as she rummaged with her free hand in her bag for the water bottle. The other hand busy grasping Frankie’s own, trying to reassure her child.

“No. I don’t know who you are, or what are you capable of. But I do know that I won’t let you hurt my daughters!”

As Michelle said that she extracted her hand armed with the water bottle and threw it against the witch, hoping, praying that it would be enough…
152322132121112124211223111.title: Michelle at the rescue!

1523221321211121242112231111.content:
Both parties stood silent as the little bottle of water slowly wavered in the air, splattering the liquid it held all around. Michelle hoped with all of herself that it might have been enough.

Frida’s eye popped wide open as she saw the bottle flying toward her, as she tried all she could to avoid it.

But it was too late.

As the bottle collided with Frida, this one shrieked loudly in pain as she felt her own life force vanishing from her body, leaving her mortally wounded in the floor as she began to melt in a puddle of a sinister looking liquid. Bubbles began to form on its surface until it seemed to crystalize in its entirety.

As that happened, the entire house trembled and shook, as if a huge force was trying to tear it away from there. Michelle, in fear of what was happening, grabbed hold of Frankie and Taylor, as best as she could and tried to cover both of the girls with her body, as if to protect them from whatever was going to happen.

Unfortunately, all that she seemed to manage was to get herself sandwiched between her way larger girls.

Still, as the house shook and a sinister howl-ish sound filled the air, Tylor seemed to wake up, finding herself hugged tightly by a strange looking woman. She wasn’t really sure what was happening, nor where Aunt Frida was but, from the hug that this woman was giving her, she still was having a pleasant feeling.

As everything had seemed to start, so everything suddenly became quieter.

Michelle seeing that Taylor was awake tried to let her recognize her but, apparently her elder daughter was still trapped within one of the spells of the witch. As Michelle began to sob uncontrollably, with Taylor uncomfortably trying to comfort her back, Frankie remembered about the magical phone.

Quickly grabbing it from her cleavage she rapidly realized that, although sweaty, it was still working.

With a smile, as she selected the App that had restored her memories, she knew what to do.


--------- A FEW DAYS LATER ---------------

Few days had passed, and yet the Hathaway's were still in the candy house.

Thanks to the magical phone, Frankie had managed to restore Taylor memories, although she could do nothing to free her from the other spells she had been subjected by the witch.

The family had decided to use those few days to decide what should they do.

As much as Michelle wanted to return to their homestead, she couldn’t deny that there were advantages in staying there, at the candy house. Firstly, all the furniture seemed to repair themselves during the night, as long as a few crumbs were left around. Secondly, given Taylor current problem in dealing with her hunger and size, she wasn’t sure that at their old house she could still feed her and keep a roof on their heads.

Taylor wanted nothing more than leave that ghostly place, to try and return to her normal life, although she knew perfectly well that it was merely a dream. With how big she had gotten under Frida ministration, with her almost endless hunger and her apparently limitless stomach capacity, she knew that there weren’t much chances that she could ever return to a normal life. Unless, of course, Frankie couldn’t manage to do something about it. In her little sister she laid all of her hopes.

Frankie, thanks to her constant usage of the magical phone I the last days, seemed to have gained something like an affinity to magical items and thanks to that was getting more and more proficient with the witch magic as time passed. With that in mind she had confided to both her mother and sister that, given enough time in the candy house, she was confident she could undo the witch spells on all of them.
Although how much time she needed, she couldn’t really say.

Nonetheless, Michelle, Taylor and Frankie were happy of being once again all together.

And so life began anew for the Hathaway’s as each of them began a new, different, chapter of their own life. Michelle, by living there in the house, soon managed to learn the secret behind the making of the strange, and yet so alluring, baked furniture. With that knowledge and her own bakery, she soon began to make it on her own and to sell it around, making a discreet success out of it.

Taylor, although unable to return to her old life, still managed to learn to cope with how life was going to be for her. True, she couldn’t perform anymore any fitness exercise nor she could participate to her friend’s club activities but, she had to admit that there were advantages to being at her size. Maybe it was due to what the witch had done to her, maybe to the fact she had by now grown used to eating, but passing all day long eating and stuffing herself was strangely satisfying.

Although, she still missed to be able to run around.

Frankie, on her side, by error and trials, was finally managing to have a better understanding of what she could do with her newfound powers. Already she was able to create, using the magical phone as a base, a few simple spells although she still wasn’t able to remove the spells from Taylor. Still, she kept on trying, studying and practicing knowing that someday she was going to be able to free her sister from the witch influences.

And yet, something still baffled her.

If the witch had been defeated, how she was still able to use the magical phone if it was a direct creation of Frida?

True, the crystalized puddle that had been the witch was still in the hallway and, also true, there seemed to be some magical residual coming from that but, and of this Frankie was sure, Frida was dead.

So, nothing harmless could come out of it, right?

And, as it is said in all fairy tales, everyone lived happily ever after…

(The story could finish here, but, if you feel like I do, that there is still something that need to be clarified, you may proceed onward to the next chapter)
1523221321211121242112231111.title: What, in truth, an end is…

choices: Keep focusing the Hathaway’s family as the curse works on them
Taylor friends come visiting their friend in the Candy house
Scott Tomlinson pass to meet with Taylor
Or maybe the curse was for something else?
15232213212111212421122311111.content:
Life seemed to have finally reached stability and normalcy for the Hathaway family. But something was lurking in the shadows, waiting for a certain action to be executed in order to strike at them.

As time passed and all of them lived happily and in tranquility inside the house, not one of them realized that since being there, any of them had ever stepped foot outside. Some of them were exempted from this scenario, Taylor for example, since she was barely able to move anymore on her own. But even Michelle, the one that still had most contacts with the outside world, hadn’t left the house, but asked Frankie’s magical powers to just teleport the furniture she baked directly at the bakery to be sold.

It was like they unconsciously knew that something terrible could happen if they left the safe haven that the Candy House had become.

And yet, one of them was going to, inadvertently, do something that they might regret it.

Frankie was practicing with a new spell she had learned, one the basically let her teleport multiple objects, and even people, from one place to another. She wanted to get better at it since it could become useful to help Taylor moving around, visiting places and what not.

But as she practiced the transportation of a few glasses full of water from the kitchen sink to the garden, and back, she inadvertently teleported also her mom since she got too near at the last minute.

In front of her eyes, suddenly, Michelle vanished from view, appearing unharmed outside.

“Frankie!

How many times I’ve got to tell you? If you practice with magic, let me know where you’re going to do it!

At least this time you didn’t turn me into a vase again.”

“But, Mom… that was an accident and I did turn you back immediately, didn’t I?”

As the two of them discussed, Michelle opened the door of the Candy House and entered but, just as she entered all in the house felt something changing. Something that had been waiting for this very action to be performed.

Unbeknownst to all of them, as Frida realized that she was going to die, she let out one final curse. One that would activate only when someone entered or exited the house.

As Michelle stepped inside, their world seemed to stop for a moment.

The curse, finally able to release its power, acted immediately changing forever the occupants of the house. Michelle, the closer to what had been Frida, was the one which was hit the most by the spell. As thewave of cursed energy flowed through her, she began to see the world surrounding her in a different way. As she turned around, seeing the still quite obese Frankie standing open mouthed, she realized that her poor daughters were still so malnourished and that it was her moral duty to bring both of them to a healthier weight...and when that was reached, she may be able to sate a sudden hunger she felt deep within herself.
.
Unknown to her, that was the power of the curse. That was the final revenge from Frida.

To force Michelle, the same one that had defeated her, to become just like she had been...a Witch.

As long as Michelle would stay into the Candy house, she would see whoever came in, or lived in there, as if they were perpetually undernourished and so in need to grow healthier. Frankie and Taylor both suffered from a similar effect, although, since they had been farther away from the source, they both were limited to see each other and whoever else came into the house to be waifish-ly thin, but without any urge to feed them, as it had been for their mother.

As the wave of cursed energy dispersed, a weak laugh could be heard for a moment, one so weak that was barely audible and yet, distinctly similar to the voice of Frida.

Michelle stood speechless for a moment, as she tried to remember what had just happened, but nothing seemed out of the ordinary. As she closed the door and turned around, though, she almost shrieked seeing Frankie so thin that she could almost count her ribs.

“My god, Frankie! Taylor! What happened to you?”

“What do you mean, mom?”
Frankie replied puzzled by her mom attitude, but, as she looked at herself she brought both of hands on her mouth, as if trying to keep herself from screaming.

“Why I’m so thin? Mom!?”

Taylor was in a similar position, although she wasn’t so worried by the size she was seeing herself, since she thought she could do all the activities that were forbidden to her before due to her size.

“Why… are you… all so… worried? We may… be a tad… too thin… but, that’s nothing… to be… so worried… about it…”

Although Taylor saw herself thin, she actually wasn't. She was still the same huge girl barely able to move on her own or to speak, as she exhaled her speech stopping often to get her breath back.

Michelle, seeing her two girls at such unhealthy weight, felt the immediate urge to provide them with as much food as she could prepare.

Still, as nothing was readily available, except for some of her own baked marzipan furniture, she quickly pushed both Taylor and Frankie on a couch, and gave to the two of them various large pieces of the latest couch she was making.

“Don’t worry, dears…I’ll have you two at a healthier weight soon.”
15232213212111212421122311111.title: …is only a new beginning. ;)

choices: The chairs break under the girl weight, she manages to gurgle something to her m
Frankie woke up suddenly trying to defuse the situation

152322132121112124211223111111.content:
It was a new day for the inhabitants of the candy house, none of them seemed to have any memory of the strange dark wave that had caused them to be frightened just the previous day. It was as if nothing had ever happened.

And yet, the curse from Frida, her revenge, had just begun by changing them all.

It’s breakfast time, and Michelle is preparing the last items on her to-do list. Smiling widely, she looked at the table in front of her, she baked it just the previous night and it was magnificent if she could say so herself. It was a massive table made of marzipan and Oreo cookie crumbles, capable of holding its own with at least six guests and, as it stood now, there wasn’t a single inch of it free of something edible.

From her point of view, it was strange the situation she was in, with her daughters. She still couldn’t believe that both her daughters were so freakishly thin but, probably, the witch that had taken them captives had been an evil maniac or something, in truth Michelle didn’t really care about that person. All that mattered was that both her daughters returned at the soonest to a healthier weight.

As she called them for breakfast, the first to arrive was, as usual, Frankie.

Her little girl was still in her growing out years and to see her so thin always made Michelle cry a bit. In truth, Frankie was anything but thin. She had managed, through her newfound abilities, to keep most of the weight she had gained under Frida’s tutelage, but not that much that would compromise also her moving capabilities. She had admitted to herself, also, that she was growing rather fond of the diaper that Frida had force her to wear. True, it had been a bit humiliating at first but, she couldn’t deny the advantages of it. Plus, with magic on her side, cleaning herself up was done with a snap of her fingers, literally.

Still, since the previous day she saw herself to be waifish in size, so thin that she often wondered how she was able to move around. But, as she entered the dining room and saw her mother beaming at her, whilst showing her the table full of food, Frankie knew that she was soon going to get back at a healthier weight.
As both mother and daughter sat at the table, they both heard loud thumps signaling the coming of the third member of their family. Taylor.

Now, Taylor was a bit of a hot point of discussion within themselves. Both Michelle and Frankie were worried about her thin-like appearance. Michelle, since she felt the primal need to feed her, and Frankie because she worried Taylor might injury herself by being that much thin.

Taylor instead was ecstatic about the change.

For a moment she had had a nightmare about being freakishly huge but, since her mom rescued her from the evil witch, she saw herself so skinny she could almost feel her own bones under the skin. There were negative points to the situation too, as in the loss of any actual breast she had, but she figured that by gaining a little bit of weight she could curb that.

Still when the double doors opened, and Taylor moved forward to enter the dining room, she soon found herself stuck in the middle of the doorframe.

“Urgh! Frankie! Stop playing with your damn magic and let the door frame return to their sizes! I’m getting sick and tired of this.”

“What? I haven’t done anything! If only you were a bit stronger you could manage on your own…but, nooo…You prefer to be a skinny little meanie!”

As the girl began to banter, Michelle raised her voice, shutting them both.

“Girls! After all that went through, you still want to fight between you two?

Frankie, Dear, I know you didn’t do it, but can’t you use your magic to enlarge the doorframe to a more normal size?
And you, Taylor, not only be gentle with your sister, but also try to eat a little bit more, you’re so thin…You’ve got big bones but those alone are not enough.”

Both girls, now subdued, mumbled some excuses to the other, and then proceeded to do as their mother asked. Frankie, quickly taking out her phone, began to cast a quick spell to enlarge the doorframe, although the doors were already wider than normal. Taylor, instead, managing to pass through the widened doorframe, waddled slowly to the three chairs she needed to be seated at the table. Not even for a moment she wondered why she needed three chairs to seat if she was so thin, but she didn’t think much about it as she was now focused only on the massive mounds of food awaiting her.

As the two girls sat, Michelle began quickly to spread the food within them, enjoying how her girls seemed to be famished and eager to fill their hungry bellies. Frankie, on her part, just to be on the safer side, casted a quick, silent, spell on her sister, making so that she would get hungry every time she managed to stuff herself full of food. As much as she wanted to grow healthier herself, she worried about Taylor, since she saw her stick thin. Michelle, instead, kept providing more and more food on both daughters although, without saying anything to them, she gave somewhat more to Taylor.

From her point of view, Frankie was the obedient little child which followed her advices, but Taylor was the rebellious one and so she tried to help her without being seen.

As time passed, Frankie managed to stuff herself full of food. After cleaning several plates by herself, she caressed the hugely bloated middle she sported, which barely missed the table as big as it was. The little girl felt awesome. She knew that by eating that much she could grow healthier faster but, suddenly, she also was aware of how weighted down she felt. Burping loudly, she felt suddenly the urge to leave the table to ‘relieve herself’ in the bathroom. But as urgent it was, she knew she couldn’t have moved from there even if she truly wanted it. Still, it wasn’t a big issue. Trying to make as small noise as she could she simply let herself go right then and there, marveling once more at the only good idea that the witch had in her regards.

Having the diaper on had been quite shameful at first but, Frankie soon realized that it was so comfortable that she couldn’t think to live without it.

Taylor, instead, was having issues during her meal. As much as she shoveled food down her throat, uncaringly of what she was eating, or how much of it she was swallowing, she couldn’t feel her hunger abate. At first, she had been overjoyed in seeing herself as skinny as she thought to be but, with this endless hunger burning in the pit of her stomach she began to wonder if it was really okay for her to be that thin.

With the spell casted from Frankie and her mother providing her more than she could actually consume, Taylor soon found herself trapped on her three chairs, surrounded by a seemingly endless supply of food she felt she needed to eat and yet, her fattened body didn’t seem to have any more energies to keep going.

It began softly but, as she realized she hadn’t the strength to feed herself, Taylor began to literally cry in pain as her belly roared in need of more food. As Taylor burst out in tears, Michelle was the first who went at her side, as she immediately saw what the issue was. She saw Taylor as she tried to lift her arms tiringly but wasn’t managing on her own. For this, with a somewhat creepy smile on her face, she began to bring spoonful after spoonful to her hungry daughter, managing so to stop her wailing, replacing it with a content little murmur as she fed her.

For hours this meal went on.

With Frankie asleep on her chair, there was nobody to actually stop Taylor hunger to self-regenerate, but neither Taylor nor Michelle found the situation strange. Taylor was hungry and wanted to feel sated and full, while Michelle was enjoying every minute of the feeding. Still, although Taylor hunger was magically induced, her body was starting to reach its limit. With several dozen pounds of food pushed within its confines, Taylor belly began to gurgle ominously, as it struggled to find room available for each new load that was brought forth.

Taylor herself began to worry a little.

Sure, she was enjoying the feeding that her Mom was forcing on her but, she too felt as her body began to reach its maximum capacity and yet, she was unable to warn Michelle about that as the spoonfuls of food were being pushed in her mouth so fast she could barely breath or gasp for air.

As the creaking noise rose in intensity something had to give…
152322132121112124211223111111.title: The increasingly Healthier Hathaway’s

choices: Frankie starts to show a dark interest in Taylor’s growth
Michelle start pampering both Frankie and Taylor, with or without their consent.
Taylor begin to act lazier and more passively
Frida’s vengeful spirit continues influencing the inhabitants of the house
1523221321211121242112231111112.content:
Taylor was starting to feel truly full. Way more than full.

Still, she felt this deep huger within herself, so she couldn’t stop herself from accepting more and more from her mother, as Michelle kept feeding her. And yet, the teenager body seemed to have reached its limit.

As the feeding continued, Taylor smile faded as the first button of her blouse popped off, pushed away by the ever-enlarging size of her overfilled belly, as it tried to have more space to grow. Soon after the first, one by one all buttons of her blouse popped off, swiftly followed by the one of her shorts.

Now her belly had no more constrictive clothing retraining it but, Taylor worriedly thought, there wasn’t still much time before she felt full to burst once more.

Frankie was happily dreaming about herself and her family, all huddled together in the ballroom of a castle, At one side of the room she saw Taylor, sitting on the floor, as she had a long line of servants dumping into her mouth platter upon platter of delicacies, as she ate contently. Then she saw her mother, Michelle, sitting on the throne, looking rather please at their daughters. And then she saw herself, sitting in a small throne like chair, as a table of food spread out in front of her. Happily, Frankie began to eat as much as she could out of the endless table, mowing down anything that was close enough to her, feeling herself filling up and out, as her body seemed to grow larger and larger after each morsel. And yet, at some point she felt herself getting full and with the urge to relieve herself.

For a moment she was worried that she had to stand up and leave the table, until she realized that she still had her diaper on. Giggling like a small child she simply let herself go, feeling as her taxed stomach could now manage much more, now that it had been emptied. Still, before indulging again, she quickly snapped her fingers letting her magic taking care of all the nasty business with that item of clothing she was found so comfortable in wearing.

Now, ready once more to indulge herself she made to grab a huge slice of cake when something caught her eye. Turning on her side she notices that Taylor was still gulping down whatever the servants brought her, uncaring of the size of the dish, or of its content. But Taylor didn’t seem happy about it.

Intrigued by this, Frankie rose from her seats and tried to go near her sister but, as much as she waddled onward, Taylor seemed to be moved always a step away from her. Suddenly, as she still was waddling after her sister, an ominous gurgle seemed to emanate from Taylor’s belly, a gurgle that was growing louder and louder. Frankie, now afraid for her, tried to warn their mother that something wasn’t right but, the gurgling noise was too loud for her to hear anything.

Powerless to stop it, Frankie could only watch as Taylor face scrunched in pain for a full minute, before a rather cartoonish explosion blew right under Frankie’s terrified eyes.

With that, Frankie woke up, trembling from her nap.

Looking around, still worried sick about her sister, she turned toward her and saw a similar situation with what she had just dreamt upon. Taylor was still seated on her chairs, as Michelle fed her more and more junk food and pies, deaf to the ominous rumbling noise coming from Taylor’s overtaxed belly. For a moment, Frankie thought about warning her mother, but she quickly realized that Michelle could do nothing. Then she remembered about the spell she had casted upon her sister to help her grow.

Franticly, the young girl began to prepare a counter spell to disperse the one she had launched previously. But, as she did so she realized she had to time it perfectly. For, if she took the spell away too early, Taylor would still be feeling hungry with her belly to fill and, if she casted it too late, poor Taylor would be too full to resist anymore. Working quickly with her phone she began to cast the spell, waiting the perfect moment before launching it, without realizing that she was going to use a spell deeply connected to the darkest shade of the phone magic. Just as the spell was going to regenerate Taylor’s hunger, Frankie completed her ritual shutting it down, letting Taylor overfilled body to feel, finally, full.

Taylor, now feeling finally sated did accept a couple more morsels from Michelle hand but, munching on them slowly, she quickly fell asleep in a, much deserved, food coma like sleep. Michelle, seeing as her elder daughter finally fall asleep, she smiled upon her, kissing her quietly on the forehead, before turning around to start cleaning the table out.

Frankie, instead, couldn’t take off her eyes from Taylor as she slept away her humongous meal.

As she kept staring at her sister body, now seeing it less thin than before, but not yet to a more normal level, she felt herself full of doubts. But as focused on Taylor as she was she didn’t seem to notice that a dark shadow seemed to emerge from the phone, through the contact made with the ritual she had used to free her sister. As she mulled it over, the shadow began to collect itself, unnoticed, on the wall behind all of them, and releasing tiny tendrils of darkness toward each of them, having them slowly crawl within their heads.

As each small wormlike tendril of darkness penetrated each of the girls in the room, a somewhat creepy smile appeared on the main dark shadow still on the wall and a soft laugh, so soft it was barely audible, began to exhume from there.

Frankie was mulling over what had happened to her sister. It was her fault that Taylor had almost been at risk of bursting and yet, as the tendril crawled within her, a new thought emerged to oppose the guilt she was feeling.

‘Still…if it wasn’t for my knowledge on these spells, she would have starved to death…’

‘Well…I suppose it is true but…’

‘And so, what if my knowledge was far greater? If I could use Taylor as a test subject for my spells, wouldn’t I oversee her? She would be perfectly safe under my watch…’

‘Hmm…That’s also true…And with how close I’ve come this time I will for sure be more watchful over her…Yes, I think I could actually do it. She still needs to grow healthier after all…’

‘Yes, indeed…I just won’t tell her anything…Need to be sure of her true reactions…’

Frankie, now eyeing Taylor with an interested glare, began to think on which spell she could use on her sister, without realizing that it hadn’t been really her to have suggested it, but liking the idea, nonetheless.

Michelle, instead was still thinking to how good it had felt to simply feed her daughter, that she wanted it or not, but busy as she was she never saw the dark, oily, tendril merging with her as a strange thought crossed her mind.

‘If only Taylor would let me feed her like that at every meal...it would be so good to see my children grow healthily by my own hands...’

‘And yet, I could do it, nonetheless. I would just need a little cooperation from Frankie, to make it so that Taylor would grow more childish and I could have her all for myself…’

‘Well…I…I guess that’s true but, she’s still my daughter…she needs to think with her own mind.’

‘And yet, by letting her think with her own mind she has grown rebellious, hasn’t she? Would it hurt her so much to be pampered by her loving mother?’

‘Still…’

‘Afterwards, I could simply convince Frankie to join her. Showing her how good it is to be pampered day and night by your loving parent…wouldn’t it be nice?’

With a shudder Michelle turned around a bit, watching closely her daughters, feeling every minute more confident about that strange idea that had seemingly sprouted out of nowhere, in her mind.

Taylor, instead was sleeping deeply, digesting the massive meal she had consumed, as the fear she had felt previously, slowly vanished from her mind. As she soundly slept, though, something seemed to penetrate her mind, moving her thoughts away from her idea of being beautiful as a thin girl.

‘I could eat all I want, and still be beautiful. Far more beautiful that if I was a thin girl. Who cares about gym and exercises? I could just laze about all day long, feeling full all the time…’

‘N-no…Gym is good…Friends would laugh…at me…’

‘Who would care about them? Me? No. I could just fill my days with eating, being pampered by Mom and Frankie. I could become beautiful…and being so sey I could have any man I wanted. Who cares about those Friends? They know nothing...’

‘Food…good…But…feeling…overstuffed…pain!’

‘It was painful? Yes. But was it worth it? It was amazing. I can’t deny it. I need to feel it again…and again…and again… ’

Taylor’s dreams began to change, passing from her being with her friends, to her being served by her friends, growing bigger and bigger, fatter and fatter. Feeling every time reaching just a tad below her bursting point. As this idea lodged firmly in her head, Taylor began once more to relax in her deep sleep.

The shadow, now appearing on the wall with the profile of the old owner of the candy house, smiled evilly.

She may have lost her body, and her life, but she could still exact her revenge on them all...

1523222212.content:
“Seriously, Vega? Of all the times your phone had to die-“

“I said I’m sorry okay!” Tori pleaded to the grumbling Jade. Yeah, Tori was to blame for the two being late to school after convincing Jade to re-route through a shortcut she discovered, yet as things would have it, Tori forgot an important turn. Sending the two into a more secluded part of LA, mostly untouched by man.

Pinching the bridge of her nose with her one un-used hand, she seethed in frustration, “Can you at least pull up the map on your phone?” Jade West spoke through her teeth. Wondering why she decided to bear through Vega’s insipid idiocy. Tori, for a few seconds, fumbled with her phone and then went silent again.

She cleared her throat, “I can’t get a signal.”

“You what?!?” Jade’s grip turned white-knuckled onto the steering wheel. There it remained unless it were to clamp onto Tori’s neck.

“Hold on. I think I almost-gah! Got a signal-oh there it goes again! Can’t you just drive back the way we went?”

“Ugh. Fine.” The wheels stopped rotating, resting the car aside the remote dirt path. Jade forced the stick to have the car change gears. That's when a nerve-wracking noise rattled through the car. Tori looked up and then at Jade who seemed more frustrated that the stick froze mid-gear.

"Um, Jade. Do you hear a noise?"

The noise came to a halt, “What? That noise?”

“Hrm?” the unfamiliar sound rang once more through the car, “Hey! It’s not moving!”, Tori leaned to her left, a little too close to Jade's personal bubble, “That’s because you’re out of gas.” While Tori was trying to be helpful, Jade, on the other hand felt-

“GEE! Thanks! Tori! What’s next?!? You’re gonna-“ she held her mouth shut and pounded the steering wheel, “Whatever. I’m gonna look for some help. Keep looking for a signal.” The car door swung open and out exits a fuming Jade leaving a bewildered and scared Tori behind. Angry boot-clad steps followed one after another onto the side of the road. There, Jade came upon a tree line in which in the middle of the forestry she could make out a house in the distance.

“Weird. I wouldn’t expect this much tree life in the middle of LA. The forest fires here must get pretty crazy.”

Jade ventured on. Her hands protected the fabric of her flowing black skirt and matching leggings. The green of her long sleeve shirt almost paralleled that of the leaves connect to every branch brushing against her clothes. Between the thick of the foliage, her eyes could make out something resembling a home. As she came closer and closer to her destination, the more she believed there was some kind of cruel trick being played on her. Jade didn’t expect to stumble upon a house looking like it jumped right out of a Brother’s Grimm tale.

“There’s no way somebody could be living in this.”

The structure that stood before Jade was entirely made of our confections. Icing oozed along the exterior acting as the caulk for the gingerbread walls to remain together. Colorful gumdrops decorated the perimeter. Sweet taffy flowers sprouted from the ground creating a eye pleasing garden. The roof of the home is formed from sweet candies.

“Heh. It’s probably just some silly Hollywood attraction. Must be new.”

The hypnotic aroma of the gingerbread structure had enticed Jade. One foot after the other, the gothic actress approached. Her hand gently felt along the side of the home, “It’s real?”, her tongue tapped her finger, a sweet lingering floated around her taste buds, “It’s actually icing!”

Jade whipped her head back and fourth. The coast is clear.

“No sign of Vega or anyone else. And it doesn’t look like anyone is home at the moment.” Willing to entertain the craving forming in her taste buds, Jade brought herself closer to the home with her mouth opening. She started to nibble on the soft gingerbread wall warmed by the sun.

Her hands grip at the gingerbread and she accidently rips off a huge chunk, “Oh shi-oh well.” The gingerbread is s soft gooey and chewy that her hands slightly mend the treat. The nibble Jade West started with grew into full on mouth filling bites of gingerbread.

With a swipe of her forearm Jade wiped away any stray crumbs on her mouth. The gothic girl tugged at the bottom of her long green shirt, which seemed to ride upward a touch.

“Boy…Think I’m eating way too much. Okay. Just a one more.”

Jades eyes went from the gingerbread wall to the ground where an odd bush somehow went overlooked. The bush had hot, fresh cinnamon rolls sprouted from certain branches. Hot icing oozed around each roll and dripped onto the leaves.

“Just one,” Jade reaches down and helps herself to one promised cinnamon roll growing from the bush. Her curiosity glazes over the impossible science of what is before her and is, instead, more interested in the taste of the cinnamon delights.

With three or four medium sized bites the cinnamon roll vanished into her stomach. Without half a minute passing Jade had already gone back on her word. Her hand went back for more cinnamon rolls when…

15232222222221131.content:
Derek huffed angrily at Stiles. "What the hell are you doing out here?" he asked through a full mouth of gingerbread.

Stiles huffed right back, "I'm doing my job as part of this pack, Derek. You're not the only one who patrols, you know." Stiles leaned against the house and crossed his arms, glaring at the werewolf.

Derek took another bite of the gingerbread before speaking " 'ut 'ou're 'uman, 'iles." Derek chewed on the gingerbread and then swallowed before continuing, "You shouldn't be patrolling alone."

Stiles stood back up and marched into Derek's space. "Neither should you, big guy," he replied, smacking Derek's muscled stomach with the back of his hand. "We're all supposed to be patrolling in pairs. Just because you're the alpha doesn't mean you can go off on your own!"

Derek felt a pang of warmth from where Stiles had touched him. He always felt it when the younger man touched him. Most of the pack knew that Derek had a crush on his emissary, but Derek had sworn them all to secrecy. He didn't want Stiles to feel pressured, and he definitely thought the younger boy could do better than an angry alpha werewolf with a past in ashes. Didn't mean he still didn't enjoy any time they had together, and every time Stiles touched him, Derek's heart started pounding like it was doing now. Derek could feel a blush coming on.

Derek took a huge bite of gingerbread to hide his flush, "uh oo ih ooahn ah oo uh..."

Stiles interrupted the werewolf, "whoa, hang on there, man, I can't understand a word you're saying. Why don't you swallow before you start talking again so I can understand you.

Derek was suddenly surprised to find that he was still eating the gingerbread. He quickly chewed and swallowed his mouthful, the too large chunk hurting as he forced it down his esophagus. "Stiles, I..." Derek took another bite, against his wishes, "...I 'an' 'op!"

Stiles furrowed his eyebrows "You can't stop eating?"

Derek's rapid head shake was followed by another bite of gingerbread.

"Huh, weird. Well, we should probably ask the person who made the house, then." Stiles offered.

Derek furrowed his caterpillary brows at the younger man. "oo 'ow 'ho 'ade uh 'ouse?" Derek grunted out, before shoving the last large chunk of gingerbread from his hands into his mouth, pushing his cheeks out like a chipmunk.

Stiles...

When Emerson woke up, he found himself in a cage with 3 other guys, whose weights ranged from chubby to fat. "What in the world..?" he asked himself quietly. "Hey! Where am I?" The three other boys turned around from what seemed to be troughs, with food pieces all over their chubby faces. Emerson then realized who these people were; they were other soccer players. He recognized Cristiano, Philippe and Sergio. "What happened to you guys, you're all fat!" Emerson shouted. "I'm not fat! I'm super ripped!" Cristiano obnoxiously claimed, following with, "you're looking pretty chubby yourself there, Emerson." Emerson just looked back in confusion, "I'm the only one here who still has a six pack, you all look like fat pigs." "I'm the only one who doesn't look like a pig," Sergio said, "You all are fat." Philippe was too busy still eating, due to his larger meals given to him by the witch. Emerson, Cristiano and Sergio soon got into an argument though, and it was only interrupted when the witch came in with more food.

"Time to eat, boys!" she said as she poured food into the troughs, making an extra one for Emerson. Philippe's trough was overflowing with food, and it was astounding it hadn't broken. Emerson felt hungry, so he didn't question the method of eating, just stuffing his face like the other boys. Laia came in to check on their progress. "It seems like it'll be awhile before dear Emerson catches up," the witch said, "what a shame, he looks like he'd make such a good piggy." Laia then chimed in, "Speak of Emerson's weight, I have an idea on how to catch him up," Laia started. The witch looked interested so she went on. "I've been looking through your books and I wanted to practice my skills, so I want to test out a _____ to help him catch up!"

"I like your thinking, I almost forgot that there were some spells I wanted to try out." Laia said. "There are plenty of ways to fatten up these piggies," the witch started, "we don't have to stick to that cake, although it is very useful." So the two witches went through all the spells Laia had marked, since they were the ones she liked the most. Then they debated on which ones to use, to narrow down the vast variety of choices. "We should pick spells that help us speed this process up, and also ones that allow us to do outrageously hilarious things." the witch stated, with Laia nodding her head in agreement. "But which kind of spells should we prioritize?" Laia asked, "Personally, I like the ones that make them more like pigs, it's just so funny!" Laia added. "Well we can use those after we've fattened them up nicely," the witch started, "they are much too small for my liking." "I think the spells that make them act more like pigs speeds up how fast they get fatter, since they're losing care and only caring about food." The witch looked thoughtfully, staring at the floor but looking at nothing in particular. "You have a point, but I'd rather just fatten them up." she replied.

The two girls argued until they came to a decision. "How about we use one spell we each like, and then decide which one we'll use from there." Laia proposed. "Good idea, that way we can see how effective, or ineffective, the spell is." the witch replied. So the two witches went back to the books, flipping through them like mad women, to find the one spell they enjoyed the most. Eventually, they reconvened and summarized what their spell did. The main witch went first, since it was her house. "My spell makes it so that whenever one of the pigs gains a pound in weight, all the other pigs also gain a pound!" she said, with bold confidence. Laia looked impressed, but was sure her spell was superior. "Well, my spell allows us to write on this paper." Laia said. The witch laughed, "I can do that normally, you silly girl, looks like we're using my sp-" "You didn't let me finish" Laia interrupted. "Whatever we write on this paper will happen to the pigs, so we can do whatever we want to them!" The witch's eyes grew wide. 'How did Laia find this powerful of a spell?' she wondered. "Well, let's test them out and see which one we like more." the witch said.

Johnny and Lauren Orlando were brother and sister and had been slumbering away inside of their beds on one hot summer night, and snoring loudly, their bedrooms interconnected. Johnny had brownish hair in a big foppy front at the top of his head, and slightly rosy cheeks, and somewhat large ears, whilst his sister, Lauren, had long hair that flowed down either side of her face, split in the middle at the top. The two were snoozing away, unaware of what was about to happen to them

Indeed, what now hovered among them was an unidentified woman, a genuine, bona-fide WITCH!

The witch had placed a spell to keep the asleep as she went to grab them, right down towards the house and towards Johnny’s bedroom as he slumbered away. A faintly blush hue emanated from the her and sure enough, slowly but surely, poor Johnny got lifted out of his bed, hovering above it and the thick white comforters, and then…POP! He was shrunk clean into the witch's bag to carry, into a glass jar. The witch then slunk over to Lauren’s room and did the same thing to at her, she too soon rose slightly off the bed, and then POP! Into the jar she went, and then easily flew away to her house!

Having gotten exactly what she came for, the witch left with her prey The witch who had snatched them up already getting to work, and were putting something onto Johnny and Lauren’s slumbering forms…collars! Collars of a bright silvery material, as some leashes hung on a wall behind them.

Johnny and Lauren, however, were beginning to take notice, even in their slumber, that something was off. It had gotten a bit chillier all of a sudden, and their “bed” felt much harder and…

Their eyes flew open and they rose up, gasping, feeling over the tight collars on their necks as their naked bodies were now standing in front of…the witch that looked like young women! Unfortunately, the two didn’t even have the mercy of being in the same room, each had been deposited in a different room and kept separate as they now gaped in surprise, the a witch with faintly pointy, almost cat-like ears smiled cheekily at them
