1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Henry Danger

1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Henry was out in the woods. He didn't want to be out in the woods, but he had to. The extraordinary Captain Man was sick in bed today and Schwoz was taking care of him. "Do you think it was such a good idea to send Henry out all by himself?" Schwoz asked Captain Man while he spoon fed him some soup. "Henry'll be fine," he responded, gulping down another spoonful of chicken noodle, "He's done stuff like this before no problem!" Schwoz was still a little on edge, "Yes, Ray, but Henry's going to be facing Sweet Delight, one of your most fearsome rivals!" Ray just looked back in confusion, "That sounds like an ice cream parlor, and I am no rival of ice cream." Schwoz smacked his face with his open hand, and just shook his head, "She's the lady that gave you a stomach ache so massive you couldn't move for 3 weeks!" It was like a light bulb sparked in Ray's head at that moment, "Oh yeah, I thought that was just because it was my birthday weekend," he started, "well, I'm sure Henry will still be fine, he's capable, just as long as no other villain shows up" Schwoz chuckled, "Yeah, like The Slobinator, or GigaTON" The former was known for his awful mannerism, stench and gas, while the other was known for his massive size and for making people fatter. Luckily, the thing they both shared in common was that they were in jail. Ray and Schwoz just chuckled as they relaxed, believing Henry would be okay.

"Aw man, I'm lost" Henry said. His stomach grumbled, "and I'm hungry!" He was in a foul mood, Ray got to stay home and be fed chicken noodle soup all day while he was out here trying to find some lady. "Tch, Sweet Delight" Henry scoffed, "what's she gonna do? Give me some desert?" Henry walked around the forest for a while, trying to decipher the map Ray had drawn for him. It was just a bunch of trees, an unrecognizable picture, and a house, with other pictures to indicate road marks. Needless to say the map wasn't very helpful, which led to Henry where he was now, talking to himself to keep himself occupies, lost, and most of all, hungry. However, something piqued Henry's sense of smell, which was that of sweet desert. He assumed it was Sweet Delight, and ran off to find her so he can get home and to some food. However, he was met with a crying lady outside a house of what appeared to be candy. Henry rushed over to the woman. "What's wrong ma'am?" he asked. "Oh, hello boy," she said between her weeps, "it's a long story, but this here is sort of a project of mine" she said. Henry was interested, and let her go on. "I entered into a competition to make the most eccentric and creative house, as you see with my delicious candy house, but I lost, and got 3rd at that!" she weeped and burst into tears. "Well, how can I help?" Henry asked. "Well, I do love to cook, as you could probably tell, and I have some new recipes that I want to try out, would you be my taste tester?" she asked, "I'm Melinda by the way," she held her hand out. Henry couldn't believe what he was hearing, and gave her a firm handshake saying, "I'd love to! I'm Henry, also" "Great!" Melinda cried out, as if her sadness never existed. "You're welcome to try some of my house while you wait, I can tell you're hungry" Henry happily accepted the offer, and went inside with Melinda. After have the delicious scent of the house flow through his nostrils, Henry had to decide on what to eat. He looked around and eventually saw something that he decided to try out.

1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
About an hour later, Henry had enjoyed himself to the fullest. He had eaten several of the marshmallow pillows, enjoying the icing insides as well as the marshmallowy outside. Once had gotten tired of that, he decided to try some of the couch itself. Melinda said it was fine, since she had more brownie couches throughout the house. The couch itself was so delicious and flavorful, and the brownie wasn't dry at all, in fact it was the exact opposite! Henry couldn't help himself but eat more of the couch than he said he would, but Melinda only seemed happier that he did so. After eating the entire couch, Henry was lying down on the floor, before Melinda got him another couch to rest on. He thought nothing of it, and just relaxed after eating so much. It was odd though, Henry still felt hungry even though he had eaten such a large amount of food. He must've been really hungry, otherwise he would've been stuffed right now. However, his appetite would come in handy soon enough.

"Henry! I've finished some of my new dishes, come and try some!" Melinda cried out from the kitchen. Henry lazily got up and sat down at the table, which was made out of sugar and chocolate. "I call this one, candy pizza!" Melinda said, putting a plate down. The dish looked like pizza, but made out of sugar. The sauce was pink icing, the crust was chocolate, the cheese was marshmallow, and the pepperonis were made of gummy. Melinda set down another plate next to the candy pizza, "I know you must be tired of sweets, so here's something more organic!" Organic was a pretty liberal word. Melinda had set down a massive burger, with tons of cheese, lots of condiments and two burger patties. Instead of being repulsed, Henry's stomach grumbled in temptation. The boy felt his hunger come back, and he dug into both dishes. Melinda smiled with joy that Henry loved her dishes so much. She also loved how he was growing a belly, which would be even bigger soon enough.

However, her phone rang while she watched Henry. "Sorry Henry, I've gotta take this" Melinda said as she left the room. She answered the call when she was out of ear's reach, "What do you want?" she snapped. "I'm just wondering when we're getting out of here," a deep voice responded, "You do have a plan to get us out of here, right Sweet Delight?" "Shut up!" Melinda replied, "I told you, my name's MELINDA" she almost yelled into the speaker. "Don't you forget it, Slobvator and MegaTON" she mockingly rebutted. "It's Slobinator and GigaTON. When are you getting us out of here though?" Melinda, also known as Sweet Delight, was in a sort of alliance or team with Slobinator and GigaTON. However, they had been caught while she hadn't, and she had a plan to get her colleagues out. "I do have a plan, and a boy to start it," she started, "I just gotta fatten him up so I can actually set it into motion" The two men on the other end laughed with joy, "I can't wait to make him a big slob!" Slobinator replied. "And I can't wait to fatten him up so much he can't stand" GigaTON said. "All in due time, but for now he's mine and you'll see him at my discretion," Melinda said, "Now if you'll excuse me, I have to attend to him" Melinda then hung up just as Henry let out a big belch. "I take it you enjoyed my dishes?" she called out. "Yeah," Henry said. Henry was still hungry though, and wanted more food from Melinda. "Could you make more _____ food, I'm starving!" Henry joyously chimed. "Oh course you can dear!" Melinda almost shrieked in joy.

Melinda's tone was persuasive enough to calm Henry down. "Maybe you're right Melinda," Henry said, "I deserve a break anyways." Melinda looked please, "Indeed you do, you seem so stressed and worked-up about everything, here have some breakfast I made." Melinda set down the tray in front of Henry, who was amazed by the many food items; pancakes, donuts, milk, bacon, sausages, and even some cookies for desert. "I do want to go investigate the woods later, though." Henry said as he dug into the food. "Yes, yes of course dear, I won't stop you," Melinda said and turned around to leave Henry to eat before saying under her breath, "that is, if you can stop stuffing your face with all my food." Melinda smirked and went back to making more food for Henry.

Melinda was glad Henry didn't notice his growing body. She clearly saw it, and it was evident to anyone who would see Henry on the streets. His moobs were stretching his shirt out, his arms and legs were plump and thick, his cheeks were getting chubbier and he was starting to get a second chin, and his belly, his belly extended to cover half of his thighs, and jiggled when Henry moved. How he didn't notice, Melinda was beyond an answer, but she was glad he was resisting nonetheless. Maybe he was already addicted to her food, maybe he was just dumb and gullible. But Melinda did know one thing, Henry had let out a belch and that meant he needed more food. She went back into his room with another tray of food, ready to have Henry eat more.

Melinda was glad to be able to relax after cooking for nearly an entire day, however she knew that would come to a close the next morning. She got up and did her morning routine; shower, brush teeth, dress, breakfast, the normal practice for mornings. While she was eating her breakfast however, Slobinator came up to her and looked concerned. "What do you want?" Melinda asked, in a cold harsh tone. She was not a morning person. "Uh, you might wanna check out the three boys." he said. So, Melinda walked over to the fattening room, and was in awe of what she saw. The stench was awful, and she knew she would have to use the containment spell to be able to even stay in the room. As for the boys, Henry had broken the supports of his bed and was just laying on his mattress, being fed by the robots, and letting out huge farts and belches. James looked to be the size Henry was when he was first let into the fattening room, and he seemed less slobby too. He was much more clean than Henry, who had food stains all over his body; essentially anywhere you could think of, there was some kind of mess. Andy was about half the size of James, and seemed to be catching up fast. He was also almost as slobby as Henry was, thanks to his inherent slobbiness.

"I don't know whether to be happy or disgusted," Melinda started, "happy because of how these boys are, but disgusted by this awful smell." "I think it smells fine." Slobinator retorted. "Of course you do," Melinda mumbled to herself. Then in a louder voice, "What did you want me to see, exactly?" "Well we're running out of food, and I wanted to ask if you could make or summon more." Slobinator said. "Of course I can do that! Anything else though, I need to get back to my breakfast." Melinda said. "Not that I can think of, thanks Melinda!" Slobinator thanked. "Whatever." Melinda coldly mumbled, "Now that I have no boy to fatten, I need to plan something, maybe steal another artifact to aid my powers, or just find another boy..."

"Alfred, what are you doing here?!?" asked Gordon, astonished by the visit of the Wayne Mansion butler.

"Thanks for the help but this can be dangerous!" warned Gordon.
"Detective ... There is nothing I do not do for the good of that boy ..." said Alfred as he rested his hand on Gordon's shoulder.

1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Come witchdoctor, we've bagged three youngsters!" the excited warrior did not hide his pride. "We are going to have fresh meat!"
The healer ran to the village centre to examine the fresh delivery. In the meantime, the prisoners were pushed into a hut where there were several small, empty cages. "They look emaciated" ... muttered, disappointed. "Take off your clothes, let's take a look at you!"
Frightened, the brothers tried to protest, plead for their rights, but the shaman silenced them with one glance. Resigned and scared, they obediently began to take off their shirts and shorts.
The shaman did not take his eyes off them. From experience, he knew that a seemingly skinny boy could hide a well-fed body under his shirt. Now he was happy to see that he had not been misled. The captives were definitely not skin and bones. Their muscles were appetizingly rounded as a result of a good life and abundant feeding. "It will not be difficult to fatten them ... They are used to regular and hearty meals," he said, groping the flanks and thighs of the prisoners.
"Get them on the scale!" he said in a commanding tone. Nick was the first to be pushed onto the device standing in the corner. Two platforms were tied to a horizontal beam, supported by a piece of trunk.
Nick reluctantly walked onto one of the platforms. One of the warriors began laying stones on the other one. With each stone, the smile on the shaman's face widened. He knew that each stone weighed 5 pounds and in his mind, he calculated the boy's weight. At 32 stones, the platform with Nick went up, which meant that he weighed 160 pounds. The witch noted the number and the size of his waist.
Next in the line was Joe, who turned out to weigh exactly the same as his brother.
Kevin was the last on the list. The shaman was particularly eager to see how heavy the lad was. Although he was also slim, he has a softer appearance than his brothers. His muscles were less defined and he had a layer of plumpness on his belly. The shaman smiled counting the stones. Kevin did not disappoint him. 34 stones meant that at the same height he weighed 10 pounds more than the others.
"Off to cages with them!" He commanded. "And feed them well!"

1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The shaman was standing in front of the cages, looking at the prisoners with pleasure. Everyone clearly gained weight, and the sight of three fat hogs increased the appetite of the villagers, who had been complaining that for a long time no feast had been organized with a well-fed young man as the main course.
The witchdoctor ordered the boys to stick their arms out through the bars of the cage and he felt them thoroughly. All three were fleshy and delicate. Looking closely he saw that Kevin was the thickest of the brothers. And no wonder - when they bagged him he was already slightly plump, and thanks to the abundant diet he filled out quickly.
"You're coming with me," he ordered, opening the cage. The frightened boy did not dare to protest when he saw the guard's menacing face. The shaman kneaded the soft wrist of the young man all the way to his hut. He could not fully embrace it with his fingers, which was just another sign that the prisoner did not require more fattening.
- You're getting porky- he said walking around the boy and pinching him here and there when they got into his hut - I think it's time for diet - he added with a malicious smile
- A diet? Kevin repeated without enthusiasm. He hated the word. He had heard it more than once from his agent, dissatisfied that his star was not as emaciated as other celebrities- But I like to eat ...
- And it shows - he laughed pinching the boy's full cheek - But think of what will happen when you get back home. Everyone will tease you about where you were grazing.
Well ... They probably will ... Kevin agreed, imagining these comments about his weight on the internet
- Stand on the scale - the shaman pushed Kevin towards the device standing in the corner - Well well well ... You're quite a chunky little porker... - he smiled. The boy did not know what the device was showing. In reality it was not just the heft of the young man. After entering his height, the weight also indicated his readiness to become a well-fed meal. It placed the weighted person in the category SKINNY, SLIM, WELL FED, PLUMP and FATTENED. The shaman smiled to see that Kevin was in the heaviest category. This ultimately sealed his fate.
- So it is decided, today you only get water. And we'll all feast tomorrow
Only water today - he instructed the guard as he escorted the prisoner back to the cage. The guard grinned. He knew that the day before being eaten, the victim was cleared in this way
"The dish will be thick and fatty," thought the witchdoctor the next day, looking at Kevin's body jiggle as he was being led in the direction of a big pot set in the middle of the village. - Some people should be careful here - he looked around - Our prisoners are high in calories and some warriors are clearly exaggerating with consumption. As it goes on, someone here might end up on a spit ...

1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sheldon was in college when a group of scientists appeared before him.
"Hello, you must be Dr. Sheldon Cooper ... Am I right?" asked the scientist.
"Yes, who asks?" said Sheldon.
"I'm Dr. Beatrice, I've been transferred from another university from abroad with my other co-workers!" explained the scientist.
"It's a pleasure! Although I have met you now, I know that my level of intelligence is much higher than yours!" said Sheldon being arrogant as always when it comes to intelligence.
The scientists were very annoyed, but Beatrice unlike the others was calm and patient, she had a plan.
"Well, well ... Come on, Sheldon, if you're so smart then I think some tests will be a piece of pie for you!" said Beatrice, directing Sheldon to the room where she is the other scientists were working.
Upon arriving in the room was a table with a white sheet covering an unknown object.
"What's under the sheet?" asked Sheldon.
"Nothing more!" said Beatrice, removing the sheet revealing that the unknown mass was a bunch of cookies.
"Cookies? Is that your scientific problem?!?" asked Sheldon rather indignantly.
"It's not simple cookies, Doctor Cooper! It's the cookies!" said Beatrice.
"What if they are the solution to the world's hunger?" "Have you ever thought, Doctor Cooper, that you were the scientist who ended the world's hunger and won the Nobel Prize?" said Dr. Beatrice in a seductive voice.
"But the way you're saying I would not be a guinea pig?" asked Sheldon.
"True, but you can keep the credits we do not care!" said Beatrice even with her colleagues not agreeing with it.
"In that case ... Why not?" said Sheldon, already eating one of the dumplings.
Beatrice then went to meet her colleagues.
"Beatrice, did you go crazy?!?" asked Doctor Jonas.
"Give the credits to him?!? For something that even he did not work?!?" said Dr. Samson.
"Do not worry boys, I know what I'm doing! We did not need a specimen to be a tribute to our leader, so here it is!" explained Dr. Beatrice.
"But he is very skinny! How will he quench our leader?!?" asked Doctor Jonas.
"Did you forget what the cookies are made of?!? They were made with the purest sugar and hormones that slow down the metabolism and make those who consume fat!" Beatrice explained.
"Truth!" said Dr. Jonas.
"Yes ... I forgot ..." said Doctor Samson a little embarrassed.
Beatrice walked over to Sheldon.
"So, Sheldon, how's the cookie?" Beatrice asked.
"Simply fantastic! I would eat this for the rest of my life if I could!" Sheldon said another bite.
"How about you come here to try a different take of cupcakes a day?" Beatrice asked.
"I would love to!" said Sheldon.
"Great, see you next time!" said Beatrice saying good-bye to Sheldon.
When Sheldon left the room Beatrice met with her colleagues.
"Let the process of fattening begin!" Beatrice together with the other scientists.

"Adam, could you come with me? Let's get my great-grandmother Eunice at the airport!" Andi would say to her husband.
"Andi, are you sure we need to shelter that old woman while she's here?" Adam asked a little rudely.
"Yes, she will stay with us, but do not worry, it will be until her house is reformed!" Andi explained.
"Why what happened to her house?" asked Adam.
"She said the house melted because of the summer heat!" said Andi.
"I understood ... Wait! How does a house melt?" Adam asked a little confused.
"Adam, Eunice is already a 109-year-old lady, you know that old people have a habit of saying nonsense!" This story of the house melted, maybe it was actually a crumble! said Andi.
"Come and help me clean the sofa bed!" Andi went on saying as she settled into the living space.

At the airport Andi and Adam received Eunice on the platform.
"Great-grandmother Eunice! How long I have not seen you!" said Andi, hugging Eunice.
"I missed you too, my favorite great-grandfather!" said Eunice, hugging Andi back.
"Hmmmm ... This must be Adam!" said Eunice, reaching for the greeting.

1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
It was a day as beautiful as any, with clear skies and a bright sun shining down to illuminate and liven the day. The fact that it was the weekend seemed to make the day even more beautiful. So, Jack Brewer thought it was a great day to train his martial arts in the forest. The trees shook in the whistle of a breeze, convincing Jack to go to the forest to train; it was just too welcoming to say no! However, as Jack was getting ready to leave, packing some water and snacks for a small break, his friend Jerry came up to him. "Where're ya going Jack?" Jerry asked, as if he was challenging his friend. "Just going to go train in the woods. It seemed like a nice day to get outside. Why are you asking?" Jack replied. Jerry, seeing this as an opportunity for Jack to get ahead of him in training, decided to prevent such. "Well, I'm not busy today so I wanted to see what you were up to, and I think I'll go training with you!" Jerry said. "You don't really have to-" "Great! I'll get my stuff together!" Jerry interrupted Jack.

And so the two were off in the woods. Eventually, when they were deep enough into the forest to where nobody would notice them, they set their bags down and decided to train. It wasn't long before Jerry got bored of training and decided to explore more of the woods. He took a few steps and suddenly smelt a deliciously sweet scent. "Jack! Do you smell that?" Jerry called out to his friend. Jack, who was still training, stopped for a moment to, quite literally, smell the roses. "Huh. Who would be out here baking something. Do you think we made a wrong turn or something?" Jack proposed. "I dunno. Who cares? I wanna get some of whatever's cooking though!" Jerry said, patting his flat stomach. Afterwards he dashed off in the direction of the smell, leaving Jack and his belongings behind. "Jerry! Wait!" Jack cried out before chasing after his friend. It wasn't long before Jack found Jerry staring at a house a few feet away. "Woah dude. Is it just me or is that house made out of freaking candy!" Jerry exclaimed. He was right, and Jack couldn't believe it. He was standing in front of a house made entirely out of sugary sweets and baked goods. "We gotta get someone out here to see this! Right, Jerry?" Jack exclaimed, "...Jerry?"

Jack's friend was already dashing towards the house, his arms outreached in hopes of digging into the delectable den. Jack, worried about what his friend would do, chased after Jerry in fear of whoever lived in the house. "Jerry! Stop eating the house! Someone probably lives here!" Jack cried out. "Chill out dude. Nobody's gonna live in a candy house this deep into the woods. Plus, it's delicious!" Jerry replied to his friend's worry. To emphasize his point, Jerry shoved a handful of cookie into Jack's mouth. Jack, with no other option, decided to swallow the cookie, finding it to be one of the most delicious things he's ever tasted. He hadn't realized how hungry he was, and followed suit of Jerry, digging into the candy house.

Meanwhile inside, a mystic figure peered out the window of their candy house. "...oh? It seems I've found more boys to feed. Or should I say, more pigs to experiment on! Oh ho ho ho!" The figured cackled. They decided to introduce themselves to the two boys, hoping to lure them inside. The _______ walked outside to introduce themselves to the boys, and to bring them inside for more to eat.
1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: A strange house

1523222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Willy Wonka, the world's largest chocolate was facing a problem in his own body! You know how chocolate he had tasted all sorts of chocolates and other sweets, he was already sick of so many hotties, until one day he lost his sanity and began to want to taste human flesh! But how would he do that? A factory tour again! It could work, he's done it before.
Then Willy and the Oompa Loompas went to work and started sending 4 gold tickets in random chocolate bars all over the country just like the first time, but the difference is that the next visitors would not return!
Tickets were sent out and one by one these were found.

The first to find the golden ticket was Adam Sandler!
"Wow, I can not believe I'm going to tour the Willy Wonka factory!" Adam Sandler said cheerfully for being one of the participants.

The second note was also found by ... Kevin James!
"Hmmmm ... I even know I'm going to get so much chocolate!" said Kevin James anxiously already imagining himself in the midst of sweets.

The third ticket came soon after and Chris Rock was the award-winning!
"Surely it's going to be fun! Will I get a prize at the end? I'd love to win just like Charlie Bucket!" Chris would say hoping to win.

The room came next! The lucky winner was David Spade!
"Surely this can earn me a greater fame!" thought David Spade.

A few days later...

The four actors then meet in front of the factory gate where they were greeted by Willy Wonka himself.

"Good morning guys! I loved you in Grown Ups 2! It's nice to meet you!" said Willy Wonka.

"It's our pleasure!" said Adam, reaching for a greeting.

"It's not fleshy enough is it?" Wonka whispered, nudging Adam Sandler into his belly.

"What did you say?" asked Adam.

"Nothing!" said Wonka.

"And you must be Kevin James!" said Willy Wonka, heading for the actor.

"I am myself!" said Kevin.

"You must be a delight!" whispered Wonka again.

"Said something?" asked Kevin.

"I said it's an honor to meet you!" Wonka explained.

"Pleasure! Chris Rock!" Chris said shaking Wonka's hand.

"Yeah ... I think you need to get a little fat or a lot ..." Wonka whispered, squeezing Chris's arm.

"Is there a problem Mr. Wonka?" asked Chris.

"No problem!" Wonka said, heading for Spade.

"And you are?" asked Wonka.

"It's me! David Spade!" presented Spade.

"Well, Spade, how could he forget?" "He's kind of soft and not too chubby either!" "But nothing like the machine pulls and the Milk Shake liters do not solve ..." Wonka whispered to himself again.

"Pulling machine?" asked David.

"Yeah, yea, pull-pull machines, a river of chocolate, sweets all over, all waiting for you in there! Wonka said cheerfully, opening the gates for the actors to enter.

In the next chapter, the group will be in the candy room what happens now?

Wonka then decided that it was better to go to the next room because he did not want to delay the tour.
"Very well, boys, shall we?" asked Wonka, directing the three actors into the next room.
"But what about Kevin?" asked David.
"Do not worry, he'll be fine!" said Willy Wonka, directing Adam, Chris, and David to the door.
Wonka went to the Oompa Loompa boss to give him new orders.
"Make sure Kevin gets more appetizing for my meal! Take him to the Pleasure Room where he can eat whatever he wants and when he wants!" Wonka ordered.
The Oompa Loompa boss just nodded, meaning he understood the message.
"Hello, how can I help you?" Kevin James asked as one of the Oompa Loompas approached him.
This same Oompa Loompa began to pull Kevin by his fleshy arm while the other Oompa Loompas began to push Kevin from behind directing to a different room.
"See, he'll be fine! said Wonka, the other actors began to follow him.
"Welcome to the Inventing Room!" said Wonka, presenting several machines present there.
"Now boys, let us be amazed, for I will show you an invention that can revolutionize history!" said Wonka, who pressed a button on a machine and made an apparently ordinary chewing gum out of it.
"A chewing gum?!? Is this going to revolutionize history?!?" Chris Rock asked a little indignantly.
"It's not a chewy gum any of my dear Chris! It's a 3-Coursed Meal Chew! Just start chewing that the consumer will start to feel flavors from entry to dessert! that one of the actors was naive to taste the chewing gum.
"This is impossible!" said Chris a little exalted.
"Chris calms down!" said David Spade.
"I'm calm, I just can not believe you're believing in this nonsense! I'll prove to you that he's lying!" said Chris, who took the chewing gum from Wonka's hand and put it into his mouth, chewing instantly.
"Well, you'd better get away, for a show is about to begin!" Wonka said anxiously, for he already knew what would happen.
"Wow, forgive me Mr. Wonka, I paid with the tongue!" "Hmmmm ... tomato soup ..." Chris was saying as he chewed.
"Hmmmm ... Roast Beef! My favorite!" Chris was saying that he was still chewing and the taste began to change again.
"Baked potato!" Chris shouted, describing the flavors that came in his taste buds.
"Soon, the dessert will come soon ..." said Willy Wonka with a wicked grin.
"It is what it is?" asked Adam Sandler.
"Blueberry pie!" Chris Rock shouted that for coincidecide he answered Adam Sandler's question.

* GURGLE *
